item.text: @#/ /rgyud ba pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam
po bcu gsum pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par
'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu phyag
g.yas pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mchog
sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na/ yon tan
chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga 'di ni/ mchog tu dkon pa yin
no| |gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang / rna ba'i bu gar 'di'i sgra lan bdun nges
par lhung na/ de 'chi 'pho ba tsam dang / bsam pa tsam gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur
te| 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyan thams cad kyis rnam
par brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor
dang / phyag rgya rnams kha ton du kun tu gnas shing / tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/ /dbang po drug yongs su dag pa dang /

mngon par shes pa lnga yang so sor thob bo/ /tsam la rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs yongs su dag pa de'i phyir stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad sna tshogs 'dzin pa dang / mnyan
par bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kha ton du bgyi/ ser sna'i dri ma dang bral ba dang / phrag dog dang bral bar bgyi/ sems can thams
cad byams pa dang / snying rje la sogs pa mchog dang yang dag par ldan pas bgyi'o/ /gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
'di mnyan par bgyi/ blta bar bgyi/ 'jug par bgyi'o/ /phyi ma'i dus dang / phyi ma'i tshe ma yin par phul
du byung ba'i don la brtson par bgyi'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga 'di ni/ bla na med pa zhes
bgyi'o| |mang du smos ci 'tshal te/ de la 'gran sems kyis kyang mnyan par bgyi'o/ /zhes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu skad cig thang
gcig yud tsam gyis po Ta la'i ri bo 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to/ /me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i
shing ljon pa gang yin pa rnams kyang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi khang pa brtsegs par rab tu gyur to/ /gang+gA'i klung gi
bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams 'bum phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam par rab tu gyur to/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam par
bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams pham par byas pa'i rgyan rnam par bkra bas rnam par bkra zhing / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba'i bla res
dpyangs pa rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi seng+ge'i khri yongs su bshams pa rnams kyang re re zhing khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na seng+ge'i khri bshams pa brgya stong phrag dgu bcu
rtsa dgur rab tu byung bar gyur te/ seng+ge'i khri thams cad la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par byon te bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par
mdzad cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par mdzad do/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ legs so legs so mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las
'das pa'i lam chen por rab tu bstan pas/ sems can thams cad pha rol tu 'gro bar byed pa dang / gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa so sor
khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam tshol ba la rjes su 'gro'o/ /'on kyang bzlas pa dang / 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / dkyil 'khor
mthong ba dang / 'jug pa ches mang ba'i dbang du byas pa'i sems can rnams dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par gyur pa de/ skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
lus su rig par bya'o/ /de nas po Ta la'i gnas kyi ri bo dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags de rnams thams cad la mi gang tsam du mtho ba nyid dang /
shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad tsam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi pad+ma rnams rab tu byung ste/ 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / sdong bu bai DUR+ya dang /
'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi kha dog ltar dmar ba'i mu tig gi ze'u 'bru dang / lha rdzas kyi mu tig gi ge sar gyi khor yug tu bskor ba gang yin pa la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad kyang chos la gus pas/ thams cad pus mo btsugs te gzungs
'di'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya mthong ba'i don du mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la mngon par bkab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa 'di yang ches cher g.yos
par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog gi char chen po mang po rab tu phab ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i
don dang / gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dam pa la mchod pa'i don du char rab tu phab bo/ /de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bzhin 'dzum zhing
rdo rje bskor bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni/ shin tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa blta bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang
mnyam pa nyid du blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mthu chen po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu dkon par blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang / phan
yon so sor thob bo/ /kun tu snang bar byed par 'gyur ba 'di nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ma
gtogs par sems can thams cad kyi nang na gzhan su yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin
no| |lag na rdo rje/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ma dang phar gyur pa 'di/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di sems can thams cad kyi re ba skong ba dang / skyob pa dang / skyabs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i dpung gnyen byed pa nas ji srid bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi bar la rab tu 'god par
byed do| |de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pas
sngon sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du zhugs pa yin no/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i nor
bu rin po che chen po thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas nor bu rin po che chen po de yang mngon par dga' bar phul lo/ /lha
rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pas gcal du bkram pa mchod pa'i don du rab tu bkod nas rang gi stan la 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa don yod pa dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /
khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa byung ngo / /'od zer sna tshogs pa'i snang ba des kyang nam mkha'i mthil du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa
dang / cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan to/ /'od zer gyi snang ba re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rab tu bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can chen po/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya 'di bshad pa 'di legs so legs
so| |'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi rnam
'phrul 'bar bar byed pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar byed pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcus gnon par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis gnon par byed pa/ de bzhin nyid dang yang
dag pa'i mtha' pha rol gnon par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sgom par byed pa'o/ /'di
ni| lam rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi lam du chags par byed pa/ bsam pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ ngan song du 'gro bar rgyu ba rnams kyi bde 'gro'i
lam du 'gro bar byed pa/ 'di ni/ byang chub chen po'i sa bon dang / 'bras bu rab tu ston par byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang
chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can dag pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa khyad par du 'phags pa
rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga shod cig /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bskul ba thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten
las 'das pa'i cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs gsungs so/ /gnas bzang sa gzhi dge ba dang / /sa gzhi gtsang zhing ne'u gsing la/ /
ljon shing me tog 'bras bus khyab/ /me tog 'khri shing 'gram dang ni/ /sa gzhi mnyen la dag pa dang / /gang du chu bo 'bab ba dang / /gzi brjid ldan zhing yid dga' ba/ /sa
gzhi sems ni dga' bar 'os/ /yid kyi shing rta rgyas byed cing / /go skabs legs par gnas pa dang / /shin tu dag cing thun tshags bral/ /rus pa gseg
ma gyo mo dang / /phub ma sol ba yongs su spangs/ /gtsang zhing gtsang la legs dag pa'i/ /sa gzhi yongs su zlum pa der/ /mkhas pas rgyar ni gzings tshad du/ /gzhal nas
shin tu rnam 'byes shing / /gtsang zhing mnyan la 'jam par phye/ /gnas der dkyil 'khor legs par bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /'jig rten las 'das
khyad 'phags par/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs/ /sa yi cha las dbangs su ni/ /mi gang tshad du brko bar bya/ /gzungs dang dkyil 'khor dmar po 'am/ /yang na gur gum kha dog dang //
sa rdul dkar po snum pa ni/ /mar gsar 'dra ba 'jam pa yin/ /sa yi khyad par dbye ba de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags/ /byang chub snying po sa der mtshungs//
ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang / /de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin/ /brkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis/ /slar yang sa de dgang bar bya/ /ji srid dong bu mnyam par gang / /
de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o/ /nyung dang lhag pa bsngags pa min/ /'dir ni 'grub pa med par bstan/ /khru ni sum cu rtsa gnyis tshad/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig dag
gdab| |yang na khru ni bcu drug dang / /yang na khru ni bco lngar bya/ /mnyam zhing grwa bzhir legs par dbye/ /ba yi lci ba dag dang ni/ /sa dang bsres te bsku bya ba/ /shin tu zhen par
bsdig pa dang / /'jam zhing mnyan par bya ba yin/ /de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ /sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu dbye/ /sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes pa dang / /rta babs bzhi dang
ldan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni/ /rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad/ /khru gsum yang na khru bzhi ni/ /thig skud tshon gyis rnam par dbye/ /nang gi thig gi tshad dag tu//
mdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni/ /nor bu rin chen sna tshogs bya/ /bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu/ /pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dang / /kun tu bri bar bya ba yin/ /phyi yi thig gi tshad dag tu/ /rdo rje
rnam pa'i stegs bu dang / /rin chen sna tshogs gzhal med khang / /stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya/ /pad+ma'i dbus su gzhal med khang / /gzhal yas khang pa gnas par bya/ /
dkyil 'khor dbus kyi pad+ma la/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bya/ /g.yon du 'od ni dpag med pa/ /g.yas phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs/ /shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang ni/ /don yod
rgyal po 'jig rten gyi/ /dbang phyug mgon la mngon sum du/ /btud de thal mo sbyor ba ni/ /phyag bzhi par ni bya ba yin/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /me tog rnams
ni 'chang ba dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya/ /'od dpag med pa'i mdun du ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal po phyag bzhi pa/ /btud de thal mo sbyor ba dang //
lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs pa/ /lag pa gnyis na thogs pa dang / /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan/ /sna tshogs dar gyis
mdzes par bya/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya che/ /pad+ma'i gdan dang rnam brgyan pa/ /'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya/ /gra bzhi dag ni byas na ni/ /gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi
ste| |dbus kyi gnas su 'jigs med pa/ /shar gyi gnas su gnas pa ni/ /lha mo sgrol ma rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas kyi gnas su gnas pa ni/ /gos dkar mo ni rnam
par brgyan/ /nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni/ /lha mo dkar mo rnam par brgyan/ /byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni/ /lha mo pad+ma mdzes dgas brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa
rnams su/ /rgyal chen bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /bar gyi gnas su bzhag pa ni/ /ral pa gcig pa gtum po shar/ /nub tu pho nya bzhin sgyur ma/ /g.yas phyogs su ni
bzhin sgyur ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog bya ba yin/ /byang du srin mo khro gnyer gdong / /kun kyang me dbus 'jigs pa med/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa bzhin/ /phyi rol
thig le pad+mo'i phreng / /rdo rje rtse gsum bzhag pa ni/ /kun tu 'bar ba phreng bar bcas/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni/ /bri bya rtags dang phyag rgya dang / /lha ni dbang phyug
dbang phyug che/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang / /chu lha dbang po lus ngan po/ /dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi /lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar/ /lha rnams bri bar
bya ba yin/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang / /rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /kun kyang pad+mo'i gdan la gnas/ /de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang / /
zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang / /legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no/ /mdung rtse gsum dang paT+Ti sa/ /ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang / /rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i phreng / /'khor lo
dung dang ga dA dang / /ral gri dang ni to ma raM/ /bum pa gang ba dag dang ni/ /mi snang ba yi 'bag sha dang / /pad+ma dang ni ut+pa la/ /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang nor bu dang / /dbyug
pa dang ni rdo rje dang / /grwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan pa yin/ /nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni/ /dgra sta rdo rje dag dang ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil/ /bya ba bum dang kun di dang / /ril ba
b+h+ring+ka ri dang ni/ /ri dwags e na'i pags pa dang / /mchod phyir thogs pa'i snam bu dang / /steng du rgyu skar bcas pa yi/ /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no/ /kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang du
'dug /so so cha ni dbye bar bya/ /mkhas pas shar gyi sgor bri ba/ /'gying bag mthong na 'jigs su rung / /lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa med/ /rdo rje 'chang ba
'bar ba'i nang / /ki li ki la gtum po che/ /lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru gzhag /nub tu rdo rje ping+ga la/ /mthong na 'jigs su rung ba yis/ /byang du nges par gnod mdzes bya/ /
phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni/ /pad+ma'i phreng dang ut+pal phreng / /grwa dag dang ni grwa rnams su/ /klu yi rgyal po bzhi rnams bri/ /sgo srung ba dag bri ba ni/ /nor bu bzang dang gang
ba bzang / /stobs kyi lha dang lngas rtsen yin/ /sgo yi gnas kyi bar dag tu/ /chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba/ /gang+gA dang ni sI ta dang / /pak+Shu dang ni sin+d+hu yin/ /phreng ba'i nang rol thog
dag tu| |dpal gyi lha mo ba san+ti/ /dpe med ma dang sa yi lha/ /lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang / /sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma/ /de bzhin me yi lha dag dang / /'phrog ma
dang ni dung can ma/ /gtum mo dang ni me tog so/ /de dag bri bar bya ba yin/ /khrus byas 'bri mkhan gtsang ma yis/ /gtsang ma'i snod du tshon rnams ni/ /lhag ma min pas
kun tu bri/ /zas ni dkar gsum grub par bya/ /khyad par 'dod pas zas ngan pa/ /spang bar bya ba nya sha dang / /tsong dang sgog skya ke'u rnams dang / /'dres pa spang bar bya ba
ni| |log 'dren glags tshol spang phyir ro/ /khrus byas gos ni gsar pa bgos/ /gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /kun tu brgyan
par bya ba ni/ /ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mda' dang ni/ /lha rdzas dar ni dpyang ba dang / /ba dan yang ni dpyang bar bya/ /tshon skud sna lnga'i srad bu yis/ /kun tu
yongs su bskor bar bya/ /zangs las byas pa'i pad+ma'i tshad/ /sor bzhi 'dab ma bye ba dag /mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /pad+ma
brgyad ni gzhal ba dag /gser las byas pa bzhi gzhag cing / /de bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi/ /kun tu byi ru'i phreng ba dang / /mu tig phreng ba de bzhin no/ /kun tu gser gyi
srad bu dang / /rin chen sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig bar du/ /gser gyi snod ni bzhi dag dang / /dngul gyi snod ni bzhi gzhag go /dngul gyi bum pa
gang ba bzhi la dngul dang / gser dang / zangs las byas pa'i me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis spras pa gzhag par bya'o/ /gser gyi bum pa bzhi bzhag pa la mu tig
dang / byu ru dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / margad dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs gzhag par bya'o/ /gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang /
gur gum dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang ba dang / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang /
zangs kyi me tog mu tig gis brgyan cing / rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa gzhag par bya/ cod pan gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi
gzhag par bya/ tshon sna tshogs can dang / dar dmar po dpyang bar bya/ dngul gyi pog phor bzhi bzhag ste tsan+dan dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur gum gyi bdug pas
bdug par bya/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par bgyis la bkang
ba la dar gyis bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du zangs las byas pa'i me tog gzhag nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma'i steng du gzhag
par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi chab
kyis dngul gyi snod dang / zangs kyi snod bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /lcags kyi snod bum pa gang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /me tog dang / mgo
lcog dang / pog phor bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /gzhag par bya ste/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis
brgyan cing spyad pa gzhag par bya'o/ /sna ma'i me tog gis gdu bu'i steng du mda' la ba dan btags pa drug cu rtsa bzhi btsugs te tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa'i mda'
dang / nor bu'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu sa dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la
dri chab kyis bskus te tshon sna lnga'i srad bus thig btab la sgo bzhi rnam par phye ste seng ldeng gi phur bu tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab bo/ /tshon sna lnga'i srad
bus dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bum bu dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhag go /kham phor zlum po drug cu rtsa
bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba gzhag go /gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug cu rtsa bzhi so sor gzhag go /snod tshon sna lnga pa drug cu rtsa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs
kyis bkang ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang / gtor ma dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag go /yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
gtor ma gzhag go/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dgram mo/ /phreng ba brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du dpyang bar bya ste/ byang phyogs
kyi dkyil 'khor la drug cu rtsa bzhi/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum cu rtsa gnyis gdags so/ /me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud par bya'o/ /gtor ma brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi
dang / dkyil 'khor thog thag tu mar me bud par bya'o/ /chang dang / sha dang / peg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / tshod sngon dang / la phug spangs pa'i gtor ma gzhan
rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i grwa bzhir don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya ste/ sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o/ /chos klog pa legs par khrus byas te lha rdzas kyi gos kyis dkris te gtsang ma la dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i gos gtsang
ma gsar pa bgos te chos kyi stan shin tu brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dug nas tshig 'jam po tshig mnyen pos bklag par bya'o/ /nub kyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor
mthon po la bde ba can gyi bkod pa bris pa 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa'i gzugs bris pa'i ras kyi sku
gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o/ /shar gyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mthon po byas la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la shAkya
thub pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go /
lho'i phyogs cha la ri 'dra ba'i gnas mthon po byas la de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
sel ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ /byang gi phyogs cha la khro bo'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go /stegs bu'i rnam par
mthon por byas pa thams cad legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /dar gyi phreng bas brgyan par bya'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag pa dang /
dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ro'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi ro dbul ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod
snyoms gzhag pa dang / tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzugs
la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang / cho ga bya'o/ /tshes brgyad
nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga tshang gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o//
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa lan
nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ba dang / rnam par grol
ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /zla ba nyar thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/ /tshes bco lnga'i nyin
mtshan thog thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dpag tu med par bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas kyang ngal ba med pa dang / lus snyoms
pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems su bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba mtshams
bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / dkyil 'khor bsdam pa byas nas de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la gzhug
par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa brtsam mo/ /mchod pa'i cho ga zin pa dang / de nas bzlas brjod brtsam par bya ste/
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur
ro| |bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing
legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shin tu
'bar zhing 'od 'phro ba nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer can don yod pa'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon du gshegs te
phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzigs shing rig sngags 'chang ba legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste
rig sngags 'chang ba'i spyi bo la bzhag ste dkyil 'khor gyi mchog shin tu brgyan cing spras pa 'di ni/ shin tu bzang ba yin te/ legs so legs so/ /'di
rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa rnams par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor/ bdud thams cad pham par byed pa'i dkyil
'khor| bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'joms pa/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rje'u'i
rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya yang rung ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcong rong las sgrol ba
yin no| |'di ni/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / nad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar par byed cing
'jigs pa med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin no/ /'di ni/ rnam par thar par byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po snying po dang / gsang sngags su bcas pa rnam par grol
ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rig sngags 'chang ba de dang des ming brjod pa dang / gang dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang / lta ba
dang / nyan pa dang / ming 'dzin pa yang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu brgal bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa nyid du sa bcu bgrod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gang zhe na/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mngon du mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzungs 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod byed pa dang / klog pa dang / dran pa dang / 'chad pa dang / lan 'ga' smyur bas mthong ba dang / thang gcig dang / skad
cig dang / yud tsam gyis mthong ba ni/ nga dang mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa yin no/ /zhes smra'o/ /bdag ni/ sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang 'dzin
te| 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pas spyi bos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang bas zungs shig dang / mchog ji
ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar yid la re ba dang / bsam pa de thams cad rjes su gzung zhing sbyin par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang bas yid la ji ltar bsam pa'i
mchog smras na/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par grol ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor
de'i dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni/ dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ lung bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba
yin| de ni/ mngal na gnas par skye ba'i tha ma ste/ phyis mngal na gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar
'gyur ro/ /de pad+mo'i nang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par brdzus te skyes par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs kun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phun sum
tshogs pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dam tshig chen
po 'di kha ton byed na/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar legs so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ skye ba blangs pa legs par skye ba yin pas legs so legs so/ /phyir mi ldog par bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams 'od zer 'bum phrag bye bas mdzes par gyur cing / bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyangs nas spyi ngor phyag 'jog cing dbugs
'byin par yang mdzad do/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'brel ba'i gtam mngon sum du sgrog par mdzad do/ /tha na dkyil 'khor chen po rol mo'i
sgra rnga bo che dang / rnga bran dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rol mo'i sgra gang dag grag pa la sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos nas sna ba'i bu ga tsam du
song ba de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tha na byol song gi skye gnas su
gtogs pa bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnam par thar
pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
dge bsnyen ma'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ 'ga' zhig gi
rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang / sems can gang gis sgra de thos nas sgra dbyangs de dang / ming thos pa rna ba'i bu gar
song bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa mi bzad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /
phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo yin no/ /rtag par
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dbugs 'byin par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /mthar byang chub kyi snying po
la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjes su srung bar mdzad do/ /sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su song ste sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang
phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs shing sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sa rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la
phog pa gang yin ba de dang / tha na sems can ngan pa yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams
cad las yongs su grol ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs par
'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis srung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung
bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na/ sgra thos pa tsam dang / ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par
'gyur ro/ /de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam
par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang / 'khor ba las sgrol ba 'grub pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas bla na med par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/
sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i lam ston pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' ston pa/ lha'i stegs sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyi mod la the tshom med par me lha dang / dbang po dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug dang
gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'di tsam gyi mod la thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /the tshom med par lha dang / klu
dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum thams cad
'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mod la rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do/ /de bzhin du nyin mtshan du kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen
po bzhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu yang phyogs bcur srung bar byed de/ mi srun pa ma rungs pa sel cing dmyal ba dang /
'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / dug drag po dang / sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed do/ /de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang / bsod nams chen po'i
phung po bla na med pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan srang nyi shu dang / a ga ru srang lnga dang / du ru ska srang bdun dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang / gur gum
srang gcig dang / /lce pog kun tu ra srang lnga dang / gu gul srang bdun dang / 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te phye mar byas la kha ra dkar po dang / sbrang rtsis ril bu zho re'i tshad
tsam du byas pa stong rtsa brgyad dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos bsres te ril bu dang bsres nas mar gyi nang du smyugs te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /shing su ra b+hi dang / shing arga
dang / shing sha mya'i yam shing gi me sbar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o/ /gang dang gang gi tshe stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang / sgrib pa drag po
thams cad sreg par 'gyur ro/ /de dang de'i tshe de nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dang de'i tshe gcong thams cad las yongs
su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang /
rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang / byur thams cad dang /
gnod pa thams cad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa thams cad dang / rang gi 'khor dang /
gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgras 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / zol ba dang /
mi rgod pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dang /
skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag gis de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams
cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / pad+mo'i nang nas brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri
tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar sbyin sreg byed pa de lta de ltar de'i lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang na/ rig sngags
'chang ba'i lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so
zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rig sngags 'chang ba/ legs so legs so/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog /rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/
'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga yin no/ /'di ni/ bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po
dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren tshar gcod ba'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub kyi snying por
song ste chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni/ byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa yin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams
cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog par mdzad do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / mdung
rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mdun na bzhugs te bka' stsol pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legs so legs so/ /zungs shig dang / mchog ji lta ba dang
ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag bzhag pa dang / phyag bzhag ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang ba nam mkha' la 'gro
bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi
ldog pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro//
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bsnyen bkur byas nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub sems
dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mngon sum du thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas hoM khung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas bla na med pa ni/ pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa/ zlum po khru gsum pas dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa dang ldan par byas/ pad+ma'i snying po la hoM khung
zabs su brko ba dang / thad ka kun du khru gang pa brko bar bya'o/ /nang du pad+ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa bzhag la tshon sna tshogs kyis pad+ma de brgyan par bya'o/ /pad+ma'i
phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ba dang / brgyan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /
dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi chus bkang ba gser gyi snod bzhi dang / ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag pa ni/ gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs
dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dpyangs la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu tshon sna lnga'i ba
dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang / sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang / bum pa bzhag pa ni/ legs par brgyan cing dri chus yongs su bkang ba bya'o/ /sgo bzhir chos
smra ba shin tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o/ /grwa bzhir chos smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o/ /gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o//
de nas rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos dri zhim bos bsgos te gtsang mar byas la ril bu la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas don yod pa rnam par
lta ba'i 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying pos stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ mi smra bar byas pa'i sems dang / snying thag pa nas brtse ba
dang / snying rje bar bya ba ni/ las bla na med pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ oM pad+ma ma pA ni/ tsa ra tsa ra pad+ma b+hu dze/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU ta sha ne/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ bi mok+Sha b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/ sar+b+ba ma la

na| a mo g+ha pa ni ba ra de/ hUM hUM ni ra da ha/ pA paM/ sha ma sha ma ni/ lo kot+ta ra Ni/ sa man+ta rash+mi ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ pra ba re/ a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ oM b+hur+b+hu ba/ na mostu te swAhA/
de ni| rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das ba bla na med pa yin no/ /de nas
rig sngags 'chang bas thal ba des rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams cad bya'o/ /thal ba des gang lus la byugs pa de ni/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol
bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig le byas na/ de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las thar par 'gyur ro/ /zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa
dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin par pa dang / nam phyed pa dang / nyin phyed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / lan
'ga' yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /mtshogs mar thig le byas na/ gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi
las thar par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du
lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dwags dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par
mi 'gyur ro/ /thams cad 'bros so/ /phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na/ slar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le byas na/ nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /
lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na/ lto ba'i nang gi nad thams cad mod la sos par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa la bskus na/ dug med par 'gyur ro/ /dug gis
myos pa la byin na/ dug med par 'gyur ro/ /thal bas khrus byas na/ byad dang / g.yeng byed dang / sngags dang / dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /sha bkra dang /
mdze dang / 'bras dang / shu phran mched pa dang / 'brum bu dang / lhog pa dang / me dbal dang / 'brum phran rnams byung na/ chu dron po dang sbyar te bskus la mar la lan
bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bskus na mod la nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sprin logs su gtor na/ sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad mi
'bab bo/ /rlung ldang ba'i logs su gtor na/ rlung bsdams par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhir gtor na/ mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /yul 'khor kun tu gtor
na| me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / shing gi yal ga dang / ldum ra dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / ri dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang /
nags tshal thams cad legs par srung par 'gyur ro/ /yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi
sgo bzhir gtor na/ der 'jug pa dang / phyir 'byung ba'i sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje
rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / ri dwags dang / bya de dag thams cad
sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dgongs pa tsam gyis nad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar
'gyur ro/ /tshe yongs su brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob
par 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod dam/ ro bsregs pa'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mdo la dmyal ba nas thar te mngon
par dga' ba'am/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim mam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul
'khor kun tu gtor na/ mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor na/ rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad
las legs par srung bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor ba tsam gyi mdo la skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /
nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bye ba stong phrag brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gis blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku gzugs ras la bris pa bshad par bya'o/ /dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru
do'am| khru gsum mam/ khru bzhi pa de'i dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ cod pan
rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang g.yas su zla ba tshes pa can gyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa bri ba ni/ ri bo po Ta
la lcug ma me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcug mas gang ba bya'o/ /de'i steng du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ seng+ge'i khri'i khri bya'o/ /seng+ge'i
khri'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan bya'o/ /de'i steng du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs par bya ste/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs shing
gzugs de phyag dbugs 'byin pa bya'o/ /dbu'i gong man chad gzhal med khang chen po lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ dbus su mtho ba dang bcas pa bya'o//
dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun tshad dang mthun par pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa de'i gong gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung bcas te gzhal med khang gi nang na bzhugs par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od
'dom gang pa la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye 'khor kun tu 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang / mdung
rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba bya'o/ /de nyid kyi nye 'khor du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis bya'o/ /gong gi dbus su rdo rje 'chang ba khro gnyer can rdo rje gsor bar bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa dang /
khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi snying po'i dbang po dang / 'og min gnas kyi lha'i bu dang /
dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon
nu dang / me lha dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / stobs lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gnas
gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs lag pa nas 'phrul
pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ lha rnams kyi phyi rol thog thag
tu pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pas spras pa'i pad+ma'i phreng bas kun tu 'khor bar bya/ g.yas phyogs su 'phags ma sgrol ma skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te
bzhugs pa ut+pa la dang / nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du blta bar bya'o//
de'i rgyab tu khro gnyer ma me tog sna tshogs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /g.yon du dkar ma zhas bya ba ni/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te/ bzhugs pa/
kru mud dang / nor bu rin po che lag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ /dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad+ma mdzes
dga' ma/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /lha mo sgrol ma dang / dkar mo'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo
thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ na bza' dkar po gsol ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su srin mo ral pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo
krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje lag na thogs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta
bar bya'o/ /g.yon du pho nya mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pa phyag
na thogs pa/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ /ri bo po Ta la'i ngos kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal po dga'
bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'thor bar
bya'o| |ri'i smad du lha mo dpe med ma dang / lha mo ba san+ti dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dpal lha mo dang / lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dung
can ma ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che thogs pa bya'o/ /gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad phreng bar sbrengs la
mchod rten gyi rgyan ji ltar rgyan pa de ltar brgyan par bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten dbang phyug
mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu drang srong dang / lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das
la mchod pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bya ste/ kun dga' bo dang / rdo rje 'chang ba lag na rnga yab kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
du g.yob par bya'o/ /g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su khro bo'i
rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu drang srong dang / lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang
g.yas kyi phyi rol thog thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad pad+mo'i gdan la tshad ji lta ba bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan thams
cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng+ge'i gdan gyi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang ba bus mo btsugs te me
tog dang / bog phor dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du blta bar bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma
bgos te gtsang bar byas la ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/ /snod gsar ba gtsang ma'i nang nas tshon lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o/ /'di yang
kha zas mi gtsang ba sna tshogs dang / gos ngan pa mi gtsang ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /tshig ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /chang dang / sha dang /
beg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres pa yongs su spangs par bya'o/ /nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o/ /dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog
dang bral bar bya'o/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa lhag par bya ste/ ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o/ /ga pur dang /
gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya'o/ /dpen zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de ltar ri mo bri
ba ni| las legs par byas pa yin no/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo la bri bar bya'o/ /rgyu skar shin tu bkra shis pa dang / tshes grangs dang / nyi ma shin tu bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o//
rgyu skar rgyal ni/ bkra shis pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad
kyi si rjes su bzung ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par gzigs pa/ byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
gsang ba/ ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba ni/ sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mdo la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams
med pa lnga byed pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams kyang mthong ba tsam la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad phye mar rlog go/
rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sdom pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi de bzhin
gshegs pa byang chub snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni/
gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta la na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong
ba dang 'dra ste/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig rab tu dang ba byas na/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su
bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin par 'gyur
ro| |de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus dang sems yid las byung ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po thams cad yongs
su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa thams cad dga' ba dang / bla mar lta bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring por
'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i
nang nas brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mdo la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'di gang gis mchod
pa de ni| phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ mngal na gnas pa'i tha ma yin te/ phyis ma rig pa'i mun pa'i nang du ltung bar mi
'gyur ro/ /de ltar na/ mi mnyam pa dang 'dra bar yin te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni/ dam pa yin no/ /de nas gsang sngags
kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa brjod par bya'o/ /gang gis dran ba tsam gyi mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong nas 'dug pa dang /
phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams
cad mngon du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo thams
cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i lus su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i tshogs mchog thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad
dang / rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha a ba lo ki te ma hA maN+Dal pad+ma sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa na ma skr-i te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te a mo g+ha ma hA/

brah+maM/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mahA kA ru Ni ka bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma hA bo d+ha ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ pad+ma bi bo d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba pA paM an+d+ha ka ra/ pra sha ma ni/ sar+b+ba dur gti/ b+hA ra ka/

ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gar+b+he/ hu ru hu ru/ a mo g+ha ga r+b+he/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pa sha ha ste/ mu ru mu ru/ bi mok+Sha b+hu dze/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/

sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te pa ri bU ra Ni/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya mA na/ a ba lo kA ya pad+ma b+hu dze/ ma Ni ka na ka/ bi b+hu Shi ta/ bA hu/ da ma da ma/

du ra dA n+tA nAM/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba de ba ga Na na ma skr-i ta/ ri Shi ga na sta bi ta/ sha ta sa ha sra tsan+d+ra sU R+ya a he re ka /raSh+m+ri/ a ba b+hA saM ta/ ma hA pa shu pa

ti| be Sha d+ha ra/ pa ra ma/ shud+d+ha satwA/ a ba lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pa ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka/ maN+De le shwa ra/ su pra bud+d+ha/ ma hA pad+ma/ b+hu dze shwa ra/ ma hA bid+yA d+ha re shwa re/

d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA bi mo k+Sha/ maN+Dal d+ha ra sar+b+ba ta thA ga te/ gu h+ya/ mu dra sa ma ya d+ha ra/ ma hA ba la bid+yA d+ha ra/ mahA ma Ni mau li d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha/ mu ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+hu

ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pa sha d+ha re shwa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ra ma/ ma hA me tri/ a ba lo ki te/ sar+b+ba satwa saM ta rA ga /sid+d+hi'i sid+d+hi'i shA/ pa ri pU ra
ka/ mahA ba ra pra mo da na na mo stu te swAhA/ 'di ni/ thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi gsang ba/ 'phags pa spyan gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog gsang ba/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
lam rnam par sbyong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su 'jug pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas/
dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM bI ra bI ra/ ma hA maN+Dal/ bi shwa ru pa Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ ba ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwA
na ma skr-i ta/ ba ra ma bi pu la/ bi mo k+Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pA sha/ bi lo ki te/ a mo g+ha pA sha dz+wa li ta/ ma hA dz+wa la a ba lo ki te/ ma hA ma Na/ biSh+Ta d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a b+hA si ta/

dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA gam+b+hi ra/ bi mok+Sha pA sha d+ha ra/ ba la bo d+h+yang+ga/ A kaR+Sha ka/ oM brah+ma rU pa/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ sar+b+ba satwa/ pi lo ki ta/ ba ra pra da/ na
mo stu te swAhA/ 'di ni/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM bi bud+d+h+ya/ bi bud+d+h+ya/
ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ta ra ta ra/ ta rA ya/ ma hA ar+Na ba pA raM/ ma hA b+hu dza bi lo kA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i /snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha /ma hA dA na pA ra mi tA/

pa ri pU ra ya hUM/ da ra da ra/ bi bi d+ha/ pi tsi te/ sar+b+ba satwa/ u pa b+ho ga /sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA na/ pU dzA me g+ha/ pra wa rta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ya/ ma hA pad+ma pA Ni hUM phaT swAhA/
'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhags pa chen po'i snying po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam yang sbyin pa byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ mchod
sbyin sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha shI la/ saM b+ha ra
saM b+ha ra| b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/ pad+ma bi b+hu shi ta/ b+hu dza d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki te hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di myung ba byas te gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad
bzung nas mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dan par bya'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mdo la tshul khrims
yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i dri mang po lus las 'byung
zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran na/ de ni/ rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su
dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gang zhig tshul khrims nyams pas smyung ba byas te 'di bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mdo la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /
tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ma hA bI R+ya a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ dri D+ha bI ya/ ma hA ba la/ ba la ba la/ ma hA bo d+h+ya dag ba la bo
d+ha ni| hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis dran par byas na/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha k+Sha n+ti/

sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa k+Sha mi Na/ k+Sha Na k+Sha Na/ ma hA mai tri/ kA ru Na/ sar+b+ba satwa ba ta sa la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba satwa k+Sha mi Na hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di sems can du gyur pa thams cad
la bzod pa chen po dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis dmyal ba na gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ri dwags dang / bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang /
gnas gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzungs kyi mchog dran par byed na/ dmyal ba'i sems can las thar par 'gyur zhing skye
bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa rnams grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM
sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA a mo g+ha/ ka ru Na/ d+h+ya na sa mA d+hi/ sar+b+ba bi mok+Sha/ a pra k-i bya ka/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
dmigs nas yid rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na dran ba tsam gyi mdo la de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ting nge
'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis ting nge
'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha/ ma hA pra dz+nyA/ a ba b+hA sa/ s+pha ra Na bud+d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ ma man+ta bad+d+hi/ a ba lo ki ta/
b+ha ga wA na pra dz+nyA/ a ba lo ki ta/ tsak+Shu She ma hA pra dz+nyA/ ba ra da/ pA N-i/ ma hA pra dz+nyA d+ha ra Ni/ b+hu dze hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mdo la shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyis dag ba chen po'i blo 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyan mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa
bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes
rab dang blor 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
gtan dang / shes rab kyi blo nyams bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems la thugs gi bar dang / rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen
po yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mo g+ha bi mok+Sha/ maN+Da la ma hA da b+hu ta bi ma le/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA da b+hu ta/ a mi ta b+ha/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra hUM phaT swAhA/ dkyil 'khor der
yungs kar dang / dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas chus kun tu chag chag gtab na chag chag gtab pa tsam gyi mod la dkyil 'khor kun tu
dpag tshad gcig gi nang du sa sbyangs te yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar shel gong dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa gzhir
'gyur ro/ /shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu nyams dga' ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro/ /shin tu sa gzhir spa bar 'gyur
ro| |sa phyogs de'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag 'khod pa
de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi
'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
ba'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po gsog par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i rigs dang / bya de dag
phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de'i sa lag
par 'ongs te reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rims dang bral ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar
'gyur ro/ /de dag phyis lus la tshor ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lus su 'gyur ru/ /sa yongs su sbyong ba'i rig sngags so/ /dkon
mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
tad+ya thA| oM a mo g+ha dru ma/ la ta brik+Sha/ shaM kha pa tra/ puSh+pa pha la/ pa Ti pa A ro ha/ na hi DA ga/ pu shaka ri Na/ ud sa hrid/ sun+da ra bra pa Ni/ bi bi d+ha/ bi tsa tra/ pa ri

d+ha ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man+te na/ pa ri maN+Dal/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ma la ma la/ bi ma la bi ma la ni rma la su ba ri shud+d+ha/ pad+ma ut+pa li b+ha dza la ma lA nA bi shud+d+he/ sho d+ha
ya sho d+ha ya/ pa ra ma ma hA shud+d+ha ya/ satwa hUM phaT/ na maHtri b+hu ba ne hUM phaT swAhA/ 'dis tsan+dan dang / pad+ma dang / chu dang / yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te ljon pa'i sdong po
dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / sna tshogs pa'i lcug ma dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / chu klung dang / mtsho phran dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu
dang / 'bab chu mdzes pa'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ de rnams thams cad la bdud rtsi blug par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams thams cad la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bur
'gyur ro/ /tha na lha'i rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /gang la reg pa tsam gyis reg pa de thams cad ser sna'i dri ma dang bral zhing /
phrag dog spangs par 'gyur ro/ /mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / mchil ma dang bral zhing / lus kyi phyi dang / nang gi dri mi zhim pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro
gang yang lus kyi nang gi nad dang / gnod pa sna tshogs pa de thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par nyams pa
dang / legs par yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes so/ /de la chus khrus byas pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang lha'i chu dang / byang chub yan lag gi
chus khrus byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad bkrus par 'gyur ro/ /des so shing zos pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
rjes su dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / zhags pa thams cad yongs su spang ba dang / rtag tu kha nas ut+pa la'i dri
bro bar 'gyur ro/ /ngag 'jam zhing snyan par yang 'gyur zhing / ngag mnyen par yang 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur zhing / skye bo thams cad yid dga'
bar yang 'gyur ro/ /mi 'am ci'i dbyangs su yang 'gyur ro/ /bstan bcos dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / theg pa chen po thams cad thos pa tsam gyis
kun tu 'dzin par byed cing kha ton du yang gnas par byed do/ /me tog de lam nams pa dang / phreng ba mgul bar 'ching bar byed pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang byang
chub yan lag gi me tog gi phreng ba bcings par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /sna tshogs su dag par
yang 'gyur te/ lha'i dri dang / reg pa dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i so dang mtshungs pa'i
kha dog tu 'gyur/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la gtam smras pa de rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos shing skye ba brjes nas bde ba can gyi
'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa'o/ /'bras bu dang / me tog dang / chu dang /
nags kyi bdag po dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha a ma le tri ma le/ bi ma la/ niR+ya le/ di bya ba ri shud+d+he sar+b+ba

ma lo pa kaR+Shi te/ mahA bo d+hi satwa ba ra de pra ba ra pa ri shud+d+he/ ma hA ma Ni rat+na kA ya pa ri shud+d+he ma Ni ma Ni sho d+ha ni ma hA a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni shud+d+he/ hri da ya shud+d+he kA ya nirma la ma hA
ma Ni pa ri shud+d+he/ hu ru hu ru pa ba ra pa NI ma hA bu dza pa ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA satwa ba ta sa le/ ba ri sho d+ha ya mAM/ sarba su bi shud+d+ha ma le swAhA/ rig
sngags 'dis rig sngags 'chang gi bdag nyid kyi lus yongs su sbyang bar bya ste/ tsan+dan na gyi tshul dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi'i chu dang / ga bur gyi chu dang / yungs
kar dang / ba byung lnga bsres pas rdza gsar pa'i bum pa bkang ste rig sngags 'di stong rtsa brgyad du bzla bar bya'o/ /ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing lan bdun du
btung bar bya'o/ /khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la khro bo'i rgyal pos bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /khrus byas pa tsam dang / dbang bskur ba tsam gyis bdag rang gi
phyi nang yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rga ba la
sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur zhing / bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du slar 'od nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /
rig sngags 'chang bde bar sgrub pa dang / bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang / dri ma thams cad spangs pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste shi ba'i dus byed par
'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+mo'i nang nas brdzus te skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum
du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs
rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton
byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde gzhung sna tshogs rnam pa du ma kha ton byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong phrag brgya
tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+ma bi ma le/ pra sa ra/ sa man+ta/ mu khe swAhA/ dkyil 'khor char phye ste thig gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi bi
d+he| rU pa pi ci hra/ gan+d+ha ra/ san+d+ha ra/ pra ba ra b+hu dze swAhA/ tsho na rtsi'i sngags dang / sku gzugs gzhag pa dang / mtshon cha'i rtags bri ba'i sngags so/ /
oM a mo g+ha san+ta pa ri maN+Da la pA sha ban+d+he hUM/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bsdam par bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta/ da sha dig ma hA
sI man/ ban+d+ha ya/ d+hu ru d+hu ru hUM phaT swAhA/ yungs kar dang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams bcad pa'o/ /oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Na pA sha haste/ b+hu ru b+hu ru
swAhA| yungs kar dang / dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag srung ba'o/ /oM a mo g+ha/ tsU ta ma Ni/ hu ru hu ru/ nA ga pA sha ban+d+he hUM swAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig bzlas brjod byas pas spyi gtsug bcing ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha sa man+te na ma hA pA she d+hu ru d+hu ru swAhA/ slob ma dang / grogs rnams srung ba ste/ yungs
kar dang / thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha /i la bi ma le/ su ru su ru swAhA/ dri chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
brjod byas pas khrus bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta/ bin+du tsa ra tsa ra swAhA/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha di bya bas+t+re tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/ gos kyi sngags

so| |oM a mo g+ha b+hu dza ka/ ka pa tsa/ ba ra de/ tsi ri tsi ri swAhA/ go cha'i sngags yin te/ yungs kar dang / gur gum gyi chus bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha brah+ma b+hu dze pAR+yan+te na phra sa ra swAhA/
mchod phyir thogs kyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsU Da ma Ni pad+me/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya/ ma ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ma Ni ma Ni swAhA/ dbang bskur ba'i bsngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha
pad+me ba sun+d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra Ni/ maN+De hUM/ stan gyi gsang sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta pAR+yang+ka/ b+hu bi swAhA/ skyil mo krung bca' ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha su ra
d+hi| pad+me pa ra pa ra hUM/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha/ gan+d+ha/ pra sa rai/ pUr+Na b+hu dze swAhA/ dri'i sngags so/ /oM a mo gi bi bi d+ha le pa na pra ba re pi ri pi ri
swAhA| byug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ga ga na s+pha ra Na/ ma ye b+hu ru b+hu ru hUM/ bdug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha shu kla sa ra sa ra sa a g+ha d+ha ra b+hi d+ha ra hUM/ gtor
ma'i sngags te/ thams cad du bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha/ pra ba ra/ nu bi lo ki ni/ ki ri ki ri hUM/ zas dang gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM bi bi d+ha/ a mo g+ha/ pha la/ pa ra pa ra hUM/
'bras bu'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ad b+hu ta gan+d+ha b+ha re hUM/ mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ ma Ni/ b+hu Sha Na/ ba re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM/ rgyan dang / thod
dang / dar dpyang dang / mda' dang / tshon sna lnga dang / thig skud kyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ b+ha dza na/ dza ya dza ya swAhA/ snod kyi sngags
te| thams cad du sbyar ro/ /oM a mo g+ha/ pra b+ha ra b+ha ba na/ b+hu be tha ra tha ra swAhA/ gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha na ma ska ra Na/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ oM dza le hUM/
phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsa kre/ du ru du ru pra du ru swAhA/ bskor ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta b+ha ba ne b+ha ba b+ha ba swAhA/
spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsin+t+ra ma Ni A kaR+Sha ya du ru du ru swAhA/ gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ni rman+ta Na/ bi mok+Sha maN+Da le mi li mi li
swAhA| snyan gsan dbab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ma hA rash+mi dz+wa la sa ha sra dz+wa la dz+wa la sa man+te swAhA/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha haste pra sa ra gats+tsha
swa b+hA ba naM bi sardzi ta si sa ra sa ra hUM phaT swAhA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pA shA b+han+d+ha sa man+ta ma hA sa ma ya dri D+he hUM phaT swAhA/ dam
tshig gi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man+te/ pra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra ma hA b+hu te shA ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ gsang sngags 'dis la du dang / mo da ka ra dang /
zan dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / gtor ma dkar po dang / tshogs chen po'i bdag po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'i sbyin pa byas na/ phyis bgegs
byed mi nus par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /phyag rgya de nas brjod bya ste/ /gang gis gzung ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//
las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang / /dug rnams thams cad rnam par bcom/ /rnam grol dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin/ /lag gnyis pad+ma 'drar
byas la| |sor mo rnams ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /gung mo lcags kyu 'dra bar bya/ /lag gnyis mnyam par bzhag pa yi/ /phyag rgya rnam grol dam tshig 'di/ /don yod zhags
par byin gyis brlabs/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyad par gyis/ /lam gyi 'bras bu thob par byed/ /oM pad+ma b+hu dze/ pad+ma bi ma le swAhA/ dam tshig rtse mo'i rtse shes pas/ /rdo rje
pad+ma rtag tu bya/ /gung mo cung zad bskums nas ni/ /lag gnyis pad+mo 'dra bar bya/ /gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba/ /'jig rten rnams kyi dbang phyug dag /mtshungs pa med
par 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam grol phyag rgyas dogs med par/ /sangs rgyas mtshungs med 'gyur ba yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis ni/ /phyag byas pa yi phyag rgya
'di| |rnam grol dkyil 'khor rmad du byung / /oM pad+me su pad+ma/ bi mok+Sha maN+Da la/ pad+ma la/ pad+ma b+hu dze swAhA/ rdo rje bcing ba mnyam gzhag ste/ /rdo rje
pad+mo gung mo ni/ /bskums na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /rnam grol gsung ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ /yang dag grol bar rab tu bsten/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bstan pas ni/ /ngan
par byas pa thams cad 'jig /om a mo g+ha badzra pad+ma b+hu dze mi li mi li swAhA/ lag gnyis thal mo khong stong las/ /mdor na nor bu 'dra bar bcing / /nor bu'i phyag
rgya rdo rje 'dra/ /yid bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin/ /las ni don yod thams cad byed/ /don yod mchod pa'i char 'bebs shing / /don yod pha rol phyin drug rdzogs/ /don yod
sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yin/ /don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang / /mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar mdzod/ /oM a mo g+ha /ma Ni
ma Ni| ma hA ma Ni pad+ma ma Ni swAhA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar/ /pad+ma kha bye 'dra bar rgyas/ /gung mo lcags kyu 'dra ba yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu bzang / /phyag rgya 'di ni
mthong tsam gyis/ /'bras bu chen po rmad du byung / /'jig rten 'das pa khyad par 'phags/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/ /oM a mo g+ha/ badzre mahA pad+me/ dz+wa

le su dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le swAhA/ snying gar rdo rje pad+ma nyid/ /rdo rje bcing ba phun sum tshogs/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra ba ni/ /bcing bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ /gzi brjid chen po dag dang
ni| |stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang / /thams cad grub par byed pa'i gnas/ /thams cad grub par rab tu sbyin/ /'jig rten 'das pa grub pa che/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir bla na
med| |sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub/ /gsang sngags grub pa bla na med/ /oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi/ a ba li kA ya sid+d+hi/ ma hA bi bu la sid+d+hi/ ku ru ku ru
swAhA| rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag ste/ /gung mo gshibs te bsgreng pa dang / /srin lag mthe bong so sor 'gyed/ /gung mo yid tsam dgug bya ba/ /pad+ma'i dbang phyug sems
dpa' che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma ste/ /rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ /phyag rgya byas pa 'di yin no/ /phyag rgya 'di dang /
don yod pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no/ /phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni/ rnam par grol ba'i
dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam mthong ba'i mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/ /
mthong ba dang / bzung ba tsam gyi mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing mod la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a ba lo ki ta/

ma hA shud+d+ha satwa sa ra sa ra/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa/ kuN+Da la/ d+ha la a mi tA b+hA mu ku Ta d+ha ra dzA Ta ma ku Ta/ na ba badzran+d+ra/ man+Di ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM b+ha ra/ b+hu ba Ni shwa ra pad+ma b+hu
dze swAhA/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston pa/ rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma'i 'jig
