rten mgon po'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor bskor ba yin no/ /phyag rgya bdun ni/ phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po
de gang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog bzung ba ni/ phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag brgya bcings par 'gyur ro/ /bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad mchod pa dang /
bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/ /bstod par 'gyur ro/ /ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni/ gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang / kun
tu las thams cad la sbyar ba bya'o/ /thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yin no/ /gang zhig phyag rgya de dag bcings pa mthong zhing khrus
legs par byas te gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod
la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun tu bzung
bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams
med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyi ci ste phyag rgya bzung ba tsam dang / bstan pa
tsam gyi mod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu
dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal
po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir
rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten du 'gyur ba yin par 'dod pa dang / lus ring bsrel gyi snying
po yin par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /dug gis mi tshugs/ mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ dbyig dug gi
'jigs pas ma yin/ seng+ges ma yin/ gcan gzan gtum pos ma yin/ dug mi bzad pas ma yin/ rkun po dang mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim rdib pas ma yin/
gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus la dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / rbod gtong gi 'jigs pa 'byung
bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' lta ba mthong
bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
'dis mthong bar dgyes par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu yon tan dang / bsod nams 'bar ro/ /dpal gyi lus la shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du 'di mchod
par 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas sum cu
rtsa gnyis kyi bar du yang dgyes par 'gyur te/ mchod par byed do/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bdag po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen
po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyang
rtag tu de mthong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dgyes par ston pa bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la
dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsku ba dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas la/ tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus te ga pur dang / gla rtsis
bskos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku
gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bya'o/ /mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar
bya'o| |sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshogs yon chab la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems su bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse
ba dang / snying rje'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la
dran par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag bcing ba byas na/ phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcings par 'gyur ro//
de nas mthu brjod par bya'o/ /mthu ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du
mthong ba yin no/ /rgyal po'am/ btsun mo'i nang du'am/ skye bo mang po'i nang du tshogs pa dang / dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du'am/ 'khor du bcad pa'i
nang du'am/ rig byed bzhi tshogs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dang /
dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag gi nang du de dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das pa mod la mngon du mthong ba dang / 'das pa'am/ ma
'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang / dge ba dang / mi dge bas shi ba dang / skyes nas phyug
po'am/ dbul po'am/ rgyal po thob pa'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang / lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / rtag tu dbang phyug
chen por 'gyur ba dang / klu'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi ba mi zad par skye ba dang / mtshams med pa la thug
gi bar du mthong ba dang / bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig rten mgon po'i mthus mngon sum
du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi
ngas dang / yams kyi nad dang / pha rol gyi 'khor ram rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul sprod pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba
dang / nad 'byung ba dang / nad med pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / shin tu char 'bab pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par 'bab pa dang / dar
ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'byor pa dang / mi 'byor pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / nor dang / 'bru rnyed pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'bri ba dang / lo nyes pa mthong ba dang / 'khor
ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung zad legs par byed pa dang / nyes pa byed pa dang / dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'bri ba'am/ 'phel ba'am/ skye ba legs par skye ba'am/ ngan
par skye ba dang / bu 'byung ba bu pho'am/ bu mo'am/ bu bzang po'am/ bu ngan pa'am/ bsod nams can nam/ bsod nams med pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa
nyid du mthong ste/ las kyi cho ga legs par byas pas the tshom mi bya'o/ /tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin mtshan brjod par bya mi dgos kyi/ bzlas brjod dang / gtor
ma dang / gtsang sbra dang / bkru bshal dang / shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos gtsang ma bcang ba dang / bden par smra ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang / bla ma la legs par
mnyan pa de bzung ba kho nar bya'o/ /zas dang / skom gtsang ma dang / chang dang / sha dang / beg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i zas yongs
su spang ba dang / shin tu 'bags pa dang / de dag ni/ khyab par 'dod pas yongs su spangs par byas na/ las 'di ni/ mod la thams cad mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dka'
thub spyod pa la brnyas sems mi bya/ ma gus pa mi bya'o/ klog tu yang mi bya'o/ /rjes su bstan pa de dag ni/ mchog yin no/ /bsgrub par bya ba mchog de dag ni/ 'jig rten
dbang phyug mgon pos bka' stsal pa yin no/ /dngul las me long chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la zangs las pad+mo'i gdan khru gang gi tshang sdong bu dang bcas par bya'o/ /
me long gi gong du dngul lam/ gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ste/ tshad sor bzhi pa/ gdan pad+mo phyag bzhi la mdung rtse
gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang / pad+ma dang / nor bu rin po che thogs par bya ba ni/ 'jog sbyong legs par byas pa/ 'jam po 'od phyin pa tsam du sbyang bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags
'chang bas me long gi gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku la ring bsrel gzhag par bya'o/ /ga bur dang / gla rtsis sku la mchod par bya'o/ /me long gi nye 'khor thog thag
tu dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba gdags par bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i dar gdags par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang
bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ji tsam brgyad stong tshang gi
bar du bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas me long 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /gcig kho nar kha dog sna tshogs par 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten
dbang phyug gi sku gzugs de las lha rdzas kyi chu 'dzag go /'od zer sna tshogs 'byung ngo / /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /don
yod par dga' ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lus shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag par
'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan par bya dgos pas/ de
nas rig sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyar khru bzhi/ 'phang du khru ngo pa byas pa shin tu mkhregs pa shin tu 'jam par bya'o/ /thig
skud kyis rnam par phye ste/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par phye nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnam par phye ste pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad tshon gyis gsal
bar bri zhing pad+ma'i dkyil du ge sar dang / ze ba bya'o/ /stegs bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / stegs bu'i grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos
pa| gtum pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o/ /stegs bu'i dbus kyi gnas bar bar du lha dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha
dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / ral pa gcig pa dang / sgrol ma dang /
dkar mo dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa bya'o/ /stegs bu'i phyi rol
tu mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje phreng ba dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba kun tu bya'o/ /phreng ba'i bar dbus dang / grwa'i bar du lha mo brgyad dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe
med ma dang / ba sin+ti dang / dpal sgra dbyangs dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dung can ma dan/ pus pa dan+ti rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i
snod thogs pa bya'o/ /phyi rol thog thag tu phreng ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyi mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o/ /ga
bur dang / gla rtsis mchod cing / dkyil 'khor kun tu dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /dngul
gyi snod bzhi cung peng gis bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/ /dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis dgang bar bya'o/ /dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu bzhag
par bya'o/ /snod brgyad ro sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dgang bar bya'o/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /kha zas bza' ba dang / gtor ma sna tshogs gzhag
par bya'o/ /dri sna tshogs dang / byug pas dngul gyi snod bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/ /dngul gyi pog phor brgyad tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / tu ru ka dang / ga pur dang / gla
rtsi dang / gur gum dang / sra rtsi pog dang / pog gis gang bar bya zhing / bdug spos sna tshogs pa bsreg go /dngul dang / zangs dang / gser gyi me tog gi snying po'i
dkyil 'khor du bcal du dgram mo/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor du/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog bcal du dgram par bya ste/ phreng ba rnams kho ra yug tu bskor nas bzhag ste/ de
la yang me long legs par brgyan par byas nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma'i ge sar dang / ze'u 'bru la shar du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang
gtsang ma khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / bya ba thams cad byas nas me long la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug par gyur nas
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod dbul bar bya ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ro/ /dbang bskur ba
tsam gyi mdo la 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum dang / 'khor chen po'i dbus su me long gi dbus der 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis
mthong ste/ me long gi dbus de nas rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/ /bdag la don yod
pa'i me long la 'bebs pa'i de kho na nyid dam par gyur pa 'di thams cad yang dag par mthong ste/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa
zhes bya ba yongs su dag pa nyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang / khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mtshungs pa med pa thob bo/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i snying po'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya grub bo/ /rig sngags 'chang / 'jig
rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga gang 'dod pa smros shig /de thams cad sbyin par bya'o/ /zhes so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchog
gang don du gnyer ba de blangs na thams cad 'phral nyid du sbyin par byed do/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa der kun nas 'ongs pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa
dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje rigs dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun
na 'don dang / btsun mo'i 'khor du kun 'ongs pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa'am/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa'am/ yongs su dag pa'am/ lta ba ngan pa'am/ gzhan
dmyal ba pa'i sems can gti mug gi mun pa la lhung pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos
spong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad la'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus de la ston par byed/ thams cad du smra bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs
'byin par byed/ thams cad du rang gi las la dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de thams cad ston par byed do/ /rig sngags kyis chom rkun dang /
gdol pa dang / rig sngags spong zhing nyams par byed pa dang / rig sngags sun 'byin par byed pa dang / rig sngags la ma dad cing gus pas mi nyan pa de'i mi mthong ba ni/
ma gtogs te/ gzhan du na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar mthong ngo / /de nas sems can de rnams gang 'dod pa'i don yid
la byed pa 'jug ste/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por rang rang gi 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba bsod nams
dang / bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mthong bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po dang /
khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong ngo / /po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal yas khang rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa dang /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal yas khang na lha dang klus yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo / /gzhan ji ltar da ltar gyi dge ba dang / mi
dge ba'am/ lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa'am/ nad dang / 'chi ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / g.yul
dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / rgyal pa'am/ pham pa'am/ brlag pa'am/ ma brlag pa'am/ yams dang / char ches pa dang / dus ma
yin pa'i char ram/ char med pa'am/ rlung ngam/ sad dam/ tshad pa yang rung ste de dag thams cad mthong ngo / /nor dang ldan pa'am/ nyams pa'am/ 'phel pa'am/ lo
thog gam/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'phel ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad mthong ngo / /chom rkun dang / rkun po dang / dug dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa'am/ rgyal
po'i 'jigs pa'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa de thams cad mthong ngo / /nor chen po'am/ /nor med
pa de thams cad mthong ngo / /'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mthong ngo / /bu thob pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul dang / ljongs thob pa dang / bud med thob pa de thams cad
mthong ste/ 'di la dogs pa dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom bskyed par mi bya zhing / mchog tu dad pa dang / gus pas shin tu 'bad de cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /
don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo'i nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / ras ris shin
tu zab pa/ shin tu gting dpag dka' zhing shin tu rgya che la/ shin tu sgrub dka' ba dang / dkyil 'khor mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / ras
ris mang po yongs su bsgrags pa rnams ni/ rab rib dang bral bar mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa zab pa lta bu/ lhun po chen po dang mtshungs
pa lta bu| smig rgyu lta bu/ rdul phra rab lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal
du med pa/ tshad med pa/ bskal pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar bya ba med pa'i bskal pa'i tshad ma dang / bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / lha'i yul gyi tshad ma
dang / klu'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / sems can gyi tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan la snang ba'i tshad
ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la kun tu snang ba'i tshad ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshad ma dang / bdud kyi yul gyi tshad ma
rnams kyis thog mar dmigs pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bar du yang dmigs pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ bar du yang dmigs pa ma lags so/ /tha
mar yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/ sgrub thabs kyi cho gas bsgrub par bya ba ni/ du zhig lags/ gsang sngags ni/ du
zhig/ phyag rgya ni/ du zhig/ dkyil 'khor ni/ du zhig/ bri bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni/ du zhig /lag pa'i phyag rgya ni/ du zhig/ bdug pa'i sbyor ba ni/ du zhig /mig
sman ni/ du zhig /ril bu ni/ du zhig /bdug pa ni/ du zhig /ras ris ni/ du zhig /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni/ du zhig /snying po ni/ du zhig /nye ba'i snying po ni/ du zhig/
khro bo'i gsang sngags ni/ du zhig /drag po ni/ du zhig /zhi ba ni/ du zhig /yi ge gcig pa ni/ du zhig /yi ge gnyis pa ni/ du zhig /yi ge gsum pa ni/ du zhig /yi
ge bzhi pa ni/ du zhig /yi ge lnga pa ni/ du zhig /yi ge drug pa ni/ du zhig /yi ge bdun pa ni/ du zhig /yi ge brgyad pa ni/ du zhig /yi ge dgu pa ni/ du zhig/ yi ge
bcu pa ni/ du zhig lags/ smyung bar gnas pa ji ltar lags/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo ni/ ji ltar/ khrus kyi cho ga ni/ ji ltar/ gos bsgo ba ni/ ji ltar/ phyogs bcing ba ni
ji ltar| dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni/ ji ltar/ gtsug tor bcing ba ni/ ji ltar/ bdag srung ba ni/ ji ltar/ gzhan srung ba ni/ ji ltar/ grogs srung ba ni/ ji ltar/ slob ma
srung ba ni/ ji ltar/ rab tu 'jug pa ni/ ji ltar/ phyag bya ba ni/ ji ltar/ bskor ba bya ba ni/ ji ltar/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil 'bul ba ni/ ji ltar/ gtor ma 'bul
ba ni| ji ltar/ me tog 'bul ba ni/ ji ltar/ bdug pa ni/ ji ltar/ dri ni/ ji ltar/ mar me ni/ ji ltar/ nye reg ni/ ji ltar/ lha bshos ni/ ji ltar/ thams cad du spyan drang ba
ni| ji ltar/ snyan gsan dbab pa ni/ ji ltar/ rmi lam bskul ba ni/ ji ltar/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni/ ji ltar lags/ zhi ba can ni/ du zhig lags/ rgyas pa can ni/
du zhig /mngon spyod can ni/ du zhig /zhags pa ni/ du zhig /rdo rje ni /du zhig /pad+ma ni /du zhig /gshegs su gsol ba ni/ du zhig /nye bar 'pho bar byed pa'i bya ba ni/
du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag gi mtshan nyid ji 'dra ba dang / rgyu mtshan ji 'dra ba dang / kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba ni/ mi shes so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
las sgrub pa'i cho ga du zhig gi rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang
bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub du zhig rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems can bla na med par 'gyur bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di dag la bdag 'khrugs par
gyur cing / bdag la spobs pa med do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis shes par mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de dag bdag la
gsung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la the tshom mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi the tshom gcad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas zhu ba yongs su zhus par gyur pa gsan nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di dri ba yongs su dris pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ khyod la yongs su 'dri bar
byed pa'i spobs pa skyes pa ni/ lag na rdo rje/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir don gyi ched yongs su zhus pa'i phyir dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi
mchog 'grub pa'i don du yongs su zhus pa'i phyir dang / lag na rdo rje/ 'di ni/ mchog tu rmad du byung bas te/ phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo / /lag na rdo rje/ 'di ni/ sgyu ma lta
bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga /rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa dang zab par mtshungs
pas te| 'di ni/ gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ rgya mtsho chen po thigs pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar nus kyi/ lag na rdo rje/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i tshad ni/
gzung bar mi nus so/ /lag na rdo rje/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni/ rdul phra rab tu gtor ba'i grangs kyi mthar thug par bya bar nus shing / slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu gnas
par 'dod pas rang gi gnas su rab tu gzhag par nus kyi/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad ni/ gzung bar mi nus so/ /de ltar rgya che ba/ de ltar gting
dpag dka' ba/ de ltar zab pa ste/ lag na rdo rje/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa dang / gting
dpag par mi nus so/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad 'dzin par ni/ mi nus so/ /lag na rdo rje/ sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de dang / snying po dang / ting nge
'dzin gang yin pa de dang / zhags pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs su mthong bar byed de/ sems can
thams cad bsgral ba'i ched dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrub par byed pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du mnyam par 'gro ba ste/ gang du chu dang 'o ma mnyam pas mnyam pa bzhin no/ /thams cad du mnyam pas
byams pa dang snying rje chen po rgyas par byed do/ /don yod pa'i zhags pas 'gugs par byed la sgrol bar byed do/ /'chi ba med pa'i thad rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'jog par
byed do/ /dman pa dang / mchog dang / bar ma dang / rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs
pa rnams thams cad du mnyam par dran par byed cing ming smos pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed cing / sems can thams cad bla na med par byed la/ dub pa dang / ngal ba
dang / yid la gcags par 'gyur ba med do/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin
po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / yi dwags dang / nags dang / gshin rje'i gnas ji srid du/ sa 'og gi nang du son pa rnams dang / srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i
mthar thug pa dang / ji srid du 'og min gyi srid pa'i bar du gcig tu sems bskyed pas yongs su rgyug go /lha dang / klu dang bcas pa nas ji srid dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar
thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams bla na med par byed do/ /dper na/ nyi ma'i 'od zer ni/ mun pas mdongs pa thams cad sel bar byed/ dzam+bu
gling thams cad du mnyam par snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du snying rje
chen pos kun tu snang bar byed cing thams cad la thams cad du mnyam par gnas te sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sdug
bsngal gyi 'ching ba rnams thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do/ /skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su grol bar byed do/ /mtho ris la gzhol ba la sogs
pa'i lam thams cad du 'god par byed do/ /de ltar na/ snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen pos thams cad du mnyam par rjes su 'gro ste/ thams
cad du mnyam par mchog tu byed cing / thams cad du mnyam par byang chub kyi lam la rab tu dgod par byed do/ /thams cad du mnyam par skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du
'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni/ brtan pa dang / go cha dang / spro ba chen pos rig sngags
'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du zhugs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ 'di ni/ thabs gcig tu 'jug pa chen po ste/ sems can thams cad
'jigs pa chen po'i lam las so sor ldog par byed pa'o/ /bde ba nas bde bar gshegs pa'i lam du 'god par byed pa'o/ /rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med la
bsam pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ /sems kyis yid la gcags par 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan snga nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan bsngags pa chen po 'di thos nas dga' ba dang
mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa ni/ ched du brjod par gyur to/ /e ma mgon po 'jig rten dbang
phyug /e ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma/ khyod kyi ming gi yon tan bskyed pas ngan 'gro thams cad grol bar byed do/ /phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di
ni| 'jig rten gyi bla ma mgon po/ 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi yab chen po/ 'di ni/ 'jig rten sgrol bar byed pa'i mgon po/ thub pa nyin mo'i nyi ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de lta bur lag na rdo rje ji ltar smra bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug can song la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas yongs su zhus shig /mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig gis cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du snying po dang / de
kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin de rnams ston par byed do/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur zhing lung 'bogs
par byed do/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes zab mo zab pa rtogs shing khong du chud de seng+ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro zhing / rdo rje bskor bar byed bzhin pas
zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba
der dong ste lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan
gsum bskor ba byas te zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog phul te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ shin tu rmongs pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa yongs su nyams pa/
blo'i dpa' zhum pa ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / ras ris kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rgyas pa 'di dang / de dag mi
shes so| |sngon ma ni/ du zhig/ bar ma ni/ du zhig /tha ma ni/ du zhig /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni/ du zhig /snying po ni/ du zhig /nye ba'i snying po ni/ du zhig /ji srid du yi
ge bcu pa'i bar gyi gsang sngags ni/ du zhig/ dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / ras ris ni/ du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la skabs dbye
bar gsol zhes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag na rdo rje la brtse ba'i don du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i
me tog blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du nam mkha'i dbyings su gtor to/ /gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi mtshams su 'khor
lo'i rnam par gnas so/ /dpag tshad lnga brgyar khyab cing sa gzhi las gyen du 'phags pa nyid kyis ji srid 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du gnas te/ bai DUR+ya sngon po chen po'i
sdong bu la dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi dril bu dpyangs pa'i ba dan bcings pas mdzes shing 'bar bar yongs su gyur to/ /'khor lo'i rnam pa legs par yongs su 'khor ba
ni| nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i kun tu snang ba/ legs par yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mchod sdong rnam par
mdzes par shin tu gnas pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs pas spras pa dga' bar bya ba/ yid kyi shing rta rab tu tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba mthong ba/
lha dang / lha ma yin gyi phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / rjed par bya bar 'os pa dang / drang srong rnams kyis bstod par 'os pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung
bstan par 'os pa ste/ thams cad du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog gi ge sar la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna
bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pa la gdugs kun nas yongs su 'khor ba'i lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang
dang / lha dang / klu dang / chus byung dang / lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am
ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / lha rdzas kyi
rgyan dang / gos dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan cing / dar dpyangs dang / ba dan dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang /
rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams thogs te bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ lha rdzas sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin
gyi char 'bab par gyur cing / lha'i dri za'i glu dbyangs yang dag par len cing / rnga dang / pheg rdob rnams kyis mchod pa'i don du rol mo byed par gyur to/ /po Ta la'i ri bor
gzhal med khang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas par ca co'i sgra chen po sgrog par gyur to/ /po Ta la kar gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa rnams kyang sems tshim pa thob cing / rmad du byung ba thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa
rnams dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha gang
yin pa de rnams thams cad mchog tu ya mtshan pa dang ldan zhing / rmad du byung ba thob ste sems tshim pa skyes la ngo mtshar ba thob nas bcom ldan 'das la lta bar
byed bzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / lha dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab
'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po
dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gshin rje dang /
chu lha dang / lus ngan gyi lha rnams dang / gzhon nu'i lha rnams gdugs kyi yu ba nas bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /lha'i gzhal
med khang chen po lha'i rnam par sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi mchod pa byed do/ /gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khor yug gi nang du dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'og min gyi lha dang /
lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i bus yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed do/ /sa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za gang yin pa rnams dang / sa gzhi'i lha dang / chu'i
lha dang / nags kyi lha dang / lo thog gi lha dang / sman gyi lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad sa'i mthil gyi gzhal yas khang de sbyong bar byed par gyur te/ dri
sna tshogs pa'i chus chag chag 'debs shing / dri sna tshogs pa'i phye mas byug par byed/ me tog sna tshogs bcal du 'grem zhing / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis
bdugs nas sa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par brgyan par gyur to/ /de ltar rnam par 'phrul ba'i go skabs rgya chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog de bzhin
gshegs pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po/ yangs pa rgya chen po
mthong nas shin tu ya mtshan pa thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ 'di ltar sems par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi bstan pa ni/ shin tu ya mtshan no/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la slar yang gsol ba btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skabs dbye bar mdzod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/ dogs pa bsal ba dang / the tshom gcod pa
la rjes su gzung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas mig mi 'dzum zhing / bzhin
rab tu 'dzum pa lus 'od zer 'bar bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma
yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i gsang ba sgyu ma lta bu'i snying po dang phyag rgya dang / kun tu
spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yongs su bsgrag
par bgyi'o/ /sgrub pa sla zhing / bklags pas 'grub pa dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa shAkya thub pas phyag gser gyi kha dog can/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis yang dag par brgyan pa brkyang nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par mdzad cing / sems can dag pa chen po legs so legs so/ /spyan ras
gzigs kyi dbang phyug/ da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
'das kyis bskul bar rig nas phyogs bcur kun tu bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kun tu bltas
te rtsa ba'i gsang sngags don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi nor bu don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsungs so/ /don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma gtsug
tor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang po ni/ dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gtsug tor don yod pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi snying
po'i dam tshig rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros chen po
'phags pa shA radwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i
tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+mo'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 'chang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs pa 'di bdag gis da ltar 'khor chen po la bshad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM pad+mo Sh+Ni Sha ba
ra da hUM/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni kA/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ bi ri bi ri/

ma hA pad+ma ha staM/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku/ ma hA shud+d+ha s+t+wa/ e h+ye hi/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ b+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka

ra| ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA+e ma prap+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la/ i T+Ta/ e T+Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA bi ma la/ pad+mo Sh+NI Sha bi ra dza sA d+ha

ya hUM hUM/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ ma hA ba shu pa ti/ baM Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+mo Sh+Ni Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba A pa ra Na ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sarba bid+ya d+ha ra na

maskri te| ha ra ha ra sarba kilbi Sha ha ra/ hA hA hA hA/ hI hI hI hI/ hU hU hU hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA pad+ma dz+wa la d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/
sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pad+ma pA sha d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI rA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga wAn so ma A di t+ya
ya ma| ba ra Nu/ ku be ra/ brah+ma/ in+da/ r-i Shi ga Na/ de ba ga Na a b+h+ya R+tsi ta/ tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa na ta ku mA ra/ ru tra/ bA

sa ba| biSh+Nu/ d+ha na da/ de ba ri Shi/ nA ya ka/ ba hu/ bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma daN+Da d+ha ra/ pA sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/
ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA ba ra dA ya ka/ sa man+ta maN+Da la/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa
ra| ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ b+ha ga wAn AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ma sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarba u pa

tra be b+h+yaH/ sarba gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba dz+wa ra b+h+yaH/ sarba bya d+hi b+h+yaH/ bad+d+ha ban+d+ha na tA Da na tardza na/ ra dza/ tsau ra/ taska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka/ bi Sha/ shas+t+ra/ pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka
Na| ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ri a ba la/ bod+h+yaM ga/ tsa tu rA R+ya sa t+ya/ saM pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta

mon+d+ha ka ri ba d+ha ma Na/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Thi Thi Thi Thi/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ Thu Thu Thu Thu/ e ne ya tsa rma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra
e h+ye hi/ I shwa ra/ ma hA+e shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ ma hA b+hu ta ga Na/ saM b+ha ny+dza ka/ ma hA sid+d+hi swa ra/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya/ ni

bA si na| ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta rat+na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kri ta ma ku Ta ma ha d+b+hU ta/ ka ma lA laM kr-i ta/ ka ra ta la/ d+h+ya na sA ma d+hi/ bi

mok+Sha pra kam+pa/ ba hu sa ta san+ta ti/ pa ri pA tsa ka/ me hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma A pa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba bA d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sarba A shA pa ri bU ra ka/ sarba s+t+wa/ sa ma shwa sa ka/
oM pad+mo Sh+NI Sha pA sha hr-i da ya maN+Da la na mo stu te swAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil
'khor 'di gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa gzhi cher g.yos par gyur te/ ri dang / nags dang dgon par bcas pa rnam par
'gyur ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /kun nas sa'i mthil 'di yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi pad+ma'i gdan kun nas bting bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na
pad+ma'i lte ba'i gnas na pad+ma chen po gyen du 'phags pa/ 'dab ma stong ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ bai DU R+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser
gyi snying po dang / mu tig dmar po'i ze'u 'bru dang / lha'i mu tig chen po'i ge sar dang gcig tu 'bab par gyur pa 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed pas te/ 'di lta ste/
sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog tu snang bzhin pas 'bar zhing / rnam par gsal la lhang nge'o/ /phyogs bcu
kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu snang bar byed do/ /lha'i gnas dang / klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas dang / dri za'i gnas
dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kun tu snang bar byed do/ /rab tu tshim par byed
do| |yang dag par skul bar byed do/ /yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po rnams kun tu snang zhing / reg pas dmyal ba chen po de
rnams kyang pad+ma can chen por skyes par gyur to/ /sems can dmyal ba de rnams kun kun nas snang zhing reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad yongs su grol te/ bsams
pa tsam gyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skyes shing / lha'i lus la rgyan dang / lhub lhub dang / gos dang / spud pas rnam par brgyan
cing / skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par skyes so/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kun nas snang bas ri dwags dang / bya de dag thams cad kyang dud
'gro'i skye gnas las yongs su grol te mtho ris su rna rgyan dri ma med cing g.yo ba 'dzin par skyes so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kun tu
snang zhing reg pa de rnams thams cad sa chen po brgyad pa la rab tu gnas par gyur to/ /des kyang 'khor chen por kun tu 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de
rnams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod par gyur to/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad
kyang don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor chen po'i snying po gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub so sor thob par gyur to/ /klu'i rgyal po'i 'khor gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan so sor snang bar gyur to/ /lha'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang 'od 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo/ /gnod sbyin
dang srin po gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang du gnas par gyur to/ /'byung po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i
ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rdo rje'i go cha dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi ya lad bgos par gyur to/ /nam mkha'
lding gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang rdo rje mchu rtse mo chen po stobs kyi shugs rjes su thob par gyur to/ /mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gang yin pa thams cad
kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par gyur to/ /dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa
de rnams thams cad skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sku las nyi ma'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer
chen po rnam par sbros te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar rjes su zhugs so/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gi thugs kar zhugs ma thag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po snyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang
pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la ltos shig /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mthong lags so/ /sems dpa' dag pa/ bdag gis mthong lags so/ /
sems dpa' chen po dag pa/ 'di'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa pad+ma'i dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i
dkyil 'khor shin tu zab pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ rmad du byung ba chen po/ dngos grub mchog sgrub par byed pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ mtha' dag rgyas par gsungs shig/
gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags dang dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba/ nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa rnam par 'joms
pa'i don dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i mchog
tu gsang ba/ gtsug tor thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar
byed pa| dri ma dang rnyog ma thams cad sel bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ sdig pa dang / ma rungs pa'i sems
can phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ bdud la sogs pa'i rungs pa
thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ dug dang / mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mche ba'i dug dang / seng+ge dang / rgyal po dang / gnod sbyin rnams zlog par byed
pa| dug dang / byang stems dang / g.yeng byed dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid
gces pa rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i sgrub pa bla na med pa bklags pas grub pa 'di rjes su zungs shig/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje
bzhin 'dzum cing / gdong khro gnyer dang bral bas rdo rje bskor bar byed bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dam par gyur pa gsang ba pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams du zhig lags pa de dag
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab par rig nas phyag g.yas pas lte ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'i rnam pa la reg go /reg ma thag tu phyag g.yas pa'i pad+ma la snying po
rig sngags de yang pad+ma'i steng du 'dug ste/ rang gi ngo bo gzhal med khang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba don yod pa'i gzugs spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan
thams cad gyi rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu gser gyi cod pan can/ 'od dpag med kyi cod ban gyis brgyan pa/ ral ba'i cod pa na pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis spud pa/ zla ba phyod
pas rnam par mdzes pa/ zhags pa 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor 'chang ba dang / nor bu'i byug pa 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'chang ba/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
pa| 'od zer 'bar bas yang dag par brgyan pa/ gos rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs dang / spyan nyi ma dang / zla bas lhag par 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+ma rnams kyi steng
na mdzes bzhin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs mnyes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bya bar 'os pa/ lha thams cad kyis
mchod par 'os pa/ klu thams cad kyis rjes su gzung bar 'os pa/ drang srong thams cad kyis dga' bar 'os pa/ lha ma yin pa dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis rjes su 'gro bar 'os pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bla mar 'os pa mthong ste/ de lta bu'i snang ba rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de kho na nyid gces pa'i snying por gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan no/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
po lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong ba tsam gyi mong la snying po gsang ba don yod pa'i pad+ma dri ma med pa'i gtsug tor 'od zer 'bar
ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin so sor thob pa gang gis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du chud par gyur to/ /de rnams thams cad rab tu ma gu
ba'i yid kyis zhabs dag gi rjes la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don
yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags 'di smras so/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha hri da ya pad+mo Sh+Ni Sha ku mA ra pe Sha d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ A ba sha ya/ sarba a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya
hr-i da ya/ sarba sid+d+hi a mo g+ha pra yats+tsha pad+ma pad+ma hUM hUM na mo stu te swAhA/ 'di ni/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po bklags pas grub pa'i sgrub thabs so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+mo Sh+nI

Sha shwa ra| pad+me shwa ra/ sa man+ta ya sarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ a mo g+ha pad+mo Sh+NI Sha sa ma yaM A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba karma sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha me a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM hUM/ ma hA

pad+mo Sh+NI Sha b+hu dze swAhA/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags so/ /oM ma hA tsaN+Da pad+me shwa ra bi bi d+ha rU pa/ bi ka Ta/ pad+ma daM Sh+TA ka ra la b+hI Sha Na/ bak+t+ra sarba duSh+Ta hr-i da yaM/ khA da

ya| big+h+naM/ pad+ma d+h+r-i ka/ tsi Ti/ dri T-i hUM swAhA/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i rigs kyi snying po'o/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i las rnams so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+mo Sh+NI Sha pad+ma pA sha kro d+ha
ka/ mA yi karma pra be sha ya ma hA pA shu pa ti/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA tsaN+Da be ga a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya pad+ma hUM hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod zhags
pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams su 'gyur te/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
mnyam pas gcig tu mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dpag med dang mnyam pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ngo / /pad+ma'i
phyag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi phyag gis 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i gtsug tor bcings pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i
gtsug tu mngon par dbang bskur na/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis don yod par dbang bskur ba
gang yin pa de/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po rgyas par gyur pa thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang / bla na med pa'i dpal 'thob bo/ /rigs kyi rgyal
po'i gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du rigs kyi rgyal po legs par grub par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub
bzang po rnams 'ong par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do/ /
pad+mo'i phyag gis rjes su 'jug cing / don yod pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub ste/ bklags pas grub pa 'di la the tshom med do/ /pad+ma gtsug tor gyi
rigs kyi dngos grub dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du bklags nas bzlas ba tsam gyis 'grub ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po
dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad kyi rigs thun mong pa thams cad du rgyal po'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang /
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi rig pas lha'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i tshogs rnams kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu yang gnod
sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams su gyur pa dang / dri za rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang dbang phyug tu rtag tu
'gyur te/ the tshom med do/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams dang / thams cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar
du rigs kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang / drag po de yid la sems pa tsam gyi mod la 'phral du ri rab ltung bar byed cing / khor yug gi ri rnam
par 'thor bar byed do/ /rgya mtsho chen po kun nas dkrug cing rgya mtsho chen po nye bar skye bar byed do/ /kun tu gsal bar byed do/ /klu'i gnas thams cad du klu'i gnas
'bar bar yang byed do/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis steng du bdug par byed do/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang /
gza' dang / brjed byed dang / mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang ba pa thams cad kyi rigs
kyi dam tshig la gnas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya gnas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rgyal po dran
pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/ /de rnams thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing gnas par byed do/ /'ga'
zhig gang du 'gro ba'am 'dug pa de la dbang po dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rjes dang / chu lha dang
klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / gzhon nu dang / sde dpon dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dus rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes
su 'brang bar byed do/ /the tshom med do/ /khros pa'i las rnams sam/ de bzhin du drag po'i las rnams thams cad kyang hUM yig tsam gyis de la dngos grub mthong ngo / /
phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / sems can ma rungs pa shin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'jigs pa dang / rnam par 'gras pa'i skye bo dang /
sdig pa de rnams thams cad hUM yig gis mchog tu gzir ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /sdang ba dang / ngan sems pa'i sems can dang / byas pa
mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la 'khon pa thams cad drag po'i hUM yig bzlas pa tsam gyis skad cig la sreg ste/ dper na mes phye ma leb bzhin no/ /las gzhan stong phrag
rnams dang / las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ dran pa tsam gyi mdo la las thams cad 'grub bo/ /de nas don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor dran pa tsam
gyis bya ba thams cad ni/ gnyis su 'gyur te/ ji ltar gang cung zad yid la byed pas las byed do/ /dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas rnams pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la
byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do/ /zhes so/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga bzhi ba mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bco lnga pa/ de nas gsang sngags la
'jug pa rnams kyi dgongs pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ oM zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang
sngags yi ge gcig pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na/ sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal
ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /don thams
cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad do/ /gsang sngags oM zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags kyi yi ge gcig pa'o/ /oM b+hu/ yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa gnyis pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/
sngon gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad
byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhigs pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /oM pad+me/ gsang sngags kyi yi
ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ /pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags gang
yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi
mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor dkyil 'khor gyi ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/ /oM pad+ma hrIH/ gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa bzhi pa la 'jug
par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad
la rig sngags 'chang ba legs so/ /zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang / tshur shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste rang gi
ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go/ mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /phyir zhing nam
yang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten ba dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /oM pad+ma b+hu / gsangs sangs yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod/
byas na| sa lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu
ston pa mdzad/ sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang / legs so
legs so/ /khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/ rig sngags 'chang / khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas/ rig sngags 'chang / khyod tshe brjes na de bzhin
gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs bar bskyed par 'gyur zhing nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis
don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba grub cing / rig sngags 'chang / khyod sgrib pa
dang sdig pa thams cad spangs kyi/ bya ba thams cad gyis shig /yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin tu 'grub par
'gyur ro/ /oM pad+ma a ba lo ki te/ gzungs sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa drug pa thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad snang ba mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston pa mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang / nga'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing du byang chub snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog /las byas pa ni/ shin tu yongs su zad cing khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/ khyod kyis
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni/ phye/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon dang / rigs kyi spyi ni/ khong du chud/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i
zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni/ phye bas 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las
'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig /oM pad+ma dzA la hUM d+h+rika/ yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting
'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gang thob bas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer
kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba sna tshogs dag 'bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung
bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med
pa'i pad+ma 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi mdog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin la
dbugs phyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga
mchod pa'i mchog yin no/ /'di ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor
gyi snying po yang dag pa'o/ /rig sngags 'chang / khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa
rnam par sprul pa grub kyi/ rig sngags 'chang / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig /oM a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+me/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi
ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che chen po shel ltar phyi nang
shin tu yongs su dag ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongs su dag pa rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bo ston cing / rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la rig sngags
'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang
legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang / khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa dga' ba la zhugs so/ /rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i
'jig rten rnam par blta bar tshur shog/ der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug
tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyi/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig /oM pad+ma lo tsa ne hu ru hUM/ gsang
sngags kyi snying po yi ge dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor
'gyur| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston
cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba
yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang / chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis ngal zhing sbyang ba'i las legs par sgrub pa byas so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten pa
dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang / mdo sde lung bcas pa sgrub pa
'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bsten pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad grub pa yin no/ /oM pad+mo Sh+Ni Sha bim la hUM phaT/ gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod
byas na/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur nas sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye rgu dag /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o/ /gsang sngags bcu
pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar
bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa/ gtsang ma/ gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang snying rje skyes pa/ bden par smra ba/ bla ma la gus
pa| dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par
bstan to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rab tu 'dzum la lag
na rdo rje bskor bzhin du mgo btud nas smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor
dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po 'di ni/ shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po re re po 'di dag ni/ bzlas brjod tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
pa byed par 'gyur na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches dal zhing dub par bzlas brjod sgrub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ nyin zhag
gcig bsnyen gnas la gnas shing zas bslangs pa dang / 'bras bu dang / ldum bu dang / rtsa ba bza' ba zos nas rig sngags 'di bsgrubs na/ spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje/ nyin zhag gcig smyung ba la gnas shing nyin
zhag gcig tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong
ma'am| dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen pa'am/ gzhan yang dge sbyong mgo bregs pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa'am/ bud med
dam| khye'u 'am/ bu mo'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la skad cig thang gcig yud cam mam/ dus tshigs gcig gam/ dus tshigs gnyis sam/ dus
tshigs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po khro bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par phye ba gzungs sngags
chen po'i snying po bcu po 'di lan gcig dran nam/ klog gam/ ming gzung ba yang dran nam/ lag na rdo rje/ dus tshigs gcig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang de'i mtshams med pa
byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba/ bskal par gnas pa yang des thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs
su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ che rabs
su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nam yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los bsgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba
'bum phrag brgyad cur 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar
bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal ba 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten rnam par gzigs par skye bar 'gyur/ tshe
rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis su nor bu dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cur
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du
skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi nang du brgya byin
nyid byed par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'jug bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur 'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod par 'gyur te nam yang mi'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/
thams cad du tshe rabs dran bar 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje/ de ltar rig sngags lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan
bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ gal te gang zhig zhag gcig gam/ lan gcig smyung ba la gnas te bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byad na/ lag na rdo rje/ de ni/ tshe 'di nyid la mi
bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib pa dang bral nas don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /pad+ma gsal ba
rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa dri ma med pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /pad+ma gtsug tor mthar phyin pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba grub pa
'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod
nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo'i mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs pa
'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil
'khor gyi snying po gsang sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga ste/ sgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// //de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bya ba'i cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags 'chang kun gyis 'grub pa/ bsam pa yongs
su rdzogs pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/ bya ba'i cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya yi/ nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje/ gsang
sngags rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/
dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan gcig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsam pas sems can la
dmigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung ba ngan song gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dwags kyi yul rnams kyi
gnas de dag med de/ de ltar sems can thams cad sgrub pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
'gyur ro/ /lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ dug dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / g.yan
pa la sogs pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /lan bzhi brjod pa tsam gyis dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /lan lnga brjod pa tsam gyis 'thab
pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan drug brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad 'jig par
'gyur ro/ /lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi nad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ de lta bas na/ sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re zhing gzhan mi smra bar lan bdun dran par bya'o/ /sems can gang la
la sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba shi ba dang / dge slong gang la la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral ba dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la gus
par ma byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma gtsang ma blangs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ dur khrod dam/ ro bsregs pa'am/ 'chad pa der bye ma gtor bar bya'o/ /gang
dang gang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod sar bye ma gtor ma thag tu de dang der bye ma bab pa'i sems can dmyal ba'am/ yi dwags sam/ sha zar skyes pa'am/
gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i skye gnas su skyes na/ de de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur zhing / nam yang sems can dmyal bar gzhol
bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na gro ga la bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang pa gnyis pa'am/ rkang pa bzhi pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams
cad grib ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing / thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na ri dwags dang / bya dang / tha na
ldang ko ka dang / ne'u le dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / khyi dang / rus sbal dang / lag 'gro dang / dkyil 'khor de la grib ma bab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib
ba rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /dung la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon por
bus na| sems can gnag dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ri dwags dang / bya dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa
de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag
bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum gzung ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos na/ sems
can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur la/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'am/
dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ skye bo mang bo'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdugs na/ gang dag der dri ma nams pa'i sems can de dag thams
cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos gos la bdugs nas gang gis lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur
ro| |lus la bab pa tsam gyis dri ma dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /gos bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /
bdag nyid kyis gos de bdugs nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig
rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na/ dge slong thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'os par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang
po'i nang du zhugs na/ nor chen por 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /ri'i rtse mo'i nyi ma 'char ba'i khar bdugs nas gsang sngags rtsa
ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ mod la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed do/ /gu gul dang bsres nas lha chen po'i mdun du
bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bya ba pa byas na/ mod nyid la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dud gnas bsar pa
thams cad yongs su skong bar byed do/ /bo la dang / tsan+dan dang / gu gul bsres nas sred med kyi bu'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa bas lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig lus kyi yan lag la bya ba pa byas na/ sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed la/ dngos po sna tshogs kyang
sbyin par byed do/ /yungs kar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi byab pa byas na/ tshangs pa rang gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug la
mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /pad+ma'i bye ma dang bsres nas nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs la bdugs na/ nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas
pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing mchog dang / bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /nA ga puSh+pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang / bsres pa'i bdug pa klu'i
mtshor bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas klu'i mtshor gtor la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan gcig brjod
cing dran par byas na/ klu dang / klu mo dang / klu'i bu po dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang
gnyis la 'dud cing gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum sbyar na/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yang 'ong ngo / /
klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo yang 'ong zhing thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur nas 'dug go /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dgug par 'dod pas
dur khrod kyi nang du mi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas bdug la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dran na gnod sbyin dang srin po dag rgyug cing
'ong la| rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la btud nas rje btsun bka' stsol cig ces zer ba dang / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis de bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin du
byas na| bsgo ba thams cad byed la mngag pa'i las byed par 'gyur cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug go/ thod pa sbyar ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas thod pa
bkang pa'i bdug pas bdugs na 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ las byed par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas
bcag gis gnod sbyin mo bris la/ ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas par byes pad+ma'i ri mo bri zhing phye'i gtor ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la bdug pa 'dis bdug
cing / gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnod sbyin mo la brdeg pa byas na/ gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs
kyis mdun du 'dug cing / lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la slar yang 'ong ste/ don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ma'am/ chung ma'am/
sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas na/ bu la sdug pa longs spyod dang / gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su skyong
bar byed do/ /gal te sring mor byas na/ rnam thos la 'gran par 'gyur ro/ /gal te chung mar byas na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spyod dag la rtser
'jug par byed do/ /lha mo dpal la bdug la gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs na/ lha mo chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs
kyis mdun na 'dug cing / nor gyi phung po chen po 'bul bar byed de/ nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam thos kyi bu la bdug
na| gser srang stong sbyin par byed do/ /nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na/ gser gyi dod tse stong sbyin par byed do/ /tshal gseb tu
bdugs na/ tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / rdzas dang / sman thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug go /ri rnams
la bdugs na/ rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnams su bdugs na/ grong khyer kun tu yams
kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'brog
tu bdugs na/ rkun mo dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / dred dang / dom gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi
'gyur zhing / ri dwags gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /
sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa tsan+dan gyi bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// //de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi
rgyal po'i gsang sngags sgrub pa ni/ nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni/ bsod
nams kyi phung po rnam par 'phel lo/ /lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur zhing /
rig sngags 'chang gis the tshom mi bya'o/ /dpral ba'i steng du thig le byed pa ni/ rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal shing shel ltar dag pa mdog
dkar ba dri zhim pa dang / glang po che'i bya ba dang / dpral ba dang / ba lang gi gnas ltar skyon med cing mnyam par mthun la shin tu dul ba/ ded dpon gcig pu'i nor bur gyur zhing
