gsang sngags 'bum bzlas pas legs par sgrub pa/ gser dang / gos ltar kun tu 'bar ba ni/ thig le yin no/ /smin mtshams kyi bar dbral ba na shin tu phra ba rtag tu rtag par
mdzes pa ni/ zla ba nya ba mkha' la 'gro ba lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na gsal ba ni/ rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zla ba dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khro gyi dbus na lha rnams
kyi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na ni/ 'jig rten gyi rgyal po gdugs gcig pa ltar 'bar ba yin/ /'jig rten gyi nang na gdugs gcig pa bde
bar gshegs pa ltar shin tu dul ba yin la/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyud ltar sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du nor bu mchog rnam par
dag pa ni/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gcig pu ltar mchog dang / rab mchog sems can
thams cad kyi don du sbyin par byed de/ de ltar thig le nor bu'i mthu ni/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / sum
cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po dbang po dbang du 'gyur bar rjes su 'gro ba dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dod par gyur pa
thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni/ nam mkha' la skar ma ltar dbral bar rtag tu dbang du gyur pa yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu 'dud la mes
mi 'tshig /chus mi khyer zhing / lus la dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / byad mi bzad pa dang / ngan sngags dang / sdang ba'i rnam pas mi tshugs par 'gyur te/
nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rims dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / rlung dang / klad nad chen po la thig le byas pa lta bur mod la
de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can btson du bzung ba 'am/ chad pas bcad pa 'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar bar 'gyur
ro| |smin mtshams dpral bar thig le lta bu byas na/ de'i mod la gnod sbyin stong dang / srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon brgya stong rnams lus la 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing / glang
po che dang / ri dwags kyi bdag po'i khyu dang / chom rkun dang / shod kyi lam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri sul dang / dam grog dang / glog dang / glang dang / sbrul dang / sdang 'jigs kyi 'jigs pa
thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / 'thab mo dang / tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar
'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang yin pa dang / thig le yang byas nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na/ bdag
nyid gcig pus dpung tshogs yan lag bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa byas par 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad
'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /thig le byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas nye bar 'khod do/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchod
gnas su 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang / yan lag dag tu thig le byas na/ thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing reg pa tsam
gyis dbang du 'gyur la/ don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ril bu dag ni khar bcug nas/ /lhan cig 'dug la smras na ni/ /thams cad dbang du
'ong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang / /rgyal rigs dang ni dmangs rigs nyid/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med dang / /khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang
rung / /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /kun tu mdag pa'i las rnams byed/ /ril bu zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /nad rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig /gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi
rims/ /gang dag khongs skem nad kyis nyams/ /gang zhig rtag pa'i rims kyis btab/ /gang du 'thab mo 'byung ba dang / /de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can/ /bdag la grib gnon
gzhan grib gnon/ /skem byed skem pa brjed byed dang / /gang zhig gdon gzhan mi bzad pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni kun tu spyod/ /sngon gyi las ni mi bzad pa/ /de kun skad cig tsam
gyis 'jig /ril bus khrus byas tsam gyis ni/ /'bras dang shu bar gyur rnams dang / /lhog pa dang ni rkang shu dang / /mtshan bar rdol dang me dbal dang / /khyi rngo mdze dang rkang pa'i nad//
mi bzad de rnams kun dang ni/ /gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin/ /byugs pa tsam gyi mod la ni/ /thams cad dug med zhi bar 'gyur/ /ril bu thams cad las byed pa/ /lha rdzas shi ba sos par byen/
ril bu dag ni 'chang byed cing / /thig le dag ni byas pa yis/ /thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thob/ /thams cad du ni nor dag 'du/ /dpal 'dod pa ni dpal thob cing / /'bru 'dod 'bru yi phung po
'phel| |lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing / /klu rnams kyang ni dga' dang bcas/ /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / /'byung
po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas/ /rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing / /thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'khod/ /'khod kun bran byed ci bya zer/ /gang zhig ril bu de dag bsten/ /ril bu
thig le rtag byed la/ /de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /de nyid rig la rtag tu ni/ /mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad/ /bsod
nams phung po stong dag ni/ /nyi ma re re gsog par byed/ /'jig rten pa yi bde spyad cing / /'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde/ /tshe brje ba ni 'phos nas su/ /bde ba can du mod la 'gro/ /gang dang
gang du skye ba ni/ /tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing / /g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du/ /dus kun tu ni srung ba dang //
skyob dang sbed dang srung bar byed/ /gang zhig bu ni med pa dang / /bud med bu ni 'dod pa la/ /ril bu gcig cig sbyar nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gsang
sngags ni/ /mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi ngor/ /'bum ni tshang bar bzlas nas su/ /zla ba nya ste bco lnga la/ /skyes pa bud med khrus bya zhing / /yan lag yan lag thig le bya/ /dkon
mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing / /bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed/ /srung ba'i cho ga byas nas su/ /gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bshams/ /bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan nas
su| |gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya/ /byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas/ /snying rje sems can sdug par byed/ /bsam pa dag cing nges pa dang / /bla mar rtag tu gus par bya/ /me tog
sna tshogs rab dgang zhing / /spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang / /du rus tsan+dan sa la ki/ lha yi bdug pas bdug bya zhing / /bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni/ /ril bu legs sbyar bza' bar
bya| |gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni/ /btung dang kha zas bza' bar bya/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya/ /byams mdzad de yi
zhabs drung du/ /mtshan mo nyal dang nang par ni/ /mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing / /
mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad/ /bud med de ni bu bskyed cing / /gzugs bzang mchog tu blta na sdug/ stobs ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ /lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro/ /chos ldan
mkhas shing gsal ba dang / /tshe ring dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur/ /dpa' bo dgra las rgyal ba dang / /sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ /yang na dran pa'i blo bskyed par 'dod pas thos pa la
brten nas 'dug cing / rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ril bu bdun bcug ste zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
brjod byas nas 'jam tsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha zas bza' bar bya/ zhag bdun gyis thos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ bstan bcos thams cad dang / chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang /

snyan ngag dang / brda sprod pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde

dang / chos mngon pa dang / rtsis dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thams cad kha ton du lobs par 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba

byas na| stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur te/ glang po che khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig tsam sbyar ba byas na/ lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs
la skra lcang lo 'khyil shing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro lo gcig tu sbyar na/ lha'i sman bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing
nam mkha'i steng du lha rnams dang lhan cig mthun par 'gyur la/ brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar
byed la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed/ gzi brjid shin tu gsal
ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la the tshom mi bya'o/ /las thams cad sgrub pa'i thig le dang / ril bu sgrub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas mi snang bar bya
ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub pa bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na nyid yin no/ /sman dngul chu dang /

brah+mA k+Shi ra dang / su par+Na k+Shi ra dang / shel sngo sangs dang / ku k+Shi dang / su gan+d+hi dang / kiM kuSh+Tha skyon med pa dang / ut+pa la bzang po dang / pad+ma k+Sha dang / gu gul dang / phe lu pa ta tra dang / gur gum
dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang bcas pa dang / spang spos dang / shi ri Sha'i me tog dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang bcas pa bsres nas zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi
gsang ba'i rigs kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis shin tu brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu
dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig pa la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ de'i tshe gsang sngags bcu po so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas
brjod byas nas sman don yod par rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag la grib ma la bskam
par bya'o/ /yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe thams cad du bsgrubs pa'i
dgos pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas lus legs par khrus byas la spos chus byugs te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog
'di yungs mar gyis sbrus la rang gi lus la byugs par bya ste/ lan gcig bskus pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/ gnas gsang bar bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/
gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par 'gyur/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por
'gyur zhing de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rjes su
'jug par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug la klu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun du 'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing /
las su bya ba dang dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la/ de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /sman la
siM ha dzi hwA dang / ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang / rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs ston par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji
ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel
ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do/ /spos kyi til mar dang sbus nas byin pa dang rkang pa la bskus na/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro
bar 'gyur la gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhing nam yang phyi ras la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na/ gang dang gang la
lag pa reg pa de 'ong bar 'gyur la sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ mthong bar mi

'gyur zhing / don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do/ /don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /bud med gang dang phrad na/ sus kyang mi mthong la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang sus

kyang mi shes so/ /khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / bzhad gad byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs na/ bya ba thams cad byed la/ lus ni/ sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /bum pa la byugs nas chus

bkad na/ chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni/ mi mngon no/ /gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus su byugs na/ chu de gang bar snang la gzhong pa de ni/ mi snang ngo / /bdag nyid la byugs nas bum pa chus bkang ba

lag na thogs na/ bum pa las chu 'byung ba ni/ snang la/ mi de'i lus ni/ mi snang ngo / /mig la bskus nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na/ mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgra ni/ thos shing / rang gi lus ni/
mi mngon no/ /gnas su gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs na/ rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo / /su yang rung ba'i mig la bskus la lus la yang bskus na/ de dag thams cad mi
mthong bar 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang bar 'gyur la khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kun la bskus nas mdzod chen po'i nang du zhugs na/
mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ gser dang / dngul dang / phra men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / rdo rje dang /
bai DUR+ya dang / margad dang / mthong ka dang / gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub gang yang rung ba nyid 'dod na/ thams cad blangs nas song na sus kyang mi
mthong la gang dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du khrus ma byas pa de srid du rang mi mngon la/ khrus byas na thad du mthong ngo / /rig sngags 'chang bud med
kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pa gtsang mar khrus bya'o/ /de nas spos chus khrus bya 'o/ /de'i 'og tu ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o/ /yang gur gum gyis khrus bya 'o/ /de'i 'og
tu ba'i rnam lngas khrus bya 'o/ /de'i 'og tu ba'i til mar dang lhan gcig bsres pa des lus bsku bar bya 'o/ /de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i nu zho dang sbyar bas mig
la bskus la/ de nas ril bu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdag par bya 'o/ /de nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la rgyal
po'i pho brang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur te/ lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi 'am/
nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ yongs su spyod par byed kyang sus kyang mi shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na sus
glags mi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar du rang gi lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /phug tu 'jug na/ lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs la phug tu zhugs na phug
gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyi/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji lta ji ltar las su bya ba de lta de ltar gyis shig /chu'i nang du zhugs na/ ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa bzhin
chus mi brlan la/ chus gos par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /me'i nang du zhugs na/ mes lus la mi reg cing tsan+dan ltar bsil bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na/ gnas
na 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong gi ji ltar rang gis yid la las su bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig /mi snang bar bya ba ril bu'i sgrub pa'i
cho ga'o/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ las thams cad kyi
don sgrub par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/ rig sngags thams cad
kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs
par rgyal ba sbyin pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa nyid dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshon cha'i dra ba thams cad las sgrol bar byed pa/ grub pa
don yod pa/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub/ phyag rgya 'pho
ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa las thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub kyang 'grub ste/ 'di la the tshom med do/ /bde ba thams cad rtag tu rab
tu sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / lha dang / klu thams cad spyan 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams
cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / bdud dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon mi bzad pa dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad
thams cad du sgrol bar byed par grub pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus rtag tu tshar gcod par the tshom med do/ /rims thams cad rtag tu rab tu zhi bar
byed pa| nad thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dug thams cad gsod par byed pa/ 'phral du sreg blugs byin pa tsam gyis thams cad du rtag tu gnang chen po dang / thams cad
du thams cad du mthong na dga' ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar mchod par bya ba dang / thams cad du stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mthong ba yang sbyin par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu kun tu snang ba dang / dus thams cad kyi tshe las
thams cad la shin tu dga' ba dang / skye ba nas skye bar tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du bla ma la sri zhu che ba dang / thams cad du mchod par 'os pa'i bla ma'o/ /de
nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu yang srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar byed pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid kyis kyang dus rtag tu srung ba
dang / skyob pa dang / sba bar byed par the tshom med do/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams
kyis srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed cing / rtag tu legs par kha los bsgyur bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen
po dang / drag po dang / gzhon nu dang / nor bu bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / lngas rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog ste/ 'di rnams
kyis rtag tu srung ba dang / skyob par byed cing gnas te/ 'di la the tshom med do/ /me'i lha gzi brjid chen po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis
srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed cing / mchog tu mchod pa byed pas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg tsam 'di ni/ bya ba thams cad bla na med pa'i dngos
grub rnams la'o/ /'bras 'thug po che dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar dang / sbrad rtsi bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad mchog sbyin par 'gyur te/ bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dang / pad+ma'i chu ba dang / 'bras yos
dang / yungs kar dang / a ga ru dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas/ sa mya'i shing gi zhi ba'i me sbar te stong phrag brgyad tu sbyin sreg bya 'o/ /de nas 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar gnas te mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba thams cad kyi dngos grub tu yang
'gyur ro/ /yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du don yod pa thogs pa
med pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams thams cad 'gugs pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib
mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba la rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /
seng ldeng dang / nim pa'i shing gi yam shing gis 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / mar dang / lan tshwa dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/
bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon thams cad dang / gdug pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /
'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las sgrol bar byed do/ /mtshon cha thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba
dang / dgra thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dang / 'bras yos dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/
yul 'khor dang / ri brag dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs rnams su kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag gcig kho ra khor yug tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur
ro| |sems can thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams
cad thams cad du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gcan gzan gtum po thams cad dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad byams par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang /
yul 'khor dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba thams cad shis pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /ma taM ga dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang / klu shing gi me
tog dang / 'bras yos rnams bsres pas arga'i shing gi yam shing gi me sbar la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ char mi 'bab par byed pa la de nas klu chen
po rnams kyis char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de/ ji srid char pa 'bab par 'dod pa'i bar du'o/ /lo thog dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman gyi rdzas
dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /legs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams
cad kyis dga' ba chen por 'gyur zhing / dus dus su ji lta ba bzhin du char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do/ /ha cang char ches na/ de nyid kyi thal bas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin
sreg byas na/ ha cang char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /'bras yos dang / go la dang / yungs kar dang / gtum po'i sa bon mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na/ rlung dang
ser ba thams cad zlog par byed do/ /dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /rlung bcing ba la yungs kar dang / 'bras thug
po che'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur te/ ji srid du be raM b+ha'i rlung gi bar du bcings par 'gyur ro/ /klu
bcing ba la ni/ yungs kar dang / til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ lo bcu gnyis su klu bcings pa byas par 'gyur re/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la
ni| yungs kar mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog pa la ni/ kA ra bI ra'i
shing gi me sngar te nim pa'i 'dab ma dang / lan tshwa dang / phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams
cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du phyis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcing ba la dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug gis so/ /til
dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams
chen bo bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /log 'dren thams cad bcing ba la ni/ yungs kar nag po dang / til nag dang / sran ma dang / til dang mar sres pas
sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams bcing ba byas par
'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin 'byin pa la ni/ b+haM ga'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa dang / til mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin
po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed la sogs pa thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du nges par 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /yams dang /
nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dge legs thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze
dbang du byed pa la 'bras yos dang / arga'i yam shing mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs dbang
du byed pa la bu ram dang / mar dang / 'bras yos dang / arga'i 'dab mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /dmangs
rigs dbang du byed pa la myos byed kyi 'bras bu dang / dong ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ dmangs rigs thams cad du byed pa'i mchog 'grub bo/ /rje rigs
dbang du byed pa la mar rnam pa gsum gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rje rigs thams cad dbang du byed do/ /sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i
sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la chu'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag
brgyad byas na/ gzhon nu ma thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa la 'bru dang mar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'jigs
pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /nor dang 'bru 'phel bar byed pa la 'bru bdun mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin
sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ nor dang / 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug thob pa la yungs kar dang / mad+d+hAHdang / sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
byas na| dbang phyug chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /yul thob pa la tsha ba gsum mar dang / mad+d+hA dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ yul chen po thob par
'gyur ro/ /grong gi don du kA ra bI ra'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ grong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gter
gdon pa la ni/ pad+ma'i chu ba mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gter chen po so sor rnyed do/ /gnod sbyin spyan drang bar 'dod pas/ gu gul dang /
gtum po'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gnod sbyin rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar 'dug ste/ ci bsgo
ba byed cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can ma spyan drang bar 'dod pas 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar
gyis btags pa'i dri dang / pri yang ku'i sa kA ra bI ra'i shing yam shing gi me sbar nas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i gzugs can
ma 'ongs te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod par byed do/ /rnam pa gsum brjod par bya ste/ ma dang / chung ma dang / sring mo 'o/ /gal te ma yin na/ bu la zhen pas nor dang /
'bru dang / longs spyod chen po rnam par 'phel zhing phun sum tshogs par byed de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi 'bral bar kun tu gnas par byed do/ /gal te chung ma yin na/
rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba du mas rtse zhing longs spyod la yongs su spyod par byed de/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang /
byug ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod cing / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mal stan dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod
dang / bang ba dang bcas pa rnam par 'phel ba la yongs su spyod de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do/ /
gal te sring mo yin na/ de'i tshe rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod la yongs su spyod cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur
dang / rim gro byed do/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog pa la phub ma dang / lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis dpag tshad brgya stong phrag gi nang du dgra mi 'byung ste/ sbyin sreg
stong phrag brgyad byas na/ g.yul dang / 'khrug pa chen po las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma 'bab par byed pa la ri'i rtse mor sbrang rtsi dang / na le sham
dang / 'bras 'thug po che dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ nyin re re zhing nyi ma 'bab par byed de/ mchog thams cad rjes su stsol
bar byed cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dod pa tsam gyis bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byed cing nye bar gnas so/ /zla ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par
'dod pas gnas mthon por tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tshwa dang / lan tshwa dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na/ zla ba dang / rgyu skar
dang / skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par byed de/ 'dod pa dang / yid kyi shing rta dang / skal pa dang / dbang phyug thams cad cher 'phel ba rab tu sbyin no/ /ji srid 'tsho'i
bar du nye bar gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma re re zhing mthong bar 'dod na 'bab par byed do/ /lha dang / klu
dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / bud med dang / skyes
pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs thams cad 'gugs pa la til dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras
'thug po che dang / sman sna tshogs dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'gugs pa chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur te/
'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa 'khor du 'gyur te/ rtag tu de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur
la| ngag gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyis sam nor gyis kyang rung ste/ thams cad du bla ma gcig pur mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg gi
cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// //de nas mig 'phrul bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched
du las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi bde ba sbyin pa/ rtag tu dbul po rnams kyi bde ba thob par byed pa'o/ /de nas rtogs pa'i mod la 'bru mchog tu
'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma nyid du mchod par bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin zhing / longs spyod chen po 'phel ba dang / rgyal
po'i bde ba dang ldan pa dang / phyogs phyogs su rab mchog sbyin par byed do/ /gi waM dang / cu gang dang / ldong ros dang / mu zi dang / pad+ma ge sar dang /
ut+pa la sngon po dang / li kha ra dang / gur gum dang / rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang / gnyis dang / gser gyi 'dab ma stong phrag sbyar te phye ma shin tu zhib mor byas la legs
par bsgongs la ga pur dang / gla rtsi tsam gyis blangs la sngags kyi stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa/ mkhas pas rnam pa gsum du sbyar bar bya ste/ skye bos gang ba nyid la
lnga mnyam pa'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mig sman gyi snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mig la byug par bya ste/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i dbus su
nam mkha' la nye bar gnas par byed do/ /hUM yig gis mthong bar bya'o/ /nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do/ /gnas par byed do/ /nyal bar byed do/ /rgyug par byed
do| |bskus na/ lus la me 'bar bar mthong ste/ de ston par byed do/ /du ba'i rgyal mtshan ston par byed do/ /rkang pa'i mthil la kun tu byugs na/ chu bo dang / chu klung
chen po'i steng nas 'gro ste/ rkang pa la chus gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /me chen po 'bar ba'i nang du 'jug ste/ sreg par mi byed cing / ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang 'byi
bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phye mas phyogs bzhir nam mkha' kun tu gtor na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i char gyi rgyun ltung bar byed do/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal
med khang mthong bar byed do/ /lus mtha' dag la byug par bya zhing / skye bo'i mig sman bsku zhing / phye mas gtor nas ljongs chen po'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ de cung zad kyang
mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du rmongs pa chen po'i sgyu ma ston par byed de/ rgyal po dang / dmag sde chen po dang / drang srong gi gzugs dang / gser gyi bum pa
can dang / mi'i seng+ge dang / phag dang / dga' byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rol rnyed ma 'phrog pa dang / zla 'od mgo bo yongs su gtong ba ston par byed do/ /'joms pa dang /
gsod pa dang / srog 'dor ba ston par byed do/ /me tog gi char ram/ 'bras bu'i char ram/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / 'bru'i char ston par byed do/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
pa'i rnam 'gyur rnams ston par byed do/ /gzhal med khang chen po'i rnam pa rnams bsam pa tsam gyis ston par byed do/ /dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug na/ rnam par
'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa ya ma zung gzhal du med pa ston par byed do/ /bdag nyid kyi mgo bo la bskus nas mgrin pa tsam gyis dri za/ til mar bsgos
pa'i phye mas gtor bar bya zhing / mig sman gyis byug par bya/ phye mas lus mtha' dag la bdag par bya/ rkang pa la byug par bya ste/ dge 'dun phyi nang
du zhugs na/ yang dag par shes bzhin dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / zung tsam du mthong ngo / /de nas zhugs pa tsam gyis me'i khams su mthong bar byed do/ /
sems par mthong bar byed do// //nam mkha' la gnas par byed do/ /'chag par byed do/ /'dug par byed cing mal stan la rtog par byed do//
'ong bar byed cing / 'gro bar byed do/ /me tog 'bab par byed do/ /nam mkha' la rnga'i sgra ston par byed do/ /rig byed bzhi pa'i nang du shing arga'i 'o mas bsgos
nas byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do/ /lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do/ /ji lta ji ltar mid
la byed bzhin pa'i b+ha ra ta dang / dga' byed rnams mthong bar byed do/ /'khor chen po'i dbus su rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gar mkhan rnams su ston par byed do/ /
rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa'i dbus su lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa rnams su mthong bar byed do/ /gling gi dbang phyug 'khor los
bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sna tshogs pa dang / man+d+hA ta dang / yid ldan dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / rin chen 'od dang / drag pos 'od byin dang / mi bdag dang / mnga' bdag dang / tshong pa
dang / ded dpon dang / zhi ba dang / mche bzang dang / snying rje can dang / pad+ma dkar po la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig pa'i gar mkhan rnams su mthong ngo / /rin po che'i char
dang / gos kyi char dang / spud pa'i char dang / lhab lhub kyi char mthong bar byed do/ /me tog gi gzhal med khang dang / 'bras bu'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do/ /gzhal
med khang la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa mthong bar byed do/ /de ltar na mig sman dang / phye ma mthu chen po bsku ba dang / sbyor bas gzhal med khang dang / gar mkhan dang /
gzhal med khang mthong bar byed de/ ji srid sgra sgrog dang / 'jigs byed dang / bum pa dang / gzhal med khang mthong ba dang / ha nu ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar
byed pa dang / gar mkhan rmongs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do/ /ji srid bdud 'joms pa la sogs pa dmag sde sna tshogs pa'i mchog gi gzugs kyi
bar du mthong bar byed do/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po mthong bar byed do/ /mig sman dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba gsum tsam gyis dngos grub ni/ bsku ba dang / bklags
pa dang / yang dag par sbyar bas tshe'i dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro/ /sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa 'grub ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu
sbyor ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du 'grub par 'gyur/ sgrub pa'i dngos grub bla
na med pa'i cho ga rmongs pa chen po'i cho ga 'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug
tor gyi dngos grub dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid bla na med pa 'o/ /dang por sdig pa zad par byed pa de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam
par nyams par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sngags kyi dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub dang /
gzungs thob pa'i dngos grub rnams dang / sa bcu la rab tu 'jug par byed pa grub pa/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs de kho na nyid mthong ba rmad du byung ba/ byang chub
kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byed pa/ rdo rje gdan gyi gnas su yang dag par lhag par gnas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa/ bdud 'joms shing tshar
gcod pa/ bgegs thams cad lhung bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gnas mthong bar byed pa/ de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas
dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong pa 'o/ /de nas po Ta la ka'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
gnas| skad cig la mnar med pa'i gnas dang / mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas dang mnyam pa/
de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i gnas/ de bzhin du rdo rje snying po'i dge ba 'phel ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
kyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs dang / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gtso
bo gcig pur zhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po lta bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas thams cad
du son pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa'i gnas/ yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ re ba
phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i gnas/ thams cad du mchog sbyin pa po 'di ni/ byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gnas te/ sems can thams cad rtag tu sgrol
bar byed pa/ don yod pa'i gnas gsang zhing rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa bla na med pa'o/ /bsod nams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i gnas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ 'di ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po'i gnas/ chos kyi mdzod dang rtag tu mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzod/ mdzod chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi
mdzod la mkhas pa/ rtag tu pad+ma'i mdzod/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod/ rdo rje'i mdzod/ de bzhin du nor bu chen po nyid kyi mdzod/ rgya mtsho chen
po ltar zab pa/ mi g.yo ba/ mi 'gul ba/ zil gyis mi gnon pa'o/ /bdud dang / log par 'dren pa/ bgegs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang /
srin po thams cad kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis 'jug par mi nus so/ /de la mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnyed dka' zhing bla na med pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya ste/ ba byung
dang yang dag par ldan pa khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bya'o/ /yang na khru brgyad par bya ste/ de phyed dang gnyis kyi khru'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis tshad rnam par phye ste gdab par
bya'o| |gra bzhi mnyam par phye ba/ logs bzhi legs par rnam par phye ba/ shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu legs par bcag pa/ bsnyen la 'jam zhing brgyan pa/ sa gzhi bai DUR+ya'i
kha dog la dkyil 'khor mdzes pa thig gis char rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba/ skud pa la tshon sna lnga byin te dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gru bzhi par rnam
par dbye'o/ /khru gnyis kyi tshad kyi re khA lnga rnam par dbye'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kun nas rgyas pa bri bar bya ste/ dbus kyi
pad+ma'i ge sar la don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor bya ste/ pad+ma phyed kha bye ba'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du pad+ma la zhal gsum par bri bar bya ste/ bde ba'i gzugs dang mtshan gyis
brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi rnam pa 'bar ba'i snying po la khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri'o/ /gzhogs g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs
ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ dbu la 'od dpag med 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can no/ /gzhogs g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs
ral pa dang rgyan bcangs pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus dang dbu la pad+ma gtsug tor gyi khor yug tu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o/ /phyi rol tu tsam pa ka dang / bAR+Shi ka dang /
ut+pa la sngon po'i me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i gra bzhi'i gnas rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste/
go cha dang / ya lad bgos pa/ drag po'i gzugs can/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i snying po'i lus so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi re khA sngon ma la rdo rje dang / mdung
rtse gsum pa'i re khA 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /re khA rim par phye ba gnyis pa la me tog gi re khA bri bar bya'o/ /gsum pa la nor bu rin po che chen po'i skud pa
re khA bri bar bya'o/ /re khA bzhi pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/ /re khA lnga pa la kha khyer gyi rnam pa bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna tshogs pas
rnam par phye ba rnam par bkra ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rnams
su gnod sbyin chen po bzhi bya ste/ drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/ bum pa gang ba thogs pa/ skra brdzes pa/ rgyan
thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa'i cod pan can/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can ri bo'i gdan la gnas par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi re khA'i phyi rol tu
phreng sum 'gyur du bri bar bya'o/ /pad+ma dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bAR+Shi ka dang / a d+hi muk+ta ka rnams rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas
rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar byas nas shin tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu mkhas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan dang / rta babs bzhis
mdzes par byas pa/ khor yug tu mda' dang / tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re dang / dar dpyangs dang /
khor yug tu bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang / gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug dang / de bzhin du bdug pa'i snod bcu drug dang / gzhong pa bcu drug tu rab tu brjod do/ /kham por bcu
drug tu bshad pa dang / dri sna tshogs pa'i snod dang / lhung bzed bcu drug nyid dang / mchod yon gyi snod bcu drug dang / dngul gyi snod bzhi dang / dri'i phye ma rnams bzhag cing /
gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug bzhag nas pog phor bzhi'i nang du/ tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / pog dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing / de bzhin du sprik+ka dang /
sra rtsi pog dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / bo la dang / ga pur tsam dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi byug pa 'di nye bar gzhag par bya'o//
tsan+dan dang / gur gum dang / de bzhin du dze g+ha dang / pal+li ka'i phye ma rnams thams cad yang dag par sbyar ba 'dis phye mar sbyar bas bsgos pa'o/ /me tog sna
tshogs gcal du bkram zhing / ji ltar 'dod pa ji ltar stong pa dang / ji ltar thob pa'i me tog mdzes pa mngon par gtor bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu dri'i chus
gang ba'i bum pa ma reg pa dang / gser dang / dngul las byung ba'i snod gsar pa nyid dang / zangs dang / sa las byung ba'i mchog dang / dri sna tshogs sbyar bas dgang bar
bya'o| |bum pa dang / bkra shis bcing bar bya zhing / pi waM dang / gos bzang po dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /ring bsrel pad+ma'i steng du bzhag nas
bum pa dang / gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / gdu bu byas nas gzhag par bya'o/ /dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du snying po dang / nye ba'i snying
po nyid kyi gsang sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas so/ /de nas gtor ma'i las la mnyam par bzhag nas sna tshogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dkar po dang /
de bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i ro gzhag par bya'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs su phye ba'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa
dang / sna tshogs pa'i kha dog dang / ro nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i yul du rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni/ gtor mar brjod de/ 'byor pa'i gtor mar bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan
gdags te/ sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen po dang / sna tshogs pa'i lo ma sngon po'i phreng ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang / ji ltar rnyed pa'i mar dang / til mar gyis
kun nas bkang ba brgya rtsa brgyad do/ /bdag dngos grub 'dod pa rnams phye dang / la phug dang / dkar dang / la du dang / sran ma mud ga'i la du dang / 'bras bu rnams de bzhin
du log 'dren la gtor mar byin pas las thams cad bde blag tu 'grub bo/ /phye'i zan dang / zho'i nyid khu dang / lo ma sngon po nyid dang / gnod sbyin dang /srin po kun nas
phyogs bzhir gnas pa rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /zho'i zan dang / 'o ma yang ste/ 'di ni/ 'byung po'i gtor mar bshad do/ /lo ma'i gong bu dang / phye dang / 'bras
'thug po che'i zan dang / de bzhin du 'khur ba zlum po ste/ 'di ni/ phyogs bzhir yi dwags dang sha za rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /'bras 'thug po che dang / 'o
ma'i zan ni/ zla ba dang / nyi ma'i tshogs kyis lhan cig pa'i lha dang / rgyu skar rnams kyi gtor mar bya'o/ /rtag tu tsan+dan gyi chu dang / de bzhin du me tog dang / 'o ma'i zan ni/
mtshan mo'i lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste/ las kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o/ /'bru bdun mdzes pa chen po dang / shing snu ha mchog tu mdzes pa/ 'dras
A ma khu bskol ba mdzes pa dang / zho dang 'o ma so sor mnyam pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam pa bdun po sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par
bya'o| |sa kurga dang / rtsab mo dang / 'bras 'thug po che btsos pa'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di/ rlung lha'i gtor mar brjod de/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad dgyes par byed do/ /
zho dang / 'o ma bskol ba dang / 'bras 'thug po che dang / hwags dang bcas shing / bu ram dang bcas par ldan pa/ 'khur ba zlum po dang / mar gyis gang ba'i 'khur ba 'di ni/
klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi gtor mar brjod de/ las thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /'khur ba zlum po dang / ba byung lnga dang / pu shel tsa dang / ma la ya'i tsan+dan dang / 'bras 'thug po
che dang / zhabs bsil dang / mchod yon rnams bdud kyi dkyil 'khor la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /gur gum gyi chu dang / 'bras 'thug po che la dri bzang pos bsgos
te chu klung gi rgyal po la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /thams cad du las thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /rtswa dur ba'i chu dang / 'o ma dang / gtum pa'i sa bon btsos pa dang /
'bras 'thug po che ni/ tshangs pa'i srin po nyid dang / gsang ba pa rnams la gtor mar dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad rigs pas so/ /'di ni/ gtor mar brjod do/ /bgegs rnams
kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa la bgegs rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dga' bar 'gyur te/ the tshom med do/ /de'i phyir rig sngags 'chang mkhas pas thams cad legs par
bsgrub par bya'o/ /zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'o thug dang / bu ram dang / mar dang / li khar dang ldan pa 'dis bdag skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste/ tshe'i dngos
grub dang / de bzhin du rgyas pa dang / zhi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad zlog par byed do/ /'di ni/ gtor mar brjod de/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi bde ba thob pa'o/ /bya ba gang
yin pa de rnams la bdag gi gtor ma thun gsum du byas na/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags bde blag tu 'grub ste/ the tshom med do/ /de'i
bgegs thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / sngag ba rnams nam yang bar du gcod par mi nus te/ nam yang phyis sdig pa mi 'byung ngo / /rtag tu gtor ma rgyas pa thob par byed
cing / stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu byed bzhin pa'i rig sngags smra ba'i mkhas pa de bgegs rnams thams
cad kyis de nam du yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha zas sdang bar byed pa med do/ /nad med cing / rgyal po'i
dpal min med la/ skem byed dang / skem pa med la brjed byed dang / klu dang / gza' dang / rims med cing thams cad kyi tshe cung zad kyang med do/ /dug med cing sbyar ba'i
dug nyid kyang med la/ byad stems thams cad kyang nam yang mi yong ste/ kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag tu ring du 'bros par byed do/ /kun nas stobs nyid rgyas pa dang / de
bzhin du yang dga' ba dang / de bzhin du yang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / cho
ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par byed do/ /tshe ring du 'phel zhing / lha dang / mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha gang yin pa
yang dri yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de rnams thams cad kyi ji srid 'tsho'i bar du stobs dang / brtson 'grus 'phel bar byed par the tshom med do/ /de la dgra mi
'byung zhing nam du yang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo med de phyag rgya 'dzin pa nyid med kyang dkyil 'khor gyi mchog tu zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la'am/ yang na 'jug pa'i
dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam la de rnams kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/
de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ ri rab chen po dang mnyam
pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam
pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang
sngags rnams kyi dngos grub chen po so sor rnyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ris thun mong ba'i tshogs bsdus pa'i sar bgrod de phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /sum
cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas na gnas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /
sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po du ma rig pa 'dzin pa byed pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing rtag tu
rjes su 'brang ba rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /stobs chen po dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol
gnon pa dang / mdangs kyi rnam pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyi mod la bskal pa bye bar brgyud nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang /mtshams
med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba de thams cad yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /don
yod pa'i bya ba'i dngos grub so sor rnyed do/ /sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa'i dri ma dang / ser sna'i dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams
cad dga' ba dang / bla ma chen po mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par yang 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis rtag tu mchog stsol bar byed cing bla mar 'gyur ro/ /'chi 'phos te skye ba brjes pa na bsam pa nyid kyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma
las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bla mar shes par bya/ mchod par bya/ 'od dpag
med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob kyi bkod pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /de na rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des kyang dkyil 'khor
du 'jug pa byas nas kun nas mtshams bcing ba byas shing / srung ba'i chog ga byas la/ bdag bcing ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu kha shar du
phyogs te dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/ don yod pa pad+ma'i /tsug tor stong phrag brgyad bzlas bar bya'o/ /gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i
bdug spos dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i ge sar gyi dbus su tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ pad+ma dang zhags
pa thogs te bzhengs nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs par mdzad de rig sngags 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ rig sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis rig pa
'dzin pa grub bo/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rjes su zungs shig/ rig sngags 'chang / ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du 'dod pa'i mchog
thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi mngal du gnas pa'i skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ skye ba brjes nas thams cad du pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur
ro| |thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur zhing thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ |skye ba nas skye ba thams cad du don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang /
cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mtha' dag kha ton du byed do/ /don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa kha ton du kun tu gnas so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dbul bar bya/ a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ me tog ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya/ gshegs su gsol
bar bya ste/ des 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu byas nas rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /don yod pa'i gtsug tor pad+ma dri ma med
pa'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur zhing / pad+ma'i rigs kyi
'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe lo bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// //de nas de'i ras ris
bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pas ras khru bzhi pa byas nas sam/ yang na dar la bal tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ste/ lha'i gzugs mchog tu
mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa 'od zer gyis 'khor bar bya'o/ /ras ris sgrub pa ni/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga la tshon lhag ma min pa snod gsar par bzhag pas ri mo mkhan gtse'i
ma legs par khrus byas pas 'brir gzhug par bya'o/ /dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ pad+ma rgyas pas yongs su bskor ba bya ste/ khor yug tu
'od 'dom gang ba/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can phyag bzhi pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ zla ba tshes pas spras pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang ba/ mdung
rtse gsum 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnam par bkra ba'i pad+ma'i zhags pa 'chang ba/ phyag g.yon par pad+ma 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i steng du pad+ma gtsug tor bya'o/ /'dab ma phyed kha phye ba'i dbus
kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgul yan chad tsam cod pan 'chang ba/ dbu 'bar ba'i snying por yod par bri bar bya'o/ /phyag gcig ni/ dbugs 'byin
pa 'chang zhing / rin po che'i char 'bebs pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po can rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'chang ba bya'o/ /pad+ma'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po dga'

bo dang / nye dga' bo mgo bo dgu pa/ klus yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa thal mo 'chang zhing lus phyed par bya'o/ /nya dang / chu srin dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu shel dang / ngag pa dang /
ngur pa dang / shang shang te'us yang dag par brgyan pa'i kha khyer dang bcas pas spras pa'o/ /gzhogs g.yas su sgron ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba smad
de 'dzin pa 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can bya'o/ /g.yon du gos dkar mo gos dkar po 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can thal mo
smad de 'chang pa'o/ /gzhogs g.yas su khro gnyer can skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dkar sham ma gos dkar po 'chang ba byed do/ /g.yon du srin mo ral pa
gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyad pa/ drag mo drag tu rgod pa'i pho nya mo bya'o/ /bzhin khro gnyer can thams cad skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa/
thams cad pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bya'o/ /steng du tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang po rnams nam mkha' nas bcom ldan 'das dang / bcom
ldan 'das la mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o/ /'og tu pad+ma la gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams khrus bya ste skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o/ /rgyal po
chen po bzhi rnams bya ste/ drag po'i gzugs skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs te/ de rnams thams cad kyang pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ni/ bcom ldan
'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pad+ma'i gdan la rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bya ste/ pog phor dang / lag na me tog gi phor pa dang / bgrang phreng
'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la lta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o/ /de lta bu'i ras ris kyi bya ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang / ras ris dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi nang du gtogs
par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la sdug bsngal dang / sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ /thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad gcod
par 'gyur ro/ /nyes par byas pa thams cad 'joms par yang 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga las rnam par thar par byed do/ /mthong ba tsam gyi
mod la don yod pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo/ /sems can thams cad kyis kun tu bskor bar bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /dgongs pa thams cad legs par grub par byed
par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang gzugs byed pa dang / bkra shis dang / longs spyod dang /rigs dang / dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams dang / ska
pa bzang por byed pa dang / bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi bye brag 'phel ba dang / bsod nams bsags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phel ba dang / phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /mtho
ba tsam gyi mod la las su bya bar 'os pa'i bya ba thams cad byed do/ /de ltar ras ris mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yon tan gyi bye brag lhag par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /
zhes so| |ras ris sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// //de nas phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyi don yod pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba/ phyag rgya chen po
bla na med pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gis rgyas btab pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ don yod pa'i phyag rgya thams cad dang sgrub thabs thams cad kyi dngos grub
bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid dang / phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa/ phyag rgya bzung ba tsam gyis mnar med pa yang skem par byed pa/
dmyal ba pa rnams skem par byed pa ste/ gang gis bzung ba tsam la sogs pas dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar byed cing skem par byed do/ /dus gsum
gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs par 'gyur te/ the tshom med do/ /dus gsum
gyi rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i phyag gis rtag tu mchog sbyin pa dang / rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa dang / lha rnams kyis rtag tu
srung bar byed cing dga' ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams cad kyis srung bar byed cing kun nas yongs su skyong bar byed de/ thams
cad la cho ga bzhin du bdag nyid kyi snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du dge ba dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus nyid dang / mdangs kyang rab tu 'jug par byed cing / de bzhin du yang tshe
'phel lo/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams bzung bas bkra mi shis pa thams cad nyams par byed do/ /bgegs thams cad nyams par byed cing / bdud dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gdug pa'i gnod
sbyin rnam par nyams par byed do/ /gdug pa'i srin po dang / yi dwags thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa'i skad cig de la mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas shing mig 'byin par byed
do| |brgya byin dang / tshogs dang bcas pa'i gdug pa thams cad rab tu nyams par byed do/ /de'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa la lag pa'i thal mo pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma 'byung ba'i
gtsug tor don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas/ sdigs mdzub yongs su dkris la/ mthe bong gi sor mo dang / gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang la lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug ste ming med
dang / mthe'u chung lag pa'i nang du bcug nas rtag tu snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni/ don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi sngags dang phyag rgyar brjod
do| |de bzung ba tsam dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod pa nyid kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos
te/ char 'bab par byed do/ /me tog gi char dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub rnams mchod pa'i don du kun nas char 'bab bo/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po stong phrag bskyed do/ /phyag rgya de bzung pa tsam gyi skad cig de la phyag rgya gang+gA'i
klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba stong phrag bye ba'i grangs su bgrangs pa'i phyag rgya bcings par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya de bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
de bzhin du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis rlob bo/ /ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i phung por byas te dus gsum du
gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa so so so so la phul ba dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po thob pa'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings
pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tshom med do/ /zhes so/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las
g.yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyangs te rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan gcig brjod do/ /phyag rgya 'di ni/ don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi stobs spyan ras
gzigs kyi snying po zhes bya ste/ thams cad du las thams cad legs par thob par byed do/ /phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / spyan
ras gzigs don yod pa dri ma med pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin
par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'di bzung ba tsam dang / dang po bcings ba tsam
gyis ri rab chen po ltar 'gyur te/ bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis mi 'gul zhing mi g.yo la
zil gyis mi non yang 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad nas yongs su grol lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa
bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i drung du dge ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i lhag par 'dren pa 'di bcing bzhin pa de de
bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gang cung zad yod pa de mig gis gsal bar mthong ngo / /thams cad du rab tu 'ching zhing 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / phyag stong gi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang
yin pa dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i yangs pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dang / rta mgrin gyi
phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / mgrin sngon gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / gzhan phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang phyag rgya
'di gcig pu bcings pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur la/ kun tu bcings pa dang / mchod par yang 'gyur
ro| |'di ni/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gdugs gcig pur gyur pa ste/ ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma
lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bzhin du phyag rgya 'di ni/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phyag rgya'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ las thams cad la phyag rgya 'di sbyar na/ gang dang gang
la rab tu sbyar ba de thogs pa med par 'grub bo/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam pa tsam du bkug pa 'di ni/ gnas pa'i phyag
rgya 'di spyan drangs pa dang / 'bod pa dang / yang dag par bskul ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin nyid kyang yin te/ dam tshig dang / phyag byed pa dang / 'jug pa dang / bskor ba byed
pa nyid dang / gdan dang / phyogs bcings pa dang / dkyil 'khor bcings pa dang / mtshams bcings pa zhes pa dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan
srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / khrus dang / gos bgo ba dang / nye reg byed pa nyid dang / sbyin sreg dang / de bzhin du sngags bzlas pa dang / bdug pa dang / me
tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul ba'i las dang / de bzhin du gshegs su gsol ba nyid dang / de bzhin du 'gugs pa ste/ thams cad la
phyag rgya 'di bya'o/ /sa bcu gnon pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags bcu la yang phyag rgya 'di bya ste/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o//
khro bo'i rgyal po nyid dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags dang / gzhan la yang phyag rgya 'di dang / phyag rgya 'di'i snying po
dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags gzhan la yang gnas thams cad du
sbyar bar bya'o/ /zhes so/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// //phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa/ /phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan/ /bzang po gtso bo
chen po ste/ /mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no/ /phyag rgya gya nim bla na med/ 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/ /snying po de nyid gyur pa ste/ /phyag rgya dkyil chen
legs par bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub phyag rgya 'di/ /dus gsum gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyis 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /phyag rgya dus gsum
gshegs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rgyar btab/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa/ /thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil
gyi| |gsang nyid kun tu bzhugs pa yin/ /de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid/ /dngos grub bla med bshad par bya/ /oM a mo g+ha hri da ya/ pad+moSh+NI Sha A kaR+Sha ya/ sA d+ha
ya| b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ ma hA pad+me swAhA/ bskul ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM pad+moSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha maN+Da le hUM/ dkyil 'khor srung ba dang / phyogs
bcings ba dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / dri chab dang / chu dang / yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o/ /oM pad+ma shi kha re hUM/ spyi gtsug bcing ba yin te/
lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /oM pad+moShiNI Sha a mo g+ha dza le hUM/ khrus bya ba'i sngags te/ yungs kar dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /oM bi ma le shud+d+he
hUM| nye reg bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM saMts+tsha da ya pad+me hUM/ gos bgo ba'i sngags so/ /oM mi li mi li shud+d+he hUM/ lus yongs su sbyang ba'i sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas

brjod byas pas so/ /oM pad+mo Sh+NI Sha a mo g+ha a b+hi Shi ny+tsa A tam shud+d+he hUM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags te/ dre chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /oM pad+ma ka pa tse/ dr-i D+ha ban+d+ha
hUM dz+wa la swAhA/ go cha'i sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /oM badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na pad+me hUM/ byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /oM dz+wa la pad+me
d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ sa'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma a shra ya/ ru ha tsa la tsa la hUM/ gdan gyi sngags so/ /oM di bya pad+me maM/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM pad+ma a mo g+ha saM bar Ni
swAhA| bdug spos kyi sngags so/ /oM pad+ma gan+d+ha I shwa ri hUM/ byug spos kyi sngags so/ /oM pad+ma pra kar+N-i d+ha ra Ni sa me swAhA/ 'bras yos dang me tog
dgram pa'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma dza le su gan+d+ha ba ti hUM/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM shu kla ba re ra sa ya shud+d+he hUM/ lha bshos kyi sngags so/ /oM su ru su ru kum+b+ha
ba ti swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA pad+ma a shri ni sA d+ha ya hUM/ gtor ma zar gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /oM pha la bi shud+d+he pra ba ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngags so/ /oM bra ba ra
puSh+pe dza ya swAhA/ phreng ba'i sngags so/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la ya ra sa ra sa gr-i Ni hUM/ gtor ma bcos pa'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma dI pa ya dz+wa la hUM/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM sa ma pad+ma
b+hu ba Ne Shu sa ra hUM/ 'jug pa'i sngags so/ /oM pad+mo Sh+NI Sha a mo g+ha mu ni hUM/ phyag bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM tsa kra maN+Da le sa man+ta pad+me hUM/ bskor ba'i sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta

pra kir+Na pad+me saM b+ha ra hUM/ me tog dor ba'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma sa ma ya uSh+NA Shi ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta sA d+ha ra Ni d+har pad+me hUM phaT/ skyil
mo krung gi sngags so/ /oM a pa ri mi ta dz+wa la pad+me hUM/ bgrang phreng gi sngags so/ /oM sha ta sa ha sa dz+wa li ta pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta d+ha

ri sha pad+me hUM/ rmi lam gyi sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta rak+Sha ra Ni pad+me hUM/ srung ba'i sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta me ru dri D+ha s+thi ri hUM/ ra ba'i sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta/ dz+wa lA ma la gar+b+he dz+wa la dz+wa la

ma hA pad+ma dz+wa le hUM/ me'i sngags so/ /oM d+hu ru d+hu ru pra sa ra d+hu ri man+t+re swAhA/ sbyin sreg gi sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta pra dz+wa li te bud+d+he sa ma ya hUM/ sreg blugs kyi sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta

a ba lo ki te gu h+ye bA yu dza be pad+ma bi gi ni swAhA/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngags so/ /oM shu b+ha sha sta d+hA ri Ni pad+ma b+hu dze hUM/ mtshon cha'i sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta A kaR+Shi Ni pra sa ra gu

h+ye hUM| drang ba'i sngags so/ /na maHtri b+hu ba na I shwa rA ya/ lo ke shwa ra ya/ ma hA shwa rA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta gu h+ye/ A gats+tsha b+ha ga wA na d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA bi ri/

ma Ni ka na ka badzra bai DU R+ya ma ra ka ta pad+ma rA ga in+d+ra nI la ma hA muk+ti ka bi b+hu Shi ta sha ri ra ma hA pad+me b+hu dza/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ ba ra dA ba ra dA ya ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa

la| sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga wA na shI g+h+raM sa ma ya ma nu smar/ bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra na ma skr-i ta/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ lo ke

shwa ra| e hi b+ha ga wA na/ shI g+h+raM A gats+tsha/ sarba bid+ya maN+Da la/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ da ri sha na swa ra pa na/ bi bi d+ha te dza d+ha ra/ sa man+ta ra sh+mi/ dz+wa la gar+b+ha sha rI ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka

sau ma s+ya mu kha/ pa ri pU ra Na tsan+d+ra maN+Da la na maHtsaN+d+ra dza Ta d+ha ra| a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta d+ha ra/ ma hA bra h+maM be Sha d+ha ra/ tri lo tsa na a mo g+ha ba ra da/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA kA
ru Ni ka| pad+ma pA shA a ba lo ki te shu d+d+ha s+t+wa ba ra da ya ka /na mostu te swAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /rig sngags
'dis gu gul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o/ /bdugs pa tsam gyi mod nyid la 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi ston par mdzad cing mchog thams cad sbyin bar mdzad do/ /gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba
des kyang bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/ dge slong tshangs pa legs par spyod pa/ bsam pa dag pa/ dad pa can/ mos pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/
mod nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo bo yongs su dag pa mngon sum du ston par mdzad cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la/ don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub
sbyin par mdzad do/ /drag po la bdugs na/ gzugs mngon sum du mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa dang / dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /sred med
kyi bu la bdugs na/ gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing / tshig 'byin la yid la bsam pa thams cad mngon du phyogs bar byed/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ stobs dang / shug
dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par byed pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po la bdugs na/ nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du
gyur nas 'dug la las dang / bya ba thams cad grub par byed/ thams cad du dbang phyug chen po sgrub par byed do/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug la bdugs na/ bgegs dang
log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na/ spang pa dang / 'du ba dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad
bcings par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor bdugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du 'gyur te/ nye bar gnas la
'dod pa dang / bya ba thams cad byed do/ /nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi mar mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na/ nyi ma 'bab cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do//
zla ba nya la bdugs na/ zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa chen po sbyin par byed do/ /rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na/ nor bsal ba chen po sbyin par byed do/ /lha mo chen
mo dpal la la bdugs na/ dpal 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad la bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyis 'bab cing phyogs bcur 'bros so/ /zin
pa'am ma zin pa la 'dugs na/ mod la 'ong ngo / /dur khrod kyi mi ro la bdugs na/ ro langs ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /thod pa la bdugs na/ 'bab cing gar byed glu len
rgyug par byed cing rbod gtong byed do/ /rdo rje la bdugs na/ 'bar ro/ /mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na/ 'bab par byed do/ /'khor lo la bdugs na/ nam mkha'
la 'gro'o/ /thag pa la bdugs na/ sbrul bzhin 'khril bar byed/ rdza ma dang bum pa la bdugs na/ 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed
do| |lhung bzed la bdugs na/ rang nyid 'gro bar byed do/ /ral gri la bdugs na/ 'bab par byed cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gro bar byed do/ /dung la bdugs nas
bus na| sgra gang du grags pa de dag thams cad du 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug
pa dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa thams cad
zad par 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin bzhi ba la bdug cing gsang sngags kyang rjes su dran na/ rims nyin
bzhi pa ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i mtshor bdugs na/ mod nyid la char gyi rgyun chen po 'babs par byed do/ /char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na/
char ches pa gcod par byed do/ /sprin la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na/ grang lhags dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad gcod par byed la/ lo gcig gi bar du mtshams
chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /ri mthon po'i rtser bdugs na/ phyogs bzhi thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang /
dpag tshad stong gi bar du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / bcings par 'gyur la dpag tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid la bdugs
na| sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bu mo la bdugs na/ bag mar blangs par 'gyur ro/ /tshong
zong la bdugs na/ rin che bar lon par 'gyur ro/ /bang ba la bdugs na/ 'bru 'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro/ /btung ba'i gnas su bdugs na/ btung ba 'phel ba mang
por 'gyur ro/ /gos la bdugs na/ gos thob par 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs na/ gang la byin pa de dag bdag nyid dam nor gyi sgo
nas dbang du 'gyur ro/ /phreng ba la bdugs na/ gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gang gi mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing / ya mtshan byung ba dang /
'byung ba smra'o/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugs na/ rig sngags chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la/ dgos pa thams
cad sgrub par mdzad do/ /gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris pa la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin
zhing las byed par 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go /sbyor ba mo la bdugs na /sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas
ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go /'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma la bdugs na/ 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o/ /zhes smra na/
ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad dang / longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' bar 'gyur pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran
par 'gyur ro/ /dril bu la bdugs nas sgra dkrol na/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur la/ srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ khyim gyi nang du dkrol na/ 'byung po dang /
gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha bA sha pad+ma uSh+NI Sha/ ta ra ta ra/
a ba ta raM tu/ b+ha ban gats+tsha tu/ swa b+hA bA nAn /tu ru tu ru/ ma hA pad+ma b+hu dze swAhA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ bdug spos gu gul dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang
bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ thams cad du slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i
cho ga'o|| //de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod de lan gsum bskor ba byas
nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
rig sngags chen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so/ /gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod
pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi
ba'i slad du dzam+bu'i gling du bzhag lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo don
yod par sgrol ba/ dri ma med pa/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam
gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar drangs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags sgrub cing yongs su spyod pa la rim gro bgyi ba dang / rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa'i dngos
grub mchog stsol bar bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su bskang bar bgyi ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i mngon
sum du rig sngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha mo chen mo sgrol
ma| rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab kyi/ shod cig /de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

sngar don yod par sgrol ba/ dri ma med pa/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi snying po smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ tA thA ga tA nAM/ shAkya rA dzA ya a d+hiSh+Thi na na

maskr-i tA nAM/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na maHtA rA ya/ ma hA de bi/ oM tA ra Ni tA ra Ni tA re/ pad+ma bi

b+hu Shi ta tA re/ ma Ni ka na ka bi tsi tri ta mA la/ dza Ta ma ku Ta nan/ di ta pad+me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pad+ma pA sha b+hu dze/ a mo g+ha pA sha haste/ tA ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA sid+d+hi/ ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/
ma hA tA ra Ni ba ra de/ sA dA ya sA dA ya/ sid+d+he/ a mo g+ha ba ra de swAhA/ oM a mo g+ha pad+mi ni tA re swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM ma Ni tA re hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
ni| bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi snying po'i zhags pa cho ga zhib mo'i rig sngags
'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la mchog stsal ba rab tu stsal bar bgyi ba'i slad du rjes su stsal ba lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ du ru ka dang / gu gul dang / spr-ig ka gcig tu bgyis la/ gsang
sngags kyi snying po 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug
pa dang / g.yar drangs par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid
bzhin du dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad
bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi/ mchog
stsal bar bgyi/ bde legs dang / dge legs bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mchis nyal ba na bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis
bdag la bdugs shing / bdag gi snying po nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod dang / dran pa
tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongs su dag pa bstan cing / mngon sum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ byung
ba dang 'byung ba'i bka' mchid bgyi'o/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rig sngags
'chang de'i mdun du mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ sdang ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so
sor bzlog par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po sgrub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bkra shis kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal
bar bgyi/ cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bsod nams drang ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su
