de bas mi yis 'bad pa chen pos gzung / /dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal rigs dang / /dmangs rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am/ /btsun mo sras sam dpung gi gtso bo
'am| |skyes pa'am bud med khye'u dang bu mo dag /nor bu'i rgyal po rtag tu 'chang byed pa/ /de ni ston pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /chom rkun gyis ni mi slu zhing / /gnod
byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /'jigs pa mi bzad brgyad las thar/ /de la dug dang sbyar ba'i dug /sbyar dug drag pos mi tshugs shing / /de la byad kyis tshugs
mi 'gyur/ /gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yod/ /de la nad kyis mi tshugs shing / /na bas ma yin sdig pas min/ /pad+ma chu yis mi chags ltar/ /rtag tu chags pa med
par gnas/ /g.yul 'gyed pa yi nang na 'am/ /'thab bam 'gyed dam rtsod pa na/ /lan thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni/ /thob par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /de nas rdzas
ni bshad bya ste/ /sman ni bkra shis dang ldan pa/ /grub pa'i mtha' ste mchog tu gtsang / /'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs/ /a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa

la dang / shi ri sha'i me tog dang / a pa marga dang / me ru dang / na la da dang / chu srin gyi sen mo dang / ka na ka'i 'bras pu dang / tsan+dan gyi 'bras bu dang / pad+ma'i 'bras bu dang / rdo dreg

dang / ma da dang / btsod dang / sU ka ri dang / ma ka TI dang / dza ya dang / bi dza ya dang / pa ri phe la ba dang / ra sa dang / bI rA dang / d+h+ya ma ka ka dang / rgya spos dang / bu sA dang / a brta ka dang /

ru rta dang / bya gra na kha dang / pa ta tra dang / tra tsa dang / ka da ma bA rA dang / pri yang ku dang / gi wang dang / spri ka dang / smyig rkang dang / yungs kar dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang / e la dang /
ldong ros dang / gur gum dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / spang spos dang / na le sham dkar po dang / su ma dang / nye'u shing dang / shu ti dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsam pa ka ste/ da
bzhin rdzas ni de dag kun/ /su war+Na ni dkar pos sbyar/ /ril bu nam gcig tsam du ni/ /skyes bu mkhas pas bya ba yin/ /su war+Na sa ni bkab nas su/ /rdzas rnams bsres
nas sbyar bar bya/ /cha rnams 'phel bar bya ba ste/ /gla rtsi yis ni dri bskyed do/ /phye ma zhib mor btags nas su/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i chu sbyar nas/ /grib ma la ni bskam par
bya| |tshes brgyad dag nas brtsams nas ni/ /tshes ni bco lnga nya yi bar/ /nyin gcig bzhin du don yod pa'i/ /rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /
khro bo'i rgyal pos nyin gcig bzhin/ /lan bdun bar du dbang bskur ro/ /phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar yang bya/ /de nas tshes ni bco lnga ste/ /nya la chu dang yungs kar
dag /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas nor bu'i rgyal po ni/ /bzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/ /cha rnams ma nor legs par dbye/ /rgyar ni ko la'i
tshal du bya/ /shin tu 'jam la byi bdar legs/ /tshon rtsi sna tshogs mdzes pa dang / /dkyil 'khor mchog ni thig gdab po/ /sgo bzhi gdod cing gra bzhi gdod/ /kun
nas shin tu cha phye zhing / /dkyil 'khor snying po cha phye ba/ /tshad dang shin tu ldan par bya/ /pad+ma chen po bzhi dag dang / /de bzhin phyag dang spyan du bcas/ /don yod dngos
grub bri bar bya/ /nor bu rgyal po 'chang ba yis/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa bri bar bya/ /chu yi rgya mtsho'i nang du ni/ /las kyi rdo rje legs par bri/ /dkyil 'khor snying po dam pa la/ /
kun nas kha khyer rnam pa dang / /me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni/ /nor bu pad+ma legs par bri/ /sgo bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su/ /pad+ma zhags
pa mdung rtse gsum/ /rdo rje'i tshul mchog legs par bri/ /gra bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su/ /lag ni nor bu yod pa bri/ /pad+ma'i steng na rab tu gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'phan
phran dang / /bum pa rkang dang me tog dang / /bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan/ /gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag /ci bdog bungs cher gzhag par bya/ /kun tu mar me phreng ba dang / /
mchod yon chu dang a ga ru/ /tsan+dan bdug spos dbul bar bya/ /nor bu rgyal po 'jigs med pa/ /snod bzang legs par bkang nas su/ /rgya dar la yis kha g.yogs te/ /dkyil
'khor de nyid rig pas gzhag /dkyil 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang / /bzhag ste de nas las rdo rje/ /snod kyi steng du bzhag pa ni/ /nor bu dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/ /de nas
rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig po
'bum tshang bar bzlas brjod bya ste/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lag /g.yas dang ldan pas bzung nas ni/ /
chang pa dam du bsdam par bya/ /bsdams pa tsam gyi mod dag la/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro /nor bu dri ma med pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba bkod pa zhes bya ba
rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob la/ 'khor rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/ khung gi
sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag
rgya dag kha ton du lobs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'dud pa dag gis
gsong por smra bar byed/ thams cad du yang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba thob par 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag
bdun cu rtsa gnyis su ring bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad+ma'i 'khor lo mdun nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na/ sngar bstan pa'i yon tan gyi
khyad par rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rgyal po'i ril bu ni/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i las rnams sgrub pa yin no/ /tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran
par 'gyur/ nor bu'i rol bu 'di mthong btsam gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing blta bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
mngon du mthong zhing rtag tu blta bar 'gyur/ ril bu gang gi lus la yod pa de yang phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po mchod
rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di la som nyi dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa grangs dang bgrang ba'i
tshul gyis bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong
ba de dag thams cad dus gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang / 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus thams cad zad par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ bde 'gro'i lam la
gzhol bar 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ legs par sgrub pa mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/
mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya/ shin tu gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i bsam pa 'bad pas sbyar bar bya/ rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongs su btang nas
btsal bar bya zhing / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yongs su btsal bar bya ba yin na/ phyi rol gyi dngos po nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / gos dang /
rgyan rnams yongs su btang nas yongs su btsal bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ srog gtang bar bya'o/ de gtang bar mi bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i rnam
par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba sgrub pa 'di brtsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o/ /'dis dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
byed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing
nam yang ngan 'gro log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nor bu'i ril bu sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yangs pa'i dkyil
'khor chen po don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags
dang | dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i mthu des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang
ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad/ bklags pas grub pa/ rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba thams cad
du nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi ngal ba 'bras bu med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ /ngal ba dang / dub pa dang / 'bad pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga
'bras bu med par mi 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyud dad pa dang / gus pa dang / gsang chen dang / gsang bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/ dngos
grub med par mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ gsang sngags sgrub pa ni/ shin tu gsang bar bya zhing legs par smyung ba byas la 'bad par bya/ kha zas ngan pa spang bar
bya| gos ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa yang yongs su spang bar bya/ mi srun pa dang / mi bden pa dang / phra ma dang / sems can sun 'byin par byed pa dang / gsang sngags
rku ba dang / cho ga zhib mo brku bar bya ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rku bar byed pa de dag gi rtogs pa ni/ gang na yang med de/ dus gsum gyi mgon pos smad cing
byang chub sems dpas kyang smad la/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smad pa yin no/ /sems can sdong dum bsregs pa 'di/
gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /rtag tu smad par bya ba yin/ /lha rnams kyis ni yongs su btang / /ma rungs pas ni bdud kyis zos/ /ma rungs
pas ni bgegs kyis zos/ /bslab gzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang / /mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin pa/ /de la dngos grub ji ltar 'byung / /de la skyob pa gang yang med//
mgon med kun tu smad pa yin/ /de bas de la dngos grub ni/ /chung ngu'ang med la nyes pa yis/ /gsang sngags dang ni sman mi 'grub/ /nyes pa de dag rang gis byas/ /gzhan
yang ma rungs byed pa yin/ /de bas sems can mkhas la sbyin/ /slob pa 'dod cing yon tan dga'/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas/ /sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/
de yi lag tu sbyin bya ste/ /de yi dngos grub bla na med/ /gsang ba 'di ni/ shin tu gsang ba yin te/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba de yang rig sngags 'chang rnams
kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya bsgrub sla ste/ bklags pas 'grub pa de bzhin du sman nor bu 'di la rtag tu 'jug cing dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid ra
tu ston par byed pa yin no/ /rig sngags 'chang ni bdag nyid kyis/ /mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub bya ba/ /rig sngags 'chang ni gtsang ma yis/ /khrus byas gos gtsang gyon byed la/ /'dir
ni nyin zhag smyung ba dang / /dad dang gus pas mchod pa bya/ /don yod 'khor lo sgrub byed pas/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa sgrub/ /sman spri ka dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / a ga

ru dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / de bzhin du gi'u wang dang / ldong ros dang / tsam pa ka dang / su ma na ste/ de bzhin cha ni mnyam sbyar te//
phye ma dag tu byas nas ni/ /de nas don yod rgyal po yis/ /tshes brgyad nas ni bco lnga'i bar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
nas dbang bskur ro/ /de'i 'og tu cha lngar bya ste/ mig bsku ba dang / ril bu dang / phye ma dang / til mar tshos pa dang / kha gdong bkru zhing khrus bya'o/ /mig sman ni/ so'u byi re
dang lhan cig sbrus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /ril bu ni/ sbrang rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig spru'o/ /phye ma ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i
me tog dang lhan cig sbru'o/ /til mar btsos pa ni/ brah+ma ti la ste/ shing pa la sha'i mar dang lhan cig sbru'o/ /kha gdong bkru ba ni/ tsan+dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig
spru zhing / su ma na dang / gur gum dang / spos chus lhan cig bkrus la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas gcig tu bkrus te dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor
brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la de nas so sor dar
gyis kha bcad de dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bzhag la don yod pa'i rgyal po brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur
bar bya/ dbang bskur bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor snying por ni/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste/ /bdug spos
lnga dag dbul bya ba/ /a ga ru dang tsan+dan dang / /spri ka gu gul du ru ka/ mchod yon snod ni lnga dbul zhing / /gtor ma lnga ni da gang bya ste/ /ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis
dgang / /ro ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i/ /gtor ma cha lnga dbul bar bya/ /kun tu phreng ba nyi shu dang / /mar me nyi shu lnga dag dang / /spos kyi phye ma lnga dag dang / /spos kyi
cha lngar phye bas byug/ 'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags/ /tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes par bya/ /gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi/ /bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga/ /rin po che ni lnga gzhug
go/ sgo bzhi gra bzhir bum pa brgyad/ /rgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid/ /dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras yos dang / /yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram/ /slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni//
gos dang snod dang yon gyis so/ /thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ltar/ /ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas su/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
gshegs par gsol/ /de nas las rnams bya ba ni/ /ji ltar yid la sna tshogs bya/ /don yod chen po'i gzhal med khang / /rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gsang / /de nyid
dngos grub bsgrub sla ba/ /de bzhin nor bu sman sngags so/ /don 'di shin tu bkra shis so/ /mkhas pa mi yis bya ba yin/ /phra ma'i tshig kyang mi bsten te/ /brdzun ni
nam yang smra mi bya/ /'di ni grub pa'i de nyid de/ /de la 'grub pa the tshom med/ /'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/ /kun nas gru bzhi lham pa ste/ /gra bzhi cha ni
legs par dbye/ /ko la'i tshad de legs pa dang / /sna tshogs tshon gyi thig skud kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab bo/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying por ni//
'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya/ /dbus kyi lte bar pad+mo yi/ /'khor lo gsal ba bri bar bya/ /pad+ma'i snying po gser dang ni/ /dngul lam tsan+dan las byas
pa| |'bar ba 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs/ /'khor lo kun tu rtsibs dang ni/ /mu khyud dag gis cha dbye'o/ /dkyil 'khor snying po'i gra rnams der/ /lha yi dbang po
tshangs pa dang / /khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po bri/ /kun tu kha khyer rnam pa dang / /pad+ma phreng ba rnams bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni/ /rtags dang phyag rgya rnams
bri ste| |rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum/ /ral gri zhags pa tho ba dang / /gshin rje be con pad+ma gdugs/ /dbyug to mnga' bo che rnams so/ /gra rnams kun tu phreng ba dang //
me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dgram/ /sgo sgo der ni dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha ste gshin rje chu lha dang / /lus ngan dang ni gzhon nu bri/ /dkyil 'khor gra bzhi rnams su ni//
rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ go cha legs par bgos pa dang / /khro bor lta ba 'jigs byed bri/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos pa rnams//
legs par yongs su rdzogs par ni/ /rig sngags ji bzhin bstan pa yin/ /de nas legs par khrus byas la/ /gos gtsang bgos pa 'jigs med pas/ /sman mchog
bzung ste las bya'o/ /rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang / /sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam sprul pa/ /gang gis ngan 'gro thar 'gyur ba/ /sems can kun la bstan par bya/ /rtag tu dga'
dang dad pa dang / /gus pa de nyid thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang gis sgrub pa'i mchog/ dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas la
rdzas kyi dri chab gtsang ma don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ /tsan+dan gyi chu la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas skra yan chad tsam byugs la tshod zin
par bskus nas kha gdong bkru bar bya'o/ /mig sman la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bskus na/ mig bzang bar 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod
byas nas bdag nyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ro/ /de bzhin du til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas skra yan chad bsku ba dang / tshod zin par bsku ba dang /
lus rkang mthil yan chad bsku'o/ /yi ge gcig po yid la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i sgo'am/ skye bo'i nang ngam/ 'dus
pa chen po'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang phrad pa'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang /
kha dog tu mthong zhing sa'i steng nas rkang pa khru gang tsam gyis spags te 'dug la/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dad pa de lta de ltar gzugs
rnams ston par byed de/ rgyal po'am/ 'khor los bsgyur pa'am/ mi'i seng+ge'am/ phag gam/ sred med kyi bur ston pa'am/ tshangs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
dbang po'am/ dbang phyug chen po mig gsum pa'am/ gzhon nu'am/ chu lha'am/ gshin rje'am/ rnam thos kyi bu'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi'am/
nag po chen po'am/ dga' byed dbang phyug gam/ ser skya'am/ gsang ba pa'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu'am/ gang ba bzang po'am/
stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung lha'am/ drang srong nyid de ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do/ /me
tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do/ /de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na/ de sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs su
snang zhing gzhal med khang gi rnam pa dag kyang ston par byed do/ /ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid la byas pa de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed do/ /'khor
tshogs pa'am/ dgon pa'am/ 'chags dag kyang sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogs su ston par byed do/ /'gron po 'brog gi nang du phyin pa nyam
thag pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ chu med pa/ dgon par mgon med pa/ sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med par
gyur pa/ skyo ba pa med pa/ dpung gnyen med par gyur pa na de la rig sngags 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bya/ phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ri mo
bris la ril bu la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go /yungs kar la til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos
brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dbang bskur nas khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya bas phyag rgya bcings la sa la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas
ba tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung
bar 'gyur/ phye ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang / khang bzang 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyim gyi gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / lo legs pa
dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyo tshong dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / rta dang / glang po'i gnas dag
'byung bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / tshong pa dang / khyim dang / khang pa bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsam pa de srid du 'dug go /chu dang yungs
kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag
bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ nges pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer phyogs bzhi
kun tu gtor na/ gtor ba tsam gyi mod la 'obs bcad cing ra ba kha khyer gyis bskor la grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer mnan
pa'am| gtse bar sus kyang mi nus so/ /mtshan mor dri'i til mar de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas chang ba gang me'i nang du
gtor| chang ba gang phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na/ kun nas mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro/ /gtsug lag khang ngam/
dgon pa'am/ ri'am/ phug gam/ 'chag sa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na/ mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur /grong khyer
gyi sgor yungs kar gtor na/ gtor ba tsam gyi mod la dgra thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na phyir rgol ba dang / pha
rol gyi dmag tshogs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ tshul gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na/ 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ thams cad phan
tshun ngo mi shes nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'bros par byed do/ /dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na/ mtshon cha thams cad dang / 'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad
mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyur ro/ /zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na/ 'gyed zla gtso bo de gcer bur 'gyur ro/ /dgra'i steng du gtor na/ me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/
de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum snyed byed do/ /de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa spos
kyis lus bskus pa des yungs kar dang / til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gtor
bar bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur nas phyag rgya bcas pa'i lag pas ril bu spyi bor bzhag la phye mas gdab par bya/ til mar gyi rgyal
pos rkang pa la byug par bya/ don yod pa'i rgyal po lan gcig dran par bya ste/ yongs su sbyang pa'i las lhan cig bya ba legs par byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs g.yo ste gar dga' bar 'gro la/ gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro/ lha'i steng du gtor na/ lha lha'i gnas nas 'pho
zhing gar dga' ba der 'gro'o/ /phye mas lha'i steng du gtor na/ khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya ba mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /til mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod byas la bdag nyid kyi pus mo dang byin pa la bskus na/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rkang mthil la bskus na sa'i steng na rkang pa sor bzhi tsam mi
reg go /rdo'i steng du rkang pa bzhag pa dang / rkang rjes byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu bzhag pa'i rkub la bskus na/ sor bzhi tsam gyi tshang du nam mkha'
la 'dug go /yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mes sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis sbrus
pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas mig la bskus na/ mig gsum ston cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do/ /thal bas lus la byugs na/
tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to/ /shing yal sha dang / par+Na sha bsres pas lus la byugs na/ sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / shugs dang / gzugs su ston to/ /til mar chen pos khar bskus la
thal bas dpral bar thig le byas na/ gzhon nu'i gzugs su ston to/ /yungs kar gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar chen po byugs pas bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad

bzlas brjod bya/ phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur la/ de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bzhag /de nas las thams cad byed de/ nam mkha' la
gtor na/ nor bu dang / rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i tshe nam mkha' la gtor na/ me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du nam mkha' la

gtor na/ 'bras bu dang / nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs pa ston to/ /tshal gyi nang du gtor na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ston to/ /ri phug tu gtor na/ rdzas dang / sman sna tshogs ston to/ /mchod rten
rnying pa'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas su gtor na/ yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang zhing rdzogs pa gang ba bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to/ /grong khyer stong par gtor
na| 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yul gyi rgyal po dang / slas dang / bkrabs pa dang /
mdun na 'don pa dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag ston to/ /yang khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya bas gtor na/ dpung gi
tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ston to/ /dur khrod kyi nang du gtor na/ shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang du sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i
skyes gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za'am/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ bya'am/ nya'am/
rus sbal gyi rigs su skyes pa'am/ lha'i 'jig rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de'i rus pa'am/ thod pa la tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang du skyes/
pa de'i gtam yang smra'o/ /gang dang gang gi skyes gnas su skyes pa de thams cad smra la thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o/ /yungs kar des kyang rus gong 'brel
ba'am| shi ba'i ro'am/ rus pa 'thor ba la bab na/ bab pa tsam gyi mod la sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zong bkram pa'i nang du gtor na/ thams cad mi mngon par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la gtor na/ skar ma rnams mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /skye
bo mang po'i nang du gtor na/ thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa'i nang du gtor na/ thams cad bro rdung bar byed do/ /dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor na/ dge slong
thams cad bsam gtan 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor na/ rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na/ thams
cad bong bu dang / wa dang / khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ma'i sgor gtor na/ sbyor ma thams cad 'bar la ma he'i gzugs can du snang ngo / /shi ba'i steng du
gtor na/ bro rdung bar byed do/ /thod pa'i steng du gtor na/ bro rdung bar byed cing rgyug la phan tshun rgyug par byed do/ /lam gyi bzhir mdor gtor na/ gnod sbyin dang /
srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la ji srid 'tsho'i dbang du gyur nas 'khod do/ /nyin gcig bzhin bdag nyid la gtor na/
mchod pa chen po'i gnas su 'gyur te/ gzhan yang rang gi blo rnams kyis las 'bum snyed byed do/ /don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma
lta bu'i cho ga'o// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhi ba mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ de nas de'i phyir gdugs
pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang / phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur du ston to/ /rdo
rje'i sku dang stobs po che/ /rta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang / /de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i kha/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ldan gzugs po che/ /log 'dren rnams ni rab
'joms dang / /khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spyan/ /ki li'i ki li'i rgyal po che/ /khro bo 'chol ba stobs po che/ /de bzhin rdo rje sa 'og gzugs/ /rdo rje rtse mo de
nyid dang / /klu chen rab 'joms spyan yangs dang / /sog ma med ni 'dul ba dang / /de bzhin thigs khro khros chen dang / /de bzhin mche ba gtsigs mdzad dang / /
rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgrog /klu yi dbang po stobs kyis gnon/ /mgon po gos sngon gyon pa dang / /dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang / /'jig rten dbang phyug
pad+ma'i lte/ /phyag na pad+ma pad+ma byug /de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel dang / /de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten bla/ /sna tshogs gzugs te bzang po dang / /sred med
bu dang tshangs pa dang / /drag po daN+Di dbang phyug dang / /nag po chen po gzhon nu dang / /gshin rje dang ni chu lha nyid/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /rgyu skar sgra gcan mjug
ring dang / /de bzhin gza' dang lha ma yin/ /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ /gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che/ /'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu/ /de bzhin yul skyong
mig mi bzang / /'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang / mi'u thung dang ni drang srong gzugs/ /nor bu bzang sras gang ba bzang / /sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang / /
rgyal po dang ni ded dpon dang / /tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang / /bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang / /dge sbyong stag dang seng+ge dang / /khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi
lha| |shing lha de bzhin lo tog lha/ /gang+gA sI ta ya mu na/ /zla ba skal ldan rus sbal nya/ /lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can/ /skal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang / /me tog rgya
rlabs chen po dang / /sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs/ /de ltar dgug pa bstan pa dang / /de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid/ /sbyin sreg dra ba 'di nyid kyis//
rgyu 'phrul rmad byung gsang sngags grub/ /rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub/ /don yod zhags pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de nyid dngos grub rab ston pa/ /mchod rten dgon
pa gtsug lag khang / /lha yi gnas dang de bzhin grong / /grong khyer nyid dang 'bab chu'i dong / /mtshe'u dang lteng ga chu bo dang / /rdzing dang de bzhin
char 'bab dang / /'brug sgrog dang ni glog 'gyur dang / /gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang / /dud pa'i phung po bde 'gyed dang / /skyes bu go cha gyon pa dang / /de bzhin
mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong / /khyu mthong grub pa mthong ba dang / /de nyid rmad du byung ba ste/ /rdzas nyung sbyar ba nyung gyur kyang / /de nyid dngos grub bla na med/ /sems can
rnams la phan 'tshal nas/ /bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad/ /rig sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub/ /dbul po rnams ni nor 'thob cing / /sdang
ba rnams ni byams par bgyid/ /mu stegs gzhan rnams dad par bgyid/ /mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid/ /gdul dka' rnams ni thar par 'tshal//
dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan 'thob/ /ting 'dzin bla na med pa 'thob/ /chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong / /sdig pa byed rnams sdig pa 'jig /mi rigs
byas rnams thar pa 'thob/ /mtshams med lnga rnams rnam dag don/ /dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin mchog /ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dul/ /ma
rgal ba rnams sgrol ba'i gru/ /thar pa'i lam du 'gro bar gnas/ /ma grol ngan 'gro kun las grol/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /lung ma bstan pa lung ston
byed| |skyon dang dri ma sdig pa rnams/ /thams cad mod la spong bgyid de/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /bklags pas grub pa bgyid pa lags/ /'jig rten
pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /don gyi dngos grub bla na med/ /gang dang gang du sbyor ba bgyid/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /yid la bsam pa 'grub par
'gyur| |'dir ni yid kyis rnam bsam pa/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang / /ji ltar ngo bo kun bsam pa/ /de ltar rnam 'phrul ston par bgyi/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar
sbyar mi 'tshal/ /smyung ba bgyi ba mi 'tshal te/ /cho ga ji bzhin dus ji bzhin/ /cho ga rig sngags rgyal po bzlas/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur cing / /legs
par khrus bgyis gos gtsang dag /bgos pa bden par smra ba dang / /bla ma la ni gus byed pa/ /rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas/ /sems can kun la brtse ba'i
mchog /sdom la gnas shing tshangs par spyod/ /chos ma yin pa spong byed pa/ /gal te de nyid grub 'dod na/ /sgog skya sha dang kun dong dang / /'dres dang za 'phro sbags
pa spang / /sems can ngan pa sun 'byin pa/ /rig sngags rku dang cho ga rku/ /chos sku gsang sngags rku pa dang / /de bzhin rkun mo chom rkun dang //
ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis/ /de dag la ni dngos grub med/ /ma rungs pa yi dam tshig nyams/ /yid gcugs pa ni med par byed/ /sdig pa'i chos ni kun tu
spyod| |de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis smad/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smad/ /rtag tu chos kyi sdong dum 'gyur/ /shi nas sems can dmyal bar
gzhol| |rtag tu smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /dbul po lus ni bskams pa dang / /mdze dang khyi rngo sa 'debs pa dang / /sdug bsngal rkun ma chos sun 'byin/ /chos
rku ba yi lus can ni/ /'jig rten 'dir ni bder mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol ga la bde/ /sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin/ /de lta bas na/ chen po
'dod pas ni/ rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pha dang / ma dang / bla ma dang / ston pa ni/ skyob pa dang /
skyabs dang / dpung bsnyen mdzad pa/ ston pa mchog sbyin pa/ dngos grub dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ rga shi las thar par byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa/ nor
sbyin pa/ longs spyod sbyin pa/ dang ba mchog bskyed pa de nyid 'jig rten gyi bla ma/ mgon po/ 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po/ dbang phyug mgon po/ /mchog sbyin par
mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/ dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongs su thar par bgyid pa/
nad sna tshogs sbyor bar grub pa/ rin po che sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ 'jig rten gyi sdig pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyid pa/ bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs
bgyid ba lags te/ de lta bas na/ rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ rtag tu 'bad pas shin tu gus par bgyid pa lags so/ /de nas
rdzas kyi sman sgrub pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgyid de/ seng+ge'i lce dang / snying dang / mig dang / de bzhin du nya phyis kyi phye ma dang / ldong ros dang / brah+ma'i
'o ma dang / gu gul dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / nA ga pus pa dang / li shi dang / rgya spos dang / de bzhin du gi'u wang dang / gla rtsi dang /
ga pur dang / gur gum dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / sprig ka dang / te dza ba ti ste/ de ltar cha mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad phye ma zhib mor byas la dngul gyi snod
bkang ste dar gyis g.yogs/ don yod pa'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du khri bzlas brjod bya'o/ /dus gsum
du khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas dbang bskur zhing phyag rgyas kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur ro/ /khri tshang nas cha lnga byas te phye ma dang /
til mar dang / nor bu dang / mig bsku ba dang / til mar tshos pa dang cha lnga'o/ /phye ma'i pad+ma mu ru ka'i phye ma dang sbyar la bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos ni/ lnga
stong ngo / /til mar ni/ ma hA ru ti ras 'grub ste/ brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo / /nor bu ni/ sbrul gyi khrag gis sbrus te khri chig stong
bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o/ /mig sman ni/ rma bya'i mig chu dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang / klad pa dang sbyar la khri chig stong bzlas brjod
bya'o| |khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad do/ /brah+ma te la srang nyi shu /gan+d+ha ra ba te la srang brgyad/ yungs mar la srang bcu drug /'o ma la srang brgya/ ba ser mo grus ma'i
'o ma dang / ba'i lci ba dang / ba gcin srang bdun/ du ru ka'i mar khu srang gnyis te/ rdzas 'di rnams chu dang bsres nas pad+ma'i sdong bus dkrugs shing zangs snod du
btso'o| |mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas/ /cho ga dag gis bsrung bar bya/ /cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyar/ /me tog bdug spos dag gis bdug /til mar
mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /chung ngur me bud grub pa mchog /spos kyi shing gis bud pa bzang / /'di ltar grub par shes pa dang / /khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba/ /nyi shu
gcig tu dbang bskur ro/ /til mar de ni snod gtsang ma/ /zangs snod yang na dngul snod bzang / /smig ma'i snod du gzhag par bya/ /de nas rig sngags brgyad stong dang / /khro
bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid/ /so so dag tu bzlas brjod bya/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa der gzhag par bya ba ni/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar
byas nas bzhag cing slob dpon gyi las kyang bya ste/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa
dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / spyi'u gtsug bcing ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / srung ba'i cho ga dang / nye reg bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / mchod
phyir thogs pa ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon kun gyis de dag thams cad bstan par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por bzhag la rig sngags
'chang sbyang ba'i cho ga byas pas 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos kyang stong rtsa
brgyad du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur la phyag rgya bcings nas rnam pa gsum 'dra bar dbang bskur ro/ /de nas las thams cad byas te
yungs kar dkar po grub pa la rig sngags 'chang gis brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la pad+ma'i mchog gtso bo gtsang ba/ gtsang mar byas pa/ legs par bkrus
pa| sbyangs pa/ phye ma zhib tu btags pa/ thal ba lta bu la brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgang / gu gul dang / tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / sprig ka la
brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi nang du bkang la/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i steng du so sor gzhag go /de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur
cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba'i tshe bya ba thams cad byed do/ /gser ram/ yang na dngul lam/ zangs las pad+ma'i tshal
du byas pa 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / ze ba can dang / de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la sdong bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad rdo rje'i rnam pa can
du bya| skud pa dmar po'i zhags pa pad+ma'i tshon dmar pos bzhen pa/ gzhon nus bkal pa grub pa de dag la brgya stong bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur
cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la mkhas pas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag go /gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe las thams cad grub pa ston to/ /shin
tu gtsang zhing gtsang bar bya ste/ su la yang mi sbyin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par gyur pa/ dam tshig nyams pa la bgegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing / 'phral
du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub nam yang shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan ni/ bla ma la gus shing / sangs rgyas chos la ston byed pa/ /
'phags pa'i tshogs la dad pa dang / /byams sems snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /de yi lag tu rab tu sbyin/ /bdag gi srog bzhin gtad par bya/ /de dag dngos grub
mchog sbyin te/ /bklags dang mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin/ /rjes su mthun pa'i las byed do/ /'jig rten 'dir ni rtag tu bde/ /'jig
rten pha rol bde ba yin/ /'gro ba lam ni bde bar 'gro /gang na 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/ /bde ba can du rtag tu 'gro/ /brdzus te skyes te pad+ma las/ /rgyan rtags
kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /tshe rabs dag ni dran 'gyur te/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen
po'i dam tshig ston par 'dod pa gtsang mas legs par khrus bya/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du bzhag ste me tog dang / bdug spos dbul zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs
dang / phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa yang bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug /lag na rdo rje la gu
gul gyi bdug spos kyis bdug /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha bshos dkar po dbul/ lag na rdo rje la ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha
bshos phul la nyin par don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya/ mtshan mor khro bo'i rgyal po ngal ba med par bzlas brjod bya ste/ kha gdong khro gnyer med pa
dang / dri ma dang ser sna med pas nam langs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar bar 'gyur la/ lag na
rdo rje yang pus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi mig nas 'dzag pa rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus
na| nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /khar bcug na/ rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje'i stobs
dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje'i rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'dug cing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog
rjes su sbyin par byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis spyod par byed/ lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon pa rjes su sbyin par
byed| de ltar lag na rdo rjes 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su til mar chen po ran par bdag nyid la bsku/ mig sman gyis mig byug /phye mas gtor
zhing bdag nyid la thig le bya/ nor bu mgo la bzhag nas gu gul gyis bdug /bdag nyid gos ngur smrig bgos nas sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgom zhing / zhi ba dang
dul ba'i yid kyis sde tsan gyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas dge slong de dag gis sde can gyi nang du zhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs
pa'i rig sngags 'chang de bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du mthong ste/ mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa
'od 'dom gang ba/ stan pad+ma/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i mdun gyis bdar ba'i lha tshogs sna tshogs kyis gzugs mthong bar ston to/ /dge slong de dag gis kyang
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / mdog tu mthong nas thams cad zhabs gnyis la 'dud par byed do/ /rig sngags 'chang des brnyas par mi bya zhing / bdag la
bstod par yang mi bya/ brnyas pa tsam gyis khyod kyi bsod nams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rdzu 'phrul chen
pos stobs bcu dang ldan par dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ rgyu des na/ brnyas par mi bya'o/ /de nas grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya/ de nas 'dus
pa'i nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas grong dang / tshang tshing dang / yul dang / ri brag gi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ yul gyi skyes
pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs su mthong zhing mchod pa chen po
dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no/ /zhes smra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga 'thob bo/ /yungs kar dang / til
mar gyis rang gi 'khor gyis spyi bor gtor cing byugs na/ thams cad lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ /rkang pa til mar gyis bskus na/ sa'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis spags te nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ ji srid du ma bkrus pa
de srid du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du ston to/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang de nang par sngar langs nas gtsang ma khrus byas te gos
gtsang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs nas phyogs bzhir gtor na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang /
btsun mo dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu rgyan
dang phreng ba byas la mgo la gdags so/ /til mar gyis yan lag tsam la bsku bar bya/ dpral bar thig le bya/ mig sman gyis mig bsku/ phye mas bdag nyid la
gdab| ras bzang po yug gcig bgo /byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad du bgyi ba dang / nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dbung rgyan dang / gser
skud kyis bcings na/ de dag thams cad rgyan dang / spud pa dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUR+ya sna tshogs la sogs pas lus brgyan par snang ngo / /
lag na pad+ma thogs na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang ngo / /yid la ji ltar bsam pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs
pa brgyad dang / tshangs pa'i tshul dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / rgod ma'i kha dang / mgul sngon dang / rta mgrin du ston to/ /ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar
ston te| ji srid du thig le yod cing dbu rgyan thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs ston par byed do/ /til mar dang / yungs kar dang bsres nas ki kuSh+Tha dang lhan cig
sbrus nas lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/ dpral bar dbang phyug chen po'i thig le byas nas pad+ma'i phye ma gtor la/ nor bu spyi gtsug tu bcing / mig sman gyis mig
bsku| gu gul gyis bdugs la shes rab can khro bo'i lta ba'i tshul byas na/ mngon sum du rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su snang ste/ de la the tshom mi bya'o/ /ji srid
du bdag khrus ma byas pa de srid du rdo rje'i gzugs can du snang la/ las sna tshogs byed cing mi dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the tshom
mi bya'o| |seng+ge'i khrag gis til mar dang / nor bu sbrus nas lus la bskus na/ mi'i seng+ge chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ /phag gi khrag gis sbrus nas lus la bskus
na| phag gi gzugs chen por ston to/ /til mar dang / phye ma lhan cig sbrus nas yung ba dang / shing pa la sha'i mdog tu byas la lus la bskus na/ sred med
kyi bu'i gzugs su ston to/ /rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma dang / til mar lhan cig sbrus la bskus na/ dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ /shing arga'i 'o ma
dang / til mar dang / mnyam par sbyar la lus la bskus na/ tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to/ /glang po che'i khrag dang til mar sbyar nas lus la bskus na/ tshogs kyi
dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ /ra'i khrag dang sbrus nas lus la byugs na/ ra'i gzugs su ston to/ /til mar dang / thing shing dang / pad+ma'i phye ma dang / glang
po che'i khrag dang lhan cig sbyar nas lus la bskus na/ nag po chen po'i gzugs mngon sum du rang gi gzugs ston la/ gang dang gang dag la thig le byas na/ ma
mo'i tshogs kyi gzugs su ston to/ /sbrul gyi khrag dang / pags pa dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang lhan cig sbrus la sgal tshigs su bsku zhing
dpung pa g.yon par yang bskus na/ klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su ston te/ ji lta ji ltar khrag dang sbyar zhing ji lta ji ltar yid la bsam pa de lta de ltar gzugs
ston to| |de nas gzhal med khang lta bar 'dod na/ yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus nas dge 'dun gyi nang du steng 'og tu gtor/ phye mas nor bu rgyal mtshan
gyi rtse mo kun tu bskus na/ dge 'dun rgan rim du bkod pa'i dbus su gzhal med khang chen po rgyan gyis brgyan pa ston/ dge slong rnams kyi steng du gtor na/ dge slong
thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la ji ltar byas pa bzhin rgyal po'i gzugs su snang ba dang / gzhan dag blon po dang / gzhan dag bkrabs pa dang / gzhan dag
mdun na 'don pa dang / gzhan dag yongs su spyod pa'i gzugs su ston la yungs kar la bskus pas gtor na/ slar yang dge slong rnams su snang ngo / /shing arga'i
'o ma yungs kar la bskus nas dge 'dun gyi dbus su dge slong rnams kyi mal stan gyi steng du gtor na/ ji ltar dge slong thams cad 'khod pa ltar snang ngo / /
ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa la gtor na/ rgan mo 'khar ba thogs pa sgur po ltag dgye skra dkar can nyam chung bar snang ngo / /mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gtor
ba gal te mtshan thog thag bzhag na/ gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /lug gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor na/ de thur ma'i gzeb dang / sbrul nag po snang ngo / /snod kyi steng
du gtor na/ kham phor du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /btung ba'i snod sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i steng du gtor na/ phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo / /grong khyer gyi sgo dang grong khyer kun tu gtor
na| grong khyer kun nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer kun la yungs kar dang pad+ma'i phye ma gtor na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mi snang ba thams cad
snang bar 'gyur ro/ /seng+ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi steng du gtor na/ lam gyi bzhi mdo thams cad du seng+ge'i gzugs su ston to/ /de drag cing gtum la
yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du gtor na/ thams cad wa'i gzugs su snang la phyogs bcur rgyug go /g.yul 'gyed sar gtor na/ thams cad
gnyid log par byas par 'gyur la mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i nang du gtor na/ mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na/ rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /chu'i nang du gtor na/ chu mi mngon par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa chus bkang ba la
gtor na/ srog chags chu'i nang na gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byung zhing thang la gnas so/ /tshal gyi nang du yungs kar gyis gtor na/ me tog dang 'bras
bu mi snang bar gyur pa thams cad snang zhing shing skam po dang / tshal gyi mthar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ston to/ /nam mkha' la gtor na/ phyogs bzhi'i
dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang du me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/ lha'i dri legs par smin pa yid dga' ba sim
par byed pa 'bab bo/ /las dang ldan pa'am/ bzo'i gnas kyi las te/ las kyi snod thams cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos byugs la phye mas bsku/ pad+ma chen po'i
phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor la/ de nas las kyi bzo bzang po ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na/ las kyi snod de
dang de dag nyid g.yo la/ las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du ma dag ston par byed la nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te phyir zlog pa ma byas na/
rin ji lta ji ltar ba de lta de ltar nyo tshong byed do/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na/ mi snang bar 'gyur la/ dpag tshad brgya stong tsam gyi bar du khrid na/ de dang de
nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo la phye mas byug cing yungs kar chags par byas la/ pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor na/ 'jim pa bzhag la snod
kyi ngo bo ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya ste/ snod ngo bo dngul las byas pa'am/ gser las byas pa'am/ zangs las byas pa'am/ lcags las byas pa'am/ lcags lnga las
byas pa rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis sbras pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i snod bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ nyo tshong byed pa yang 'byung ste/ rin chen pos
tshong byed do/ /yungs kar gyi phye ma dang / pad+ma'i phye ma lhan cig sbyar nas tshong 'dus kyi dbus su gtor na/ kun tu zong bkram pa'i snod mi snang bar byas pa thams cad
snang bar byed do/ /thag pa'i steng du gtor na sbrul chen po ston to/ /khyim dang / ra ba'i ngos dang / sgo dang / shing sbyar ba dang / ka ba'i steng du gtor na/ khang pa dang / ra ba dang /
'khor gyi khyams rnams sprul du ston to/ /ji srid du chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du sprul pa rnams 'dug go /bzlog pa byas na/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ khang bzang gi ngos la gtor na/ sbrul chen por snang ngo / /lha'i steng du gtor la mig sman gyis bsku/
ril bus thig le byas na/ lha'i gzugs brnyan de ku co 'don cing 'gro ste/ gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o/ /bzlog pa byas na/ phyir 'dug go /sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtor na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yo bar mdzad/ bzhud par mdzad do/ /'jug par mdzad do/ /'chag par mdzad do/ /tsan+dan
la bzlas brjod byas nas bdugs na/ phyir bzhugs so/ /bum pa sbrang rtsis bskus pa rnams la gtor na/ g.yo bar byed do/ /ji tsam du phyir bzlog pa ma byas pa de
tsam du g.yo'o/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog na/ phyir 'dug go /de nas rdo rje bskyod par 'dod na/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste gu gul gyi bdug
pas bdug /de yang yungs kar dang phye ma dang bcas pa gtor la don yod pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor las langs nas nam mkha'
la 'gro bar byed do/ /'phar bar byed/ 'dug par byed/ 'bar bar byed cing / phan tshun 'gro bar byed/ mtho bar 'gro bar byed/ dma' bar 'gro bar byed/ rnam par 'gro
bar byed/ 'bar ba chen pos 'bar bar byed de/ ji srid du zlog pa ma byas pa de srid du nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na/ de nyid du snang ngo / /
de nas 'khor lo bskyod par 'dod na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la spos sna tshogs kyis bris nas me tog sna tshogs dgram par yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang
bdugs nas 'khor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ phye mas bsku/ lte ba'i dbus su thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
su gzhag par bya/ de la yang yungs kar dang / pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gdab par bya/ 'khor lo kun nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing se gol gyi sgra yang byas na/
'khor lo de dkyil 'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'phar zhing sdang ba thams cad la 'bab par byed de/ gal te g.yul 'gyed par 'bab na/ de'i tshe dgra thams cad
kyi mgo gcod par byed/ sdang ba thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad la bab na/ 'jig par byed/ bgegs thams cad la 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin
po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / gdon rnams la 'bab pa dang / klu sdang ba thams cad la bab na/ 'jig par byed de/ ji srid du zlog pa ma byas
pa de srid du 'phar ro/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na/ slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go /mdung rtse gsum pa bskyod bar 'dod na/
dkyil 'khor byas la thod pa gzhag par bya/ me tog dgram pa yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs la/ mdung rtse gsum pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos
bsku/ phye mas gdab cing thig le bya/ rtse'i rgyun gsum la pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas thod pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ yungs kar gyis gtor zhing hUM zhes
se gol byas na mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar bar byed/ ldang bar byed/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ kun tu 'bar bar byed/ 'gro bar byed/ phyogs bcur 'phar bar
byed de/ ji srid du zlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar bar byed do/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na/ slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go /dung la til mar gyis
byugs la phye mas gtor la thig le bya/ yungs kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus na/ ji srid du sgra thos pa de srid kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo
thams cad bro rdung bar byed/ rgyug par byed/ mchod par byed cing / phyogs bcur rab tu rgyug par byed do/ /g.yul ngor bus na/ 'gyed pa'i mi thams cad dang /
mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad btang nas bro rdung bar byed/ gcer bur 'byung bar byed/ phyogs bcur rgyug par byed do/ /gal te dung lan bdun bus na/
phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs des nyon mongs pa skyed par 'gyur/ ji srid du zlog pa ma byas pa de srid mchod zhing phyogs bcur rgyug go /sbos chus bzlog
cing khrus byas na/ phyir bde bar gnas par 'gyur la/ rtag tu rgyal ba dang / dpal gyi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgyu ma de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i gsang sngags dang /
rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor gang du dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing / kun
nas rgyan par yungs kar dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang / phye mar bsres pas byugs pa dang / thig les kyang dbang bskur cing pad+ma chen po'i phye mas byugs la lag pa
pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang / hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na/ brjod pa tsam dang / yungs kar gyis gtor ba'i mod la gtor ma'i snod dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa bkang
pa thams cad dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas nam mkha' la sor bzhi tsam gyis sgrags te 'dug la ji srid du dkyil 'khor gyi las su bya ba
thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du nam mkha' la 'dug go /rig sngags 'chang ba sa'i steng gi sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad kyi steng gi nam mkha'
la 'dug go /las su bya ba thams cad zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad dri chab kyi cho gas dbang bskur na/ gtor ma dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu
thams cad rang nyid 'phar bar byed la slar yang rang gi gnas su 'dug go /go cha de lta bu ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya ste/ thams cad du yon tan ston par snang
la| byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o/ /zhes bshad do/ /de'i phyir pad+ma'i dngos grub bshad par bya ste/ gser ram/ dngul
lam/ zangs las shin tu legs shing mdzes pa snying po dang / ze ba dang bcas shing sdong bu tshad dang ldan par byas la/ 'dab ma phyed kha phye ba 'khor bar 'dab ma
drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa khru gang tsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang / snying po dang / ze ba'i tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ pad+ma'i phye ma dang / mig
sman dang / mig bsku ba dang / thig ler byas pa dang bcas pas kun legs par bskus la/ pad+ma'i sdong bu'i bar du nor bu rin po che bzhag nas lan stong rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal bos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos pas til mar gyis
bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/ mig bsku ba dang / thig le dang / bdug pas bdag nyid kyis lus la bdug par bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/ lag pa g.yon
par pad+ma bzung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma'i mchod pa 'bum bya ste/ pad+ma 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod
pa'i cho ga byas nas chu dang / yungs kar gyis btab na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma sprul pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad chu'i nang du por na/ pad+ma mgal me bskor ba ltar
'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad+ma 'bum rnams char du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i chu'i nang du gzhag par bya ba ni/ mtsho bran nam/ lteng ka'am/ chu bo'am/ chu bo chen po'am/
'obs sam/ rdzing ngam/ mtsho'i nang gang rung ba'i gnas su bzhag na/ gnas de dang de thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho chen po 'byung ste/ ji srid du pad+ma ma phyung ba de srid du dus
rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug ste/ ston ka'am/ dgun nam/ dpyid dam/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus su rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug go /tshal gyi 'gram du zhugs nas yungs kar
la til mar gyis bskus pa phye ma dang sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung ba zhig lag gis bzung ste bskor la yungs kar gyis gtor na/ tshal gyi
mtha'i shing thams cad la me tog rgyas par snang ngo / /dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ skye bo'i nang du me tog ji snyed pa lag
gis bskor la yungs kar gyis gtor na/ me tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis thams cad du zlog par byed pa yin no/ /'bras bu ji snyed pa
lag gis bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na/ 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gos lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor te bskor na/ gos dang bla re
sna tshogs ston par byed do/ /rgyan lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lha'i rgyan bzang po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bo 'dus pa
thams cad kyi rgyan du byed la/ thams cad la rgyan btags par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dang / chus bzlog par bya'o/ /yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus/ phye mas
bsgo| |gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / shing kun dang / snu hwa'i 'o mas kyang bsgos la de dag gcig tu byas nas grib ma la bskam mo/ /de nas 'bras bu gcig
khar bcug la phyogs bzhir gtor na/ kha nas me 'bar bar snang zhing lus las 'bar ba sna tshogs 'byung bar snang ste/ ji srid du yungs kar kha na yod pa'i bar du lus
las 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo / /til mar dang lhan cig btags pa'i snying por bya/ kong bur til mar gyi rgyal pos bkang ste mar me 'bum
ston par byed do/ /me thab khung bu'i nang du bcug na/ ji srid du ma phyung ba de srid du me 'bar bar ston te/ /mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcug la ma phyung na/ rtag tu 'bar ro/ /
mgal me 'bar ba'i nang du bcug na/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'bum snyed du snang ngo / /gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa'i nang du gtor na/ gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa thams
cad 'bar bar snang ngo / /lag cha dang / mtshon cha thams cad la byugs na/ gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs la ril bu gtsang ma spyi bor bzhag na/
lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ba nas lus ril bsregs pa ltar snang ngo / /'o ma dang yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lus slar snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa dang rkang pa la
bskus la ril bu gtsang ma 'bar ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung ba'am/ rkang pa'i mthe bos bzung na/ lag pa dang / rkang pa gcig pu 'bar ba dang / 'brel bar snang ngo / /'dus
pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo 'dus pa mang po'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ sde can gyi nang ngam/ rig byed bzhi'i nang thams cad du yan lag nyams par snang
ngo / /dri chab dang yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lus slar rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo'i ril bu bsregs ba lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag nas yungs kar gyis phyogs
bzhir gtor na/ mar me 'bum phrag bye ba snang ngo / /kun nas phyogs bzhir chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yin no/ /tshal chen po'i mtha' dang / nang du gtor
la shing gcig la ril bu gtsang ma bzhag na/ shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo / /ri'i rtse mor mar
me bus nas ri kun tu gtor na/ ri kun nas gcig tu 'bar zhing mched par snang la sems can thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /rkun ma dang /
g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / sdang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / sdang sems can nas ri dwags
gtum po dang / bya la sogs pa'i bar ri la gnas pa rnams de'i mtshan mo nyid phyogs bcu kun tu bros shing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin to/ /spos chab kyis bzlog par
'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gtor la gtsang ma'i ril bu 'bar bar bzhag na/ gzugs brnyan thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ spos chu dang / yungs
kar gyis bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /mar me'i ril bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor sbar ste gnas gtsang mar bzhag /dkyil 'khor gcig byas nas gtor ma'i cho ga
bum pa bkang ba bzhag /grong khyer kun tu yungs kar gyis gtor zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par byas na/ grong khyer kun nas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba gcig tu
snang ngo / /grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs na/ gang grong khyer na gnas pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu
mo de dag thams cad dga' ba chen po rgya che bas tshim par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer de na gang sdang ba'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra dang / chom rkun dang / g.yon
can dang / gnod byed dang / glags tshol bar gyur pa gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / mi ma yin pa gang yang rung ba grong khyer
de na gnas pa de dag lang long du gyur cing gdugs la ngu zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing grong khyer gyi sgor byung nas phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros so/ /grong khyer de yang kun nas
gnod pa med cing 'khrug pa med par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad
rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mtshan mo 'das nas spos chu dang / yungs kar gyis grong khyer gyis sgor gtor zhing dbang bskur na/ bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don
yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ /bam po bcu dgu pa/ ldong ros dang / mthing shun gyi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / ma hA tai la dang / arga'i 'o
ma dang / pha gu'i 'o ma dang gcig tu sbyar ro/ /nya'i mig mkhris pa dang bcas pa dang / nA ga pus pa dang / pad+ma'i chu rnams kyang lhan cig tu phye mas zhib mor bya'o/ /
phye ma snga ma legs par sbyar la chus ril bur byas pa dang / phye mas gzhan yang bcang ngo / /phye mas 'di dang / pad+ma chen po'i phye ma bcang ba lhan cig tu bsres
pa'i phye mas lus bskus la phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ ril bu khar bcug la hUM zhes bya ba bsdams te brjod na/ de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing / de kho na
bzhin du rna ba gnyis kyang lha rdzas kyi chu 'byung bar snang / lus las spos kyi rigs yid du 'ong ba rab tu sim par byed pa 'byung ba ni/ nad thams cad grub par snang
ste| rgyal ba'i phyag bzhin no/ /yungs kar gyi phye ma blangs te nam mkha' la gtor la ril bu lag pas bskor na/ char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ril bu nam mkha'
la 'phangs na/ mi 'bab bo/ /g.yul chen po 'gyed pa'i nang du phye ma de yungs kar dang bsres te nam mkha' la gtor la ril bu de yang khar bcug ste steng du bltas la
hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras pos la gnam lcags chen po 'bab ste yid mi 'chad pa dang / sdug bsngal bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /chu'i nang du zhugs te phye ma de gtor la yungs kar
dang / ril bu chu'i nang du gdab par bya/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te til mar gyis lus la bskus na/ klu chen po'i gzugs su snang ngo / /ril bu dang yungs kar
me'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres pa'i yungs kar nam mkha' la gtor na/ 'brug sgra chen po 'byung zhing glog chen po gsal ba snang bar 'gyur ro/ /chu'i nang nas 'byung na/
mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /khron pa'i nang du 'bab na/ chu lung nas phyogs kun tu 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rdza ma'am/ bum pa'am/ rdzi'u 'am/ ril ba b+h+r-ing+ga ra'am/ ril ba la
phye mas byugs te/ de'i steng du yungs kar gyis gtor nas chus bkang ste khrus byas na/ de chu 'bab par snang zhing de'i snod ni/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa
mang po byed de mchog tu grub pa yin no/ /de nas ri chen po'i 'bru mar gyi rgyal po byas te 'bru mar gzhan dang / de bzhin du til las byas 'bru
mar gyi rgyal po de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /lag pa dang rkang pa bzhag la 'dir nyams drod kyang shes par bya'o/ /bzhag pa thams cad nyams drod shes par bya ba ni/ mar
sar bzhin du 'jam par 'gyur zhing skad cig de nyid la mtho ba dang / dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin du ri yang 'gyur ro/ /snying po thur ma 'dra ba dang / zlum
po'am| yang na lcug ma lta bur byas pas ka ba yang 'dud pa dang / ri yang dma' ba'am/ yang na mthon por 'gyur bar byed do/ /yungs kar dang pad+ma chen po'i phye ma
lhan cig bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bsgos pa phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na/ ri thams cad mi snang zhing 'brog dgon pa snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang ri bor snang
bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na/ mis bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na seng+ge dang / stag gi gang lcug ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba'am/ rtsub
pa'am| dum bu'am/ khong stong du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri bo po ta la'i gzhal med khang
mthong bar 'dod na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi ngar du nas kyi 'o thug gi zas zos te gtsang ma shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas ri'i
gseb tu zhugs la/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me sbar ba la yungs kar phye ma dang bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras so ba dang bsres
pa stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun du dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /lha bshos dang gtor ma dkar po 'bul lo/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig
smyung ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas spos sna tshogs kyis lus bskus/ gos bzang po gtsang ma bgos te 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gi lus la bskus/ phye mas
lus byugs/ mig sman gyis mig bskus/ thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing zhing mgul ba dang / dpung pa dang / rked par yang bcings la yungs kar dang mtshal bsres
pas re'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ pad+ma chen po'i phye ma de yang phyogs bzhir gtor/ rang gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang / pad+ma bzung zhing g.yas pas rnam par
lta ba snang ba dang / don yod pa chen pos dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya bzung ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
mdo sde bshad pa las bstan pa de ltar ri bo po Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar ri bo po Ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ri de la yang gzhal med khang snang ste/ ri de la rin po che'i
shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo / /me tog sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang snang ngo / /sA la dang / tA la dang / tA ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / a d+hi muk+ta ka
dang / ba ri sha ka dang / ka dam pa dang / nI la dang / pa Ta la dang / pa lA sha dang / u dum ba ra dang / dong ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / ta ra Na
dang / na la ma li ka dang / ku ba bya ka sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa dang / ri dwags kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang
ba snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe phyir bsdu ba byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang
ba bzhin bya'o/ /dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni/ bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig
sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// //don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad
par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni/ /pad+ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon/ /pad+ma kha ni phyed bye ba/ /phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin/ /phyag gnyis phyung zhing brkyang nas kyang //
bskum pa'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyis/ /kun nas phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags/ /mtshon cha phyag rgya bsnams pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mda' po che dang /
mdung rtse gsum pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje phreng zlum dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / zur gsum ma zhes bya ba dang / 'khor lo dang /
dung dang / tho ba dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug tho dang / me tog gi thum po dang / bum pa gang ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / pad+ma'i phreng dang / rdo rje phreng zlum dang /
ut+pa la'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / zla ba dang / ri rab dang / me long dang / klu dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i rgyal
mtshan dang / gdugs dang / be con dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / chu srin gyi kha dang / sngags de'i phreng ba dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng zlum dang / bsdigs pa dang /
bsgyings pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / glegs bam bsnams pa dang / mkhar
gsil dang / lhung bzed dang / gdugs dang / dbu rgyan dang / nor bu brgyus pa dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang /
me'i thab khung ngo / /kun nas 'bar phreng phyag rgya de/ /sna tshogs rmad du byung bas smras/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa yi/ /pad+ma 'dzin la rab tu gnas/ /ras la bris
pa'am dkyil 'khor ram/ /rtsig pa'am gang yang rung ba la/ /tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /gang du bris pa mthong ba de/ ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar ni/ /phyir
yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang gis rtag mchog sbyin/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /gang zhig nyes byas mi bzad pa/ /mtshams med lnga po byed
pa nyid| |mnar med pa yi gnas dang ni/ /dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol pa gang / /phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /skye dang 'chi las
rnam par grol/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgal bar 'gyur/ /de dag skye ba phyir mar ni/ /phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos te/ /yang dang yang du pad+ma las/ /brdzus te skye ba dag
tu 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro/ /gang na 'dren pa tshe dpag med/ /bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu der/ /skye 'gyur the tshom mi za zhing / /don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur
zhing / /rig sngags sna tshogs bde bar 'grub/ /de bar dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu mi ldog sa nas 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /bla med dge rtsa bskyed par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /bsod nams phung po chen po
'thob| |de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa/ /de nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin/ /sdig pa thams cad mod
la sel| |gang zhig mtshams med byed pa dag /mi bzad mnar med gnas pa yi/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ni/ /mtho ris
sgo phye the tshom med/ /sgo phye gyur pa rnams la ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug
gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis sems can phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na/ shi 'phos pa'i mod la bde ba can du skye bar
'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis gang na thub pa 'dren pa 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la/ /kun nas cha ni mdzes par bya/ /gru bzhi go la'i tshad tsam la/ /sgo bzhi them skas bzhi yis brgyan/ /shin tu legs par bskus
dang ldan/ /'jam zhing mnyen la mnyam pa yi/ /sa yi cha dang ldan pa la/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis dbye/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid thig btab la/ /phyag rgya bri ba
rnam par dbye/ /phyogs bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa yi/ /dbus na dkyil 'khor snying po yin/ /gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba
rnam par dbye'o/ /gru bzhi pa'i dbus su phyag rgya don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang / phyag rgya rgyan gyis brgyan pa tshon rtsi sna tshogs
kyis bri'o/ /dbus kyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi phyag rgya bri ba yang shin tu 'byin par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan
la kun tu yungs kar dkar po gtor ro/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyogs bzhi kun tu bya ba ni/ ba lang gi lci ba sa dang bsres pas shin tu legs
par byugs pa dang ldan pa la tshon rtsi'i phye mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba chen po dang / mtshon cha bris la 'di'i sgo bzhi yang rnam par 'byes par
bri'o| |ji ltar phyag rgya dang mthun pa'i ro sna tshogs kyis gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la yang mchod yon phul la dbyib mo dang / phru ba dang / bum pa dang /
kham phor dang / rdze'u gtor mas bkang la gzhag go /kun tu bum pa gang ba dang / /bdug spos kyi ni snod dag dang / /me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / /gtor ma dkar
po dag gis bkang / /me tog rnam par bkram byas la/ /kun tu phreng bas gzhag par bya/ /phreng ba bzang po bzhag nas kyang / /de bzhin kun tu bdug spos dbul/ /a ga
ru dang tsan+dan dang / du ru ka dang / sa la ki dang / spri ka dang / gu gul dang / sra rtsi pog dang / sgron shing dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi bdug pa 'di dag gis bdugs la/
gtor ma dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dbul lo/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byas te bskor la phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la
phyag bya zhing phyag rgya thams cad la me tog bkram zhing me tog gtor ro/ /gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub pa gang
dgos pa la sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyis las thams cad bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba
gtsang ma yis/ /gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor la bgos pa/ /
de bzhin du ni las bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla med pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs tsam gyis/ /thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i/ /spyi yi rigs ni
thams cad du/ /phyag rgya dkrigs dang gtams rnams kyis/ /dam tshig kun tu shes par 'gyur/ /spyi rigs kun gyi cho ga yis/ /dam tshig rjes zhugs de bzhin
no| |dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang / /rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur/ /kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ /
chos kyi ro ni bdud rtsi yi/ /gzi brjid mod la 'jug par 'gyur/ /rnam snang mdzad gsung dkyil 'khor du/ /don yod dngos grub stsol ba mdzad/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil
'khor gang bzhugs pa/ /kun tu spyi yi rigs rnams kyi/ /don yod dngos grub mchog myur thob/ /sangs rgyas bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon
'di dag ni/ tshe 'di yin par khong du chud par bya'o/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skyes par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran zhing 'od
zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing / tshe bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul
pa bstan pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston par byed do/ /
dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i spyi'i rigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri
za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor rnams 'byor ba gzigs nas srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /sems can
thams cad phyi bzhin 'brang zhing mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os
chen por 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad gcig tu bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur
ro| |mtshan ma bri ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnam dag
gi /'di nyid sgrub pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /spyi yi rigs rnams thams cad kyi/ /cho ga zhib mo bla med yin/ /gang gis sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ /phyogs kun rnam par
gzigs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs nas byon 'gyur zhing / /byang chub sems dpa' dgongs par 'gyur/ /rigs rnams dngos grub rjes stsol cing / /rtag tu
srung ba mdzad par 'gyur/ /mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /the tshom med par myur du byon/ /mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na/ /rang gi gzugs su
mthong bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol/ /rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid/ /nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni/ /rnam par gzigs 'gyur the tshom med/ /
dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni/ rgya chen po ko la'i tshad tsam la legs par byugs pa/ shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu
gsal ba/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa/ mchog tu mdzes pa/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o/ /me yi gnas
kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la/ /kun nas them skas bzhi dag dang / /steng du gra ni bzhi pa bya/ /rtag tu pad+ma'i snying po dang / /snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang / /
kun nas 'dab ma mdzes par bya/ /gra bzhir pad+ma'i phreng ba bya/ /de bzhin du gra gnyis kar rdo rje pad+ma dang bcas pa'o/ /gsum par mdung rtse gsum pad+ma dang bcas pa'o/ /
bzhi par 'khor lo pad+ma dang bcas pa'o/ /lnga par bum pa gang ba gzhag go /sna tshogs tshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i/ /kun nas 'dab ma'i myu gu bya/ /rin chen snod ni
bkang ba dang / /me tog phreng dang ngang pa dang / /phye ma pad+mar bcas pa dang / /de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid/ /de bzhin sna tshogs brgyan pa 'o/ /nub kyi gnas dag gra
dag tu| |pad+ma'i 'dab ma ut+pal bcas/ /bum pa dur bas bkang ba bri/ /rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la/ /'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang gdab/ /de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya
ba| |thig gis kun nas cha mnyam zhing / /sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni/ /tshon sna lnga yi skud pas gdab/ /me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni/ /kun nas
'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ /gra dang grar ni me lha bri/ /lus ni me mdog 'bar ba dang / /lag na me 'bar 'dzin pa dang / /mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang / /cho ga
bzhin du bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga bzhin/ /ba dan mda' dang sna lnga yi/ /skud pas bum pa gang dkris dang / /de bzhin bdug spos snod dag gis/ /kun
nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che yi/ /sna tshogs ro yi gtor ma gzhag /rdze'u dang kham phor rnam gsum gyi/ /dkar pos bkang ba
gzhag par bya/ /rdze'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni/ /gtor mas bkang pa kun tu gzhag /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag /kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing / /phreng ba
sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ /'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni/ /kun tu mar me 'bar ba dang / /sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin du/ /dri yi phye ma lha bshos dang / /dkyil
'khor kun la gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la/ /blugs gzar dur ba rtag tu gzhag /shing ni arga shi mi dang / /yungs kar 'bras ni so ba dang //
zhun mar dang ni mar dkar dang / /kun tu ru ka tsan+dan dkar/ /sbyin sreg cho gar 'dir bzhag ste/ /dus gsum rtag tu rig 'dzin gyis/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/ /
rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma yi/ /gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la/ /dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' zhing / /gzhan ni bza' dang spyad mi bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo
nas| |dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing / /dar+b+ha'i stan la skyil krung du/ /shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya/ /byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste/ /don yod
rgyal po dran bya zhing / /snga dro'i dus su sbyin sreg bya/ /gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing / /spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blugs ni/ /phye ma red dus su bya ba'o/ /gang zhig dkyil
'khor du zhugs la/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang / /grub pa kun tu cho ga yi/ /bdag nyid dbang bskur me kun gyis/ /sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs/ /kun
tu gnas ni thams cad na/ /rgyas pa gnas mchog rwa gcig dang / /ga ra ge de bzhin phur bu dang / /mdun na 'don pa me lha ni/ /sbyin sreg byed pa 'jig rten pa//
mtshungs zhes ston pas lung bstan to/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa/ /rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang / /phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang / /khyab 'jug dbang phyug
chen po dang / /mnyam pa pas kyang lhag pa nyid/ /me yi sbyin sreg byed pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob/ /gal te zhag bdun
dus gsum du/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /me la sbyin sreg byed pa la/ /mod la mngon shes lnga thob ces/ /de skad 'jig rten 'dren pa gsung / /las ni
byas nas de nas ni/ /sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya/ /sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha rnams rtag tu
'ong 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin gshegs kun dgyes par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni/ /mod la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzod/ /sdig pa thams cad sreg
par 'gyur/ /shin tu mi bzad sngon gyi las/ /sreg blugs tsam gyi mod la sreg /'bar ba'i me yis phye leb bzhin/ /de la sogs pa'i sdig pa ni/ /sreg 'gyur
'dir ni the tshom med/ /sdang ba'i phyir ni rgol nyid dang / /mi bzad phas kyi dgra rnams dang / /pha rol dpung gis 'jigs pa nyid/ /de bzhin du yang rgyal po'i dpung //
de kun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ /mi snang bar 'gyur the tshom med/ /de bzhin mi ngas gcod kun dang / /nad kun rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs
nyid kyang / /sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis 'jig /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang / /de bzhin gshegs dang log 'dren dang / /sha za brjed byed yi dwags dang / /de bzhin
rnam pa sna tshogs gdon/ /'di kun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ /'jig par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rtag tu 'jigs med lo legs shing / /gling dang bde bar 'gyur ba yin//
rtag tu sems can thams cad ni/ /kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa nyid/ /btsun mor bcas pa nyid kyang ni/ /rtag par kun tu gsal bar ni//
mi 'jigs sbyin par the tshom med/ /rtag tu nad med 'gyur ba dang / /dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang / /lus can dag ni thams cad la/ /rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas/ /
rtag tu me yi lha nyid ni/ /rgyun du mthong bar 'dod pa yis/ /me la sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ /me lha nyid ni bzhugs gyur te/ /rtag tu las ni thams cad mdzad/ /rgyun du phyi
