bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /lha ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing / /thams cad du ni mthong ba ster/ /rgyu skar zla ba nyi ma dang / /gshin rje dang ni chu lha dang / /rgyal po chen po bzhi po
dag /dpung bcas bzhon par bcas pa yang / /nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni/ /rjes 'brang srung 'gyur the tshom med/ /ci ste rig sngags 'chang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
snying po sgrub par 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya
zhing / shing arga'i yam shing sreg gi me sbar la pad+ma dang / zhun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas nas sreg blugs lan gcig byas pas/
mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi
dngos grub 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gi me sbar la rigs spyir pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / yungs kar dkar po dang zhun mar bsres
pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob ste/ thams cad cho ga chen po zhib mo dang / sbyin sreg chen
po'i cho gar 'gyur ro/ /de nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos/ seng
ldeng gi me sbar la/ zho dang / zhun mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg brgyad stong byas na/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi
dmag tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra gzhom par 'dod pa dang / dpung gzhig par 'dod na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
shing kar ba ka'i me sbar la/ sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa dang / ske tse'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa 'bras sA lu dang bsres pa yungs kar mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg byas na
dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra la gnam lcags chen po dang / rlung grang mo 'bab pas phongs pa dang / yid mi bde ba skye bar 'gyur/
dgra thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /klus char 'bebs par 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang des nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la/ shin tu khrus byas pa
gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog phreng ba dang / yungs kar dang / sha ta pus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum du byas na/ klu'i
rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /char de nyid ha cang ches na/ thal ba nam
mkha' la gtor na/ ha cang ches pa 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /yang me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des
gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas shing sna ma'i me sbar la 'bras so ba dang / zhun mar dang / bu ram sha khar dang
bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sna ma'i me tog bsres pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /brgyad stong tshang ba dang / me lha me'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste 'dug nas
rig sngags 'chang la ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing / ji ltar rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o/ /thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya
ba| mchog thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ bdud rtsi 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i me'i kha/ kha'i mchog sbyin par byed do/ /gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i me'i kha thob pas gang du
dbugs phyung ba dang / rdubs pa der me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du phu zhes byas pa der me 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mun nag tu dbugs phyung na/ me 'bar
ba snang bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do/ /sa bon
bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni/ rgyal po dbang du byed do/ /phub ma dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis ni/ zhe
'gras par byed do/ /'bras yos dang yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/ /yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zhun mar gyi sbyin sreg
gis ni/ gnod sbyin 'gugs so/ /kA ra bI ra'i me tog dang / gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni/ srin mo 'gugs so/ /de bzhin du 'dir las thams
cad byed do/ /sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ kun tu thun mong sgrub pa'i mchog /dge ba'i
las kun byed pa ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing / /bla med bsod nams chen po gsog /don yod rgyal po de nyid ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu//
'jig rten 'dren pa snang bar bya/ /mthu dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i/ /'jig rten pa yi gzugs bya ba/ /grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas/ /so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni/ /
ras sam yang na dar dag la/ /'jigs pa med pas gzugs bya'o/ /don yod pa yi rgyal po ni/ /khru gang tsam gyi tshad dam yang na tshad shin tu rnam par 'byed pad+ma'i mdog
lta bu phyag brgyad pa/ dbu gsum pa/ de bzhin du spyan gsum pa zhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya ste/ de bzhin du zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse
gsum pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be tson dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / bgrang phreng dang / me tog
thum po 'dzin par bya'o/ /g.yon du ni/ dkar mo'o/ /g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni/ ral ba'i thor tshugs can/ dbu rgyan 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ ri dwags kyi
pags pa mnabs pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang dang ldan pa'o/ /nang rim du pad+ma'i phreng ba'o/ /rim pa gnyis par rdo rje
phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas par bya'o/ /rim pa gsum par nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs mdzes pa'o/ /rim pa bzhi par mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng
ba'o| |rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o/ /steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog
sna tshogs thogs par bya'o/ /g.yon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba ni/ me tog sna tshogs
thogs par bya'o/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni/ khros pa/ gtum pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'bar ba'i nang du
bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas pa zla bas brgyan cing ral gri 'dzin pa
dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra sta 'dzin par bya'o/ /dkar mo'i rgyab tu rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni/ zhi ba'i zhal
ras can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med can thogs pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzin par bya'o/ /'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs
can dang / dung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas mo dang / dpe med ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / pho nya mo zhi ba dang / lo tog gi lha dang / sa'i lha dang / rgyal po chen
po bzhi bya'o/ /steng dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi ba'i tshad tsam bya'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o/ /ri mo'i
gzugs kyi phyi rol gyi rim pa kun tu phyag rgya dang / phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par bri'o/ /klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o/ /rig sngags dngos
grub bla med pa'i/ /ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni/ /sdig pa thams cad mod la sel/ /mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar byed/ /phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor
dang bcas pa'i ri mo'i gzugs grub pa 'di ni/ spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug pa ston pa yin no/ /phyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor
'di ni| dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /don yod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ri mo
'di ni| thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis
rnam par thar pa 'thob cing lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub bo/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor chen po dang ldan par snang ba byed pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen
po 'khor bcas kyi/ /rig sngags cho ga bla med pa/ /spyi rigs yang dag 'byung ba ni/ /thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyis bstan/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang //
gang yang pad+ma'i rigs de bzhin/ /nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje'i rigs gang bla med pa/ /spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni/ /ri mo mthong ba'i khyad par yin/ /phyir yang ngan
'gror mi 'gro zhing / /dmyal ba ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de/ /mtho rigs kyi ni sgo yang phye/ /bla na med pa ston pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /bsod nams bla na med
pa yin| |ci ste don yod pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang des tsan+dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la/ gnad kyis gnas kyi cha'i so tshad shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ dbu dang / mgul dang / rked pa dang / pus mo dang /
yan lag dang / zhabs kyi tshigs dang / phyag sor dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad kyi cha'i mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo tshad shin
tu mdzes shing cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zla gam zhi ba'i gzugs can spyan gsum phyag bzhi shin tu mdzes pa dang / dbu skra shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa 'od dpag can phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/ /sgrol ma dang / dkar mo yang 'od 'dom gang dang
bcas par dgod do/ /mgon po shin tu mdzes pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyi mtshams su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yogs pa'i cod pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug
tu ring bsrel bzhag par byas la/ tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur gyis mchod la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'di'i dbus su
pad+ma ge sar dang bcas pa'i 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dbang phyug dar gyi con pan gyis bcings pa bzhag
la| a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgram par bya/ me tog gi phreng bas mchod par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas
pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas smyung ba byas la mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la mchod yon dang / lha bshos phul
la byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ /sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom zhing /
gtam gzhan mi smra bar shin tu yongs su sbyar ba legs par spyod cing / gzhan 'jigs pa med pas bdag srung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung
ba dang bcas pa yang byas la bzlas brjod de nyid stong rtsa brgyad dang / phyag rgya yang stong rtsa brgyad brtsams na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang /
bdag kyang 'bar ba dang / snying dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyag spyi bor bzhag ste legs so
legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam pa dang / gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so/ /sgrub pa dam pa byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi rigs 'di
dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang
khyod la 'grub kyi/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rjes su zungs shig dang / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid
la bsam pa de thams cad rjes su sbyin no/ /'di ni/ khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mngal du gnas pa las yongs su grol bar
'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang / khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal ba brgya stong dpag tu
med| grangs med/ bgrang du med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes tshig tu gsung ngo / /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal po me tog gam/ cod
pa na la mngon par gtor na/ des na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i
ye shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /yangs pa chen pos rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par
'gyur ro/ /sku gzugs sgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chang skal pa chung ba mnar med par gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa de lan
gcig nges par sgrub pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par bgyi'o/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dus gsum du
gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa sangs rgyas gyis
dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen pos byin gyis brlabs de rig sngags 'chang sgrub na rmi lam du bdag gis gzugs mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing / yid la bsam pa thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi zhing / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o/ /dri ma med par rnam par
thar pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyur ro//
skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/ sgo kun tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa
'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral zhing nyon mongs pa dang
bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdol pas kyang dad pa dang / gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / cho ga gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
par bgyi/ rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ba stsal bar bgyi na/ mir gyur ba dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal
te| dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing / yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la the tshom
dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de lta mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can tshe gcig pu pa de la rig sngags grub pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bdag gis
rngo mi thogs lags so/ /gang yang phyi ma'i dus na dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gya gyu ba/ yid gnyis su mi byed
pa| ngo gnyis can/ ser sna can/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ pha rol gyi rdzas la brkam chags can/ gsang sngags rku ba/ yi ge rgu ba/ gdug pa/ phrag dog che ba/ khengs
pa| gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa/ mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ston pa'i bla ma la ma gus pa/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ston pa la ma gus
pa nyid brkam chags can/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la bskyang bar bstan pa'am/ dngos grub bstan par rngo mi thogs so//
bdag la yang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu mang du 'byung ste/ bdag la yang sun par bgyid pa/ bdag la yang ma gus par bgyed pa/ kun nas mnar
sems dang / sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag la yang 'khu bar bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
dkyil 'khor dang / spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni/ smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam
tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol ba zhes rigs par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par
bgyi'o| |de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de dag gis bdag la smad pas
sems can de dag gi sdig pas gdol ba zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang de dag ni/ smod par 'os par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshig pa ka ba tshig
pa lta bu| rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren gyis zin pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig
rten las 'das pa chud gzhan pa/ rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni/ bdag gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongs su spangs pa ma lags
so| |de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spangs
pa| rdo rje dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad spangs pa/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig yongs
su spangs pas bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bdag gis ma nongs te/
bdag gis yongs sum spangs so/ /de lta mod kyi/ rig sngags bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa/
gsang ba bsregs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni/ des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo
bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do/ /de lta bas na/ sems can rig sngags kyi
ched du rig sngags rjes su sems pas byams pa'i sems su bya'o/ /gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rim pa phye ba dang / rig sngags gsang ba rnyed par
'gyur ba de la des gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyid pa chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/ ston pa'i
gus pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / rkang yang gtang bar bgyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / stan dang / bgo bas rim gro dang / mchod
pa bgyi ste/ de la ni/ bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ rje dpon dang / bla mar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi/ dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gi gzugs mthong ba rjes su
stsal bar bgyi/ rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bdag rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba ni/ ji ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa stsal ba ltar dngos grub kun tu mchi
bar bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis zhags pa dang / lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde ba
gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad du sgrub
pa dang / dngos grub dang / mchog stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tsan+dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs
mthong ste/ de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyis te/ bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o/ /gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas
par mtshungs par rig par bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs de ni/ ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o/ /gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pa'i spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /lha thams
cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs 'dir rin po che sna
bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod pas brgyan par rig par bgyi ste/ de la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du
gtogs pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang des dri
sna tshogs la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ sku shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin du zhal
gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni/ zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan
'chang ba/ zla ba ma can no/ /zhal g.yas pa ni/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs can/ gzugs bsgyur ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag
med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /g.yon pa ni/ zhal khro gnyer can/ khros pa'i lta stangs su lta ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor
tshugs 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ g.yas phyogs zla gam can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan
pa| zhags pa thogs pa/ pad+ma thogs pa/ mdud rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra ste thogs pa/ dbugs 'byin pa/ rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs
pa| pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o/ /g.yon na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad
kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la kha bltas nas pus mo btsugs te 'dug par bya'o/ /lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis tshad dang ma 'dres par spyan dang / smin ma dang /
mchu dang / sen mo'i gnas su sbyar bar bya'o/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu ba/ de nas rdzas bshad par bya ste/
'jigs pa med pas spos kyi rigs tsan+dan dang / ta ga ra dang / pu shel tsi dang / li shi dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang / spri ka dang / rgya skyegs dang / kha pa Ni kha dang / spang spos
dang / na la da dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / sgron shing dang / gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / kun tu ru dang / sha kha ra dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / du ru ka dang /
til mar dang / spra tshil dang lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu mnyen pa mchog 'di gtsang ba gtsang sbra spyod pas thub pa 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug dge zhing shin tu dul ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin tu mdzes par bya'o/ /gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan gcig sgrub pa ni/
mchog yin te/ 'di yongs su rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad la mngon du gtor te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las brtsam mo/ /de nas rig sngags
'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te shin tu khrus byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa/ gsal ba ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil
'khor bzang po legs par byugs pa shin tu gsal ba bya'o/ /dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa la tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis dbus su las kyi
dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar bya'o/ /'dir pad+ma yang byas te/ 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa ge sar dang snying por bcas pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu bzang ba/ tsan+dan dang
gur gum gyis bri bar bya ste/ der tshon rtsi gzhan ni/ spyad par mi bya'o/ /bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu dang / gtor ma thams cad dri sna tshogs
kyis bsgos pa dang / ci yod pa'i gtor ma bzhag ste/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba'i gnas sam/ dgon pa'am/ khyim mam/ gang du gnas
par 'gyur ba der khru gang tshad dam/ khru do'am/ khru gsum mam/ lhag par yang bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdug spos dang / tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / kun
tu ru'o| |ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o/ /me tog phreng ba dgram bya zhing / /dri dang / byug pa de nyid dang / kun tu mar me'i phreng ba'o//
de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma'i ge sar gyi steng du bzhag pa la rig sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs
par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong brtsam par bya'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung zhing sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur/ rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chang legs
so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub pa'o/ /don yod pa chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub dang / thams cad du dgos pa grub pa
de kho na nyid grub bo/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub pa'o/ /khyod kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog tu sgrub bo/ /zhes sgra 'byung ngo / /de nas
rig sngags 'chang gi dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gzhug pa dang / dam tshig ni/ 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o//
de nas rig sngags 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du bzhag la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston cing / ji ltar bsam pa thams cad ston par
'gyur te/ de'i mdun du tsan+dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor byas la/ tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /de nas thal ba la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/
rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing / thal ba de nyid dang / yungs kar gyi byug pa phyogs bzhir gtor na/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji ltar de ltar 'jig rten
thams cad kyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dri chu dang yungs kar gyis mngon du
phyogs par gtor na phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /thal ba des rab tu bdugs te dur khrod kyi nang du zhugs na/ 'byung po'i dbung dang / 'khor dang
bcas pa mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te
bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed do/ /rang la byugs te tshogs kyi nang ngam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na/ ston pa mthong ba ji lta ba de ltar rig sngags
'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ /phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ don dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /thal bas lus bskus te
klu'i mtshor zhugs na/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas
par 'gyur ro/ /rang la byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdun na
nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid
'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /gang dang gang la thal bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad bral bar 'gyur/ sdig
pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi
'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byas pa mi gzo ba/ gsang sngags kyi gdol pa/ ma gus pa/ bla ma mi byed pa/ rlom sems dang nga rgyal dang ldan pa/ bdud
kyi phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti mug can/ gsog pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de dag yun
ring por thar pa mi rnyed pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye
ba rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol chud gson pa dag ni/ ma gtogs te/ de lta mod kyi/ 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug
bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems can dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'i yid la bgyi bskal pa bgrangs par yid la
bgyis pas dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ /de lta mod kyi/ sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub ni/
byams pas 'thob ste/ byams pa dang gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/ byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la
de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjes su gnang ngo / /mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyi gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po
mthong ba dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugs su mngon sum du mthong ba mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang
mnyam par mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs pa kho nar khong du chud par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o/ /de nas phyir
mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po
chen po'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum du gshegs
pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams
cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod pa na cho ga 'di
bsgrub par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas/ bya ba dang bcas pa des myur ba dang / shin tu myur ba dang / mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du cho 'phrul rmad du
byung bar gsang ba ston par mthong ste/ 'di la som nyi dang / nem nur bskyed par mi bya'o/ /the tshom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i chad tsam/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ shin tu
tshad dang ldan pa/ cha byad mdzes pa/ cha shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag
g.yon pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang ring srel gyis bkang pa/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma
dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / g.yon na dngul las dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid
tsam 'dud pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/ /steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dang / g.yon na shAkya'i rgyal po skyil
mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o/ /'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par bya zhing gnad dang gnad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ skra dang /
dpral ba dang / smin ma dang / shangs dang / snyan dang / zhal dang / mgul pa dang / dpung pa dang / nu ma dang / rked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang /
zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad du mdzes pa/ sku chu zheng gab cing mthon dman ran pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po 'chang bar bya'o/ /las
shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig nas rig sngags 'chang gis rgyu
skar bzang po'i zla ba nya ba'am/ tshes brgyad dam/ bco lnga'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi nyi ma dang mthun pa rnyed nas dkyil
'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni/ gru bzhi la cha legs par phyed pa/ ko la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa/ khru gsum par
rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ chung ba dang / lhag par mi bya'o/ /legs par byugs pa/ shin tu 'jam pa/ snyi ba/ mnyen pa/ dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam
par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa/ thig gdab pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su cha rnam pa brgyad du phye la/ lho'i gra'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sna tshogs kyis
bri'o| |de nas phyang gi grar bri ba ni/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/ /de nas nub kyi grar bri ba ni/ nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil
'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/ /de nas shar gyi grar glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shin tu
gsal bar bri'o/ /shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor ri bo po Ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs
kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum cu gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor ni/ spos
kyi ngad ldang dri za'i tshogs kyis gang ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes pa bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyi gnas me tog sna tshogs dang /
khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba bri'o/ /legs par zin nas kun tu ni/ mdung rtse gsum pa'i bar phreng ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs nyid gzhag go /nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhag na/ spyi'i rigs grub bo/ /lha mo sgrol ma ni/ ri bo po Ta la la gzhag go /ri rab la ni/ gos dkar mo'o/ /dpe med ma ni/ ti
se'i rtse mor ro/ /sgrol ma bdun ni/ spos kyi ngad ldang la gzhag go /shar phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor ni/ srin
mo ral pa gcig ma srin mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu rgyud lu gu rgyud bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /byang phyogs kyi
sgor khro gnyer can mo khro gnyer can bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de nas 'jigs pa med pas mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog can ring
bsrel dang ldan pa don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/ /grar rgyal po chen po bzhi
stobs po che go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs pa gzhag par bya'o/ /gang zhig thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa/ spyi'i rigs
yang dag par 'byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa
bsgrub pa'i ched du cho ga sna tshogs dran pa bya'o/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rnam thar dkyil 'khor de nyid ni/ /legs par sgrub pa mthong tsam dang / /bklags pas
dngos grub bla med 'gyur/ /de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yis/ /sgrub par byed pa ni mkhas so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma
bgos pas dar dang ba dan sna tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o/ /ro bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos snod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang / gser dang dngul
gyi snod du mchod yon 'bul zhing ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'bras bu sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /gzugs rnam
pa sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma yang bsgrub bo/ /me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bum pa dang / rdze'u dang / phor zlum dang /
kham po dang / dbyib mo dag kyang dgang ngo / /kun tu dri chus bsgos pa yi/ /rgya chen gtor ma kun tu'o/ /sna tshogs pa yi pog phor nas/ /sna tshogs bdug spos
dbul ba ni/ /a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / sprig ka dang / du ru ska dang / kun tu ru dang / gu gul dang / sgron shing dang / shri be TaSh+Ta ka dang / sa ra dang / sa ra dza ra sa
dang / de bzhin du ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / sha kha ra'i bdug spos 'di dag ni/ rab tu phul/ thams cad du sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /sna tshogs
pa yi dri dag dang / /phye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid/ /shes rab can gyis kun tu ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag la gzhag par bya/ /lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog
dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / byi ru dang ni mu tig dang / /in+d+ra nI la dag dang ni/ /pad+ma rA ga dag kyang ngo / /gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin
po che sna bdun can yang gra bzhir gzhag par bya'o/ /'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor du kun tu gtor ro/ /kun nas me tog phreng ba ni/ /rmad byung
dkyil 'khor la gzhag cing / /kun nas mar me'i phreng ba dang / /dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la gzhag /rig sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas yang bzlas
brjod rgya cher byas la cho gas srung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ bla
ma mkhan po'am/ slob dpon nam/ pha'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po la dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba bstan te/ mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma
mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dbul bar byas la bskor ba bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
thams cad la byams pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag ste skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la mi smra bar ya mtshan du snang bar mthong gi bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor kun tu khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing / yungs kar dang / chu dang me tog gis dkyil 'khor kun tu lan brgya rtsa
brgyad gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings la dkyil 'khor du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri phul nas mgon po 'jig
rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o/ /de nas mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa mchod pa
byed do/ /de nas lha mo sgrol ma dang / kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la'o/ /de nas ri'i rgyal po rnams la gnas pa'i ri'i lha
thams cad la'o/ /thams cad dang sgo bsrungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhi kun tu rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu mchod nas skyil mo krung bcas te
'dug la 'jigs pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran
par bya zhing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ /gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa gzhi g.yo zhing gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la snying
dga' ba dang / sems bde ba thob bo/ /'od zer bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkram pa 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul
bar 'gyur dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas
pa'i lha dang / lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas legs so zhes sgra grags par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ji ltar gser
bkod pa de ltar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo
rje dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo gser gyi mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor kyi nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur/ sku gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos bdag
nyid kyis rang gi ngo bo ston pa snang bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun tu rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang
byams pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtan por gyur pas me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag
gser gyi mdog can brkyangs te/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas lags so/ /zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig
rten gyi khams su lung bstan gyi/ rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar
du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi ngo bo phyir mi ldog pa dang / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig /dkyil 'khor 'di la
brten ba'i skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par lung bstan gyi bar du phyir mi ldog par
'gyur ro/ /ci ste sems can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdol pa smad pa dag der zhugs na/ gzugs brnyan las khrag 'dzag cing sgra mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ mgon po
'di mi mthong / sa 'di g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang la rmi lam du ston te/ de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur
ro| |ji ltar mngon sum de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de lta bas na/ rig sngags 'chang legs par
brtag cing so sor brtags te sems can dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ /sgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang / dbang po yang dag par bsdams pa/ sems can thams
cad la byams pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse pa can/ gzhan la yang dag par smra ba/ tshig brtags pa dad pa can/ gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/ mar 'dzin pa/ phar 'dzin
pa| dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba/ rtag tu bla ma la gus pa nyid kyi sems can 'di dag gzhug par bya'o/ /rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang sbra
dang ldan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang / 'dres pa dang / gcig tu bsres pa dang / cung zad bkrus pa dang / chang dang / sha dang / kun dong
dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spang bar bya zhing / rang gi kha 'phro yang spang bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni/ rtag tu spang bar bya ste/ 'di dag sgrub pa'i cho ga
la dran par bya'o/ /lag pa 'bags pas gdong la reg par mi bya/ lhung bzed dor bar mi bya'o/ /rtag tu kham phyed phyed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'bags pa 'di dag
nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o/ /gtsang mas zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong la gos pa la mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni/ mchog tu
mdzes shing / blo dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las shin tu yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs
par rdzogs na/ de la khrag 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang pas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas
bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing shin tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mgul pa nas bkrol te rig sngags 'chang gi
'gul du 'dogs par mdzad do/ /spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sras kyi thu bo zhes gsung ngo / /mgul par nor bu bcings pa tsam gyi mod la de nam
mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du
rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor chen
po rtag tu mngon du 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /rgya chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par
'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin rjes su thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro/
phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa dang / dam tshig dang / gsang ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa chen po'i 'khor los
bsgyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas
pa 'thob ste/ gang dam tshig thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang mtshungs par shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig
mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul ba ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug ring bsrel dang bcas pa de yang sa phyogs dpen pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang ma'i gdan bshams la de'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /a ga ru'i bdug
spos 'bul zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang par sngar gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gzugs brnyan smra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar gyi bzhin du de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma
'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring ba'am/ tshe yongs su zang ba de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po brje ba'am/ dgra
'thab pa'am/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'thab pa'am/ lo nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang / dgon pa dang / nad dang / na ba dang / gdon dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe
ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul
gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing / de'i thabs thams cad kyang
rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang la nyin gcig bzhin du khyad par du gyur pa rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi
ste| sdang sems can rig sngags kyi gdol pa/ rkun ma/ byas pa mi gzo ba blang ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa/ bslang
pa mi 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/ rna bar bsgrag par mi bgyi/ skra'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba yang bstan par mi bgyi'o/ /cho ga zhib
mo 'di ni/ yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang bstan par mi bgyi'o/ /rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu
yid brtan pa/ rnam par thar pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lag tu
'thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang / bla ma'i 'du shes skyed par bgyid/ bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyis gus par bgyid na/ bdag la gus pa dang / bla mar
bgyid pa lags/ mchod pa dang / brjed pa bgyid pa lags so/ /de lta pas na/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang / snying rje bskyed pas dngos grub chen
po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bgyi ba 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun mi chad par dran pa dang / bdag brjod pa tsam gyis rang
gi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing / yid la re ba thams cad dang / mchog yongs su rdzogs par
bgyi'o| |ci ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa las gzhan du bgyi na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bslus pa lags so/ /rig sngags kyi gdol pa
rkun mar gyur pa la ni/ mi bgyid de/ dam bcas pa bzhin du smra bar mi bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gtsang bar bgyid/ rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu
byams pa dang / snying rje sgom pa yid la bgyid na/ de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dge ba'i spyod pa thams
cad dang ldan par bgyi/ don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi
ba la rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs ltar thams cad kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad yongs su zad par bgyi ba'i slad du
bdag dga' bas kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /sems can gang la byams pa dang / snying rje mchis pa'i sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa
yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de lta bas na/ rig sngags 'chang gis shin tu sdom pas bsdams shing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ /yongs su gtong ba'i lag par bgyi
zhing spar chums par mi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang bar bgyi'o/ /gtong pa mang bas de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o/ /sngar legs par spyad par bgyi ste/
don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad pa bgyi zhing rtag tu yid la bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bgyi'o/ /rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
cho ga'o| |des khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po rmad byung tshe/ /kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing / /dkyil 'khor kun la dbang bskur ba/ /sdang ba thams
cad rab tu 'joms/ /bdud dang bgegs ni rnam par 'jig /gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/ /'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros/ /gdon gyi gtso bo skrod byed cing / /sdang
ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /sdang ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jigs shing / /'jigs 'phongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /rig 'dzin rnams la grub stsol pa/ /don yod
zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston/ /spyi yi rigs ni rab ston pa/ /don yod spyi yi gsang ba ni/ /rtag tu gzhan min snying po nyid/ /
khro bo'i rgyal po bla med pa/ /de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i rgyal pos khro bo'i gzugs su gnas te sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed par gyur cing lag na zhags pa thogs te

khro bo 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra badzra d+ha re b+h+yaH/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru ni ka /tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hAsta/

ka la ka la/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hAs+tha/ ma pra ba te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra ni shA tsa re/ shA ra e h+ye hi/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ki Ni ki Ni/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/

ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ hA hA hI hI hU hU/ o ka ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ prad ti maN+Di ta/ sha rI rA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/

mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru tra biSh+Nu bA sa ba/ d+ha na da/ ri Sha Na ya ka /ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke sha ra/ ma he shwa ra/

mu ya mu ya/ mu ma tsa mu ma tsa/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha na tA da na tardza na/ rA dza taskar/ ag+ni u da ka /bi Sha shas+t+ra pa ra mi mo tsa ka /ma Na ka Na/ tsa la tsa la/ bo d+h+yaM ga /la tu rA R+yas sat+ya

si pra kA sha ka ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mo nya d+ha kA ra/ pra sha ma na/ mi li mi li/ e Ne ya/ tsarma pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si na/

ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bi ta/ rat+na ku Ta ma lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si pri ta/ ka ra pu Ta/ sa mA d+hi a pra ka ma bya/ Sha Ta pA ra mi ta pa ri pU ra ka /ma hA sarba satwa san+ta

ti pa ri pA tsa ka /sarba ma ra duSh+Ta pra marda ka /sarba sid+d+ha A shA pa ri pU ra ka /a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She kai ra/ b+ha ga wAn/ a mo g+ha rA dza hUM phaT/ na mostu te swAhA/ khro
bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o/ /oM bi kri ta daMSh+Te/ a mo g+ha sa ma ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ sarba bid+ya a mo g+ha a b+hi She kai ru/ hUM mi li mi li swAhA/ de khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying
po'o| |de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas ri chen po po Ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsams
te klu'i tshogs ni/ 'khrugs so/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad ni/ dga' bar gyur to/ /sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ni/ 'bar bar gyur
to| |bdud la sogs pa sdang ba ni/ yang dag par rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni/ rab tu zhi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ni/ mchog
tu dga' bar gyur to/ /sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / thams cad ni/ mi snang bar gyur to/ /nad thams cad ni/ rab tu zhi'o/ /rim
thams cad las ni/ rnam par grol lo/ /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las ni yongs su grol lo/ /me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pa dang / dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig tu legs
so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/ /snying rje chen po can/ mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di smras zin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad
dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang / snying po dang / khro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu
smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po'i
dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ ko la'i tshad tsam shin tu rnam par mdzes pa'i gru bzhi dang / sgo
bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang / rta babs dang / mda'i kha khyer dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rnam pa dag kyang bya ste/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par mdzes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil
'khor thig gdab par bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod gsar ba dang / bir gtsang mas dkyil 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o/ /dkyil 'khor snying po rnam dbye ba/ /
dbus su legs par rnam phye la/ /kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / /rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod/ /dbus su 'khor lo rta bri ba/ /shin tu blta sdug 'khor lo dgod/ /
dbus der rgyal ba gzhag par bya/ /shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/ /g.yas su khro bo'i rgyal po yi/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po/ /g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin
gzhag pa/ /rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag /de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni/ lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / go cha dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / dgra
sta lu gu rgyud can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang /
dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang / dbyug pa dang / ril pa spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya
ba ni| mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug pa sbrul se ral khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma
yin dang log 'dren la bsdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo'i co to nas 'dzin pa dang / khrag gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/ glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa'i stod
g.yogs 'phyang ba dang / smad g.yogs can bya'o/ /mtha'i grar pad+ma dang / rdo rje gzhag pa ni/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba can shin tu bzang po gzhag par bya'o/ /shar phyogs
kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed mig de'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng ba can gzhag par bya'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor ki la ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra
sta dang / zhags pa phyag na thogs par bya'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni/ phyag na pad+ma thogs par bya'o/ /byang
phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i cho gas rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na thogs pa'o/ /de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan+dan gyi chu gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang /
ga pur gyis bsgos pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos dkris shing brgyan pa/ rin bo che sna bdun can rtag tu gzhag par bya'o/ /ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs
yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya/ rnam pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan bar bya'o/ /bdug spos kyis bkang ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang /
me tog dang / dri dang / byug pas mchod par bya'o/ /ji srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams cho gas bsrungs la/ de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don
yod pa'i khro bos dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig
rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam
tshig dang / dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /gang bsam pa dang / gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi
rjes su zhags par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang /
gdug pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par
'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas khang phug dri ma med pa dang / nam
mkha'i rjes su rgyu ba dang / chu na rgyu ba dang / nags dang / skyed mos tshal na spyod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang
par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig de la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams
cad kyi de dag gi gnas dang / lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig ba rnams 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad
tsam byas te/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od
dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zla ba dbu la thogs pa/ zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs/ g.yon pa dang g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs/ zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/ spyan
gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas su lha mo sgrol ma me tog 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad
kyis brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du
rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa/ lag na pog phor dang bgrang phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/ /gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun du tsan+dan dkar
po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum gyis mchod pa bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhag ste de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /de nas
gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo par 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur/ 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/
phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsam pa dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de yang bdag nyid 'bar
bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing don yod pa yangs par snang ba/ dngos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig
sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang / rgyal por
'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gi rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur zhing / tshe'i tshad bskal pa
dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu
'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni/ de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgya stong bya'o/ /bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal
po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
mig 'phrul dang / bzhad gad dang / phur pas gdab pa dang / sreg pa dang / 'phang ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgyu ma bstan pa dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan
srung ba dang / mi snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang / nor sgyur ba smra ba dang / sa gzhi smra ba dang / rgyu ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu rgal ba dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang /
mtshon cha las rgal ba dang / rmongs byed dang / rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang / ro langs bslang pa dang / shi ba gso ba dang / zla
ba dang / nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / bden pa bstan pa dang / nad la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin
dgug pa dang / srin po dgug pa dang / klu dang / lha dgug pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dgug pa dang / gtang ba dang / dgos pa la sogs pa thams
cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /bklags pa tsam gyis las dang / dngos
grub dang / sgrib pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems
can thams cad phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur te/ skal pa ngan pa dang / nor chud za ba dang / mi 'grub
pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin no/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas bzung ste
bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang skal pa mngon du 'gyur te/ tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po dang / che ba nyams su myong
bar 'gyur ro/ /zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /rked pa'i gnas nas bzung ste bzlas brjod brgya
rtsa brgyad byas na/ sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyis
ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te khro bo'i rgyal bo'i dbu la bcings na/ nges par dbang bskur ba 'thob
par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /'phags ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu gcig pa/ de
nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nam mkha' las babs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun
du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang / bkur sti mngon du byas te bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod
pa byas so/ /me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnam pa sna tshogs
kyis mchod nas lan bdun bskor ba byas so/ /ri po Ta la'i gzhal med na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag la yang mchod pa byas so/ /'khor chen po de dag la yang mchod pa byas so/ /
lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang / mngon du bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje 'gying bag can/ brjid bag gi 'gros kyis langs nas bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shin tu
zab pa| shin tu rtogs par dka' ba rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin tu zab pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu shin tu mi g.yo zhing mi 'gul ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shin tu
gzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ri mor sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang / sgrub pa gsang ba
rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba mang bo dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa bklags
pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur na/ ji ltar sgrub par rngo thogs/ ji ltar nges par gzung ba rngo thogs
lags| gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad pa dang / gtor ma tha dad pa
dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / spyan drangs ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang /
dgug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus dang / smyung ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / slar gshegs su gsol
ba'am| nges par gzung ba'am/ dran par bgyi bar rngo thogs/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmongs pa chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams
sam| rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs
sam| dmangs rigs sam/ rig sngags sam/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di nges par
gzung bar ji ltar rdo thogs/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ji ltar sgrub par rdo thogs/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi snying la mchog tu ya mtshan skyes pa
de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tshom gcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ the tshom gcad pa'i slang du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ dngos
grub kyi spyod pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po sgrub pa la gang gi tshe dngos grub las dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe blo gros chen po'i chen por 'bogs
par 'gyur/ dngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang ldan par
'gyur| pha rol tu byin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos grub gang gis
sgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ gad la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam
gyi byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje/ dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge
slong dam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang
su yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig thob par gyur la/ des ring
bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / khrus la sogs pa byed cing bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / gos
dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed na/ lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang / mchog dang / bla na med pa 'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gnang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur/ ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byas pa rigs kyi
bu'am| rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo de
dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ brjod pa dang /
gus pa dang / bstod pa dang / phyag byas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de dag gi drung du bsod rnams kyi phung po
chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan gang su yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u
'am| bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab
dang thabs la mkhas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i
dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/
de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob
par yang dag par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta mod kyi/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod song la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su dris shig /dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang /
yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang
ba gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang / gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gsor zhing gdong du bltas te rtog cing 'dug go /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/
khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug ste rdo rje gsor zhing nga la ci zhig blta/ ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/ ci zhig gsol ba 'debs par 'dod/ lag na rdo rje/ de nga la smros
shig /lag na rdo rje/ khyod la skabs phye'i/ yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ shin tu zab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang
sngags mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po yongs su bsgrags pa 'di bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar nges par gzung
bar nus/ dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab che ba/ ri rab dang mtshungs par mi g.yo ba/ nam mkha' ltar mthar thug pa ma mchis pa/ shin tu rtogs par
dka' ba 'di ji ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas ni/ gang / 'gro ba ni/ gang / 'byung ba ni/ gang / sgrub pa'i gnas ni/ gang / dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni/ gang / snga ma ni/ gang / phyi ma
ni| gang / dbus ni/ gang / tha ma ni/ gang lags deng du yongs su zhu'o/ /dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / dam tshig so so tha
dad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga zhib mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ste rjes su bzung ba de nges par gzung bar ji ltar nus/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi the tshom chen po dang / mchog tu
ngo mtshar du gyur pa de thugs rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ ji ltar grub na/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / ras kyi ri mo'i
cho ga mtha' dag nges par bzung bar 'gyur ba the tshom gcad pa'i slad du'o/ /sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/ yun ring po zhig nas
spobs pa gang zhig skyes te nga la yongs su 'dri/ lag na rdo rje/ nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das ni/ kha dog gcig pa/ rtags gcig pa/ chos gcig la zhugs pa/ dbyings dang / khams dang / snying po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
bskor ba gcig pa'o/ /de lta mod kyi/ lag na rdo rje/ gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang /
lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid dang / gzhan yang
sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes so/ /de lta mod kyi/ lag na rdo rje/ de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod ba'i zhags ba byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang gcig nyid las de thams cad du rjes su 'gro'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna
tshogs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar
dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rjes su 'thob cing de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar
bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la
rnam par 'phrul ba sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de
ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam bar thar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga'
ba spong pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i
'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ni ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i
snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par lta ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang / yul la rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i
'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas
dkyil 'khor 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu phyag rgya'i rnam
pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa yang dag
par 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa dri ma med
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu don yod pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi

ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba rab tu gsal
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re re la
yang 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
snying po rnam par 'phrul par 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / sgrub pa dang / phyag rgya 'ching bas yon
tan de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
gsum dran par byed na/ lag na rdo rje/ sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba don yod pa
'thob pa dang / gzungs don yod pa 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang / bsod nams gsog pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la
rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa don
yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba don yod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang /
phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang / blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab zab mo rnam par 'phel ba don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs
pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla ma la gus par bya ba don yod pa de'i phyir lag na rdo rje/ don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes
ming du gdags pa byas na/ lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye ba 'gyur/ sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ dran pa dang blo gros rmongs par 'gyur te/ de'i
gnas na mi snang na su zhig smra bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni/ don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
ming du dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni/ don yod pa dang / ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/ /sgyu ma
lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i don yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de don
yod pa'i zhags pa'o/ /ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o/ /de'i snying po'o/ /snying po gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhags ba'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/ /gang yid la sems ba dang / gang don
du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'gugs par 'gyur/ len par 'gyur te/ shin tu ring po nas kyang ye shes kyi zhags pas 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo
rje| de bas na/ de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob pa de la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ /blo dman
par 'gyur te/ gnas 'di ni/ mi snang ngo / /lag na rdo rje/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga
zhib mo 'di'i gsang sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor kha ton nyid du gnas te/ thams
cad so sor yang dag par shes so/ /'di lta ste/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i pad+ma'i
lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang /
