don yod pa lhun po'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod ba'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i
gzungs dang / don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i
phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa yangs pa snang ba zhes bya
ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i
gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs de rnams thos pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang
sngags dang / cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton du gnas shing thams cad so so yang dag par shes te/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa'i rmongs
pa skyes par 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa zhan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa rmugs par mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par mi 'gyur/ dran pa mi brtan par mi 'gyur/
dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog gi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa sdig pa
can du mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu blo yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dran
pa dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho
ga zhib mo'i rgyal po de ltar go skabs yangs pa la gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de lag na rdo rje/ ji ltar dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshad med grangs med
dpag tu med pa'i lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mdangs yongs su dag pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang /
rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa dang / lce yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bklags pa tsam dang / mnyan pa tsam dang /
mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po 'di 'thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de la lag na rdo rje/ ji ltar rmongs
pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi/ lag na rdo rje/ yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus su ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i chen po bstan par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang /
gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid
thob par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas yongs su dga' ba yid la bgyid pas nges par gnas par bgyi'o/ /yid la
bgyid pa mchog tu dga' ba dang / ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / som nyir du gyur pa dang bral ba dang / 'gyod pa ma mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul
pa 'di ni/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la dri ma med par kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi dga' bar phul nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
song ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing / 'gying bag dang / brjid bag gi 'gros kyis song nas rang gi stan la 'dug ste bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du
bltas nas snying yongs su dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba/ snying rje dam pa rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dmigs pas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'od zer dri ma med par snang
ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul te nam mkha' la 'phags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags ba
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis nor bu rin po che de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher g.yos par gyur to//
'od zer gyi snang ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to/ /snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi lus la reg pa tsam gyis
sdig pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan song gi 'gro ba las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /gang yang
gling bzhi pa'i yi dwags dang / dmyal ba de dag la yang snang ba des snang bar gyur pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi gtubs pa med par gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongs
su thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ lus yongs su dag par gyur to/ /gang yang mnar med ba'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de
dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas dmyal ba de dag thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan te bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par pad+ma las brdzus te skyes so/ /grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dro zhing bde ba
dang / reg na bde bar gyur to/ /tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur cing reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dga' par gyur to/ /gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
song ba ri dwags dang / bya dang / tha na sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan du lha rnams kyi nang
du skyes so/ /sems can gang dag bcings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas sems can bcings pa las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /su mi 'dod pa dang / lcags
sgrog dang / lcags kyu lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa de dag kyang dum bur gyur to/ /gang snod ma yin pa de yang 'od zer des phog pas mthong ba yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /gang
sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna ma tshang ba yang 'od zer des phog pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lus mongs su dag par gyur
to| |gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pa yongs su bskams par gyur pa yang 'od zer des reg pas me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu byung bar gyur to/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od zer bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa de na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs
pa'i gzhal med khang dang / seng+ge'i khri dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang byung bar gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'od zer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang
phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi sprin brtsegs pas khebs par gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang /
cod pan dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rna rgyan dang / gser gyi skud pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /tshon kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /
lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char rab tu 'bab bo/ /tshon kha dog sna tshogs ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang / ba dan sna
tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar bo dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a d+hi muk+ta
ka dang / a sho ka dang / skya snar dang / ka dam pa dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char rab tu babs te phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
mchod pa'i las byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/ gru bzhi pa ka ba bzhi dang / sgo
bzhi dang ldan pa/ shin tu 'bar ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs la lan kan gyis yongs su bskor cing mu tig gi dra ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu sna
tshogs 'phyang ba/ gos sna tshogs kyi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ chu shing gi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgrengs pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ grar lha rdzas kyi rnga
yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ go skabs rgya che ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang ngo / /nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha rnams lha rdzas kyi me tog
dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang / sil
snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing 'khod de/ de ltar don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin rlabs rmad du byung ba chen po'i chen po
rab tu bstan cing ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i chen por bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas rnam par 'phrul ba'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying bo rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ phyag rgya dang
dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/ gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po/ bdag gi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi
rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren ba nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ /gang gis dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i snying po'i
cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te/ thams cad so so nyid
du gnas so/ /gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thams cad du mngon du gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po/ khyod kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don
yod pa'i lcags kyu smras pa legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can dag pa chen po/
khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na da smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis
bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon du phyogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi
rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos
kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba
cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad la byams pa kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig
sngags kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdang ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa' chen po mchog

sbyin lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM A kaR+Sha ya/ pad+ma ha ste/ mahA a mo g+ha aM ku shi/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ sa man+te na/ ma hA pA sha /aM ku sha /b+hu dza bar da

b+hu dza aM ku sha pA sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta muN+Da/ man+ta muN+Da la/ pa Ta la d+ha ra aM ku sha /pA she na/ d+ha rA ya/ hUM hUM ma hA brah+ma/ be Sha d+ha ra a mo g+ha rU pa/ aM ku sha d+ha ra/ ta
ra ta ra| ta ta ra/ sa man+t+ra rA ya/ ma hA muN+Da/ maN+Da la/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /tri lo tsa na/ ba shu pa ti/ ba sha d+ha ra/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pa ra ma

kA ru Ni ka /ma hA b+hu te/ shwa ra ya ma ba ru Na/ na ma skr-i ta/ ku mA ra/ trai lokya ba ra da/ ma hA ka sha ma ka /shA sa ka/ rak+Sha ka ma hA bid+ya/ a mo g+ha/ maN+Da la/ pU dzi te/ rat+na ma ku Ta/

mA lA d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA aM ku sha a k+Sha d+ha ra hUM hUM/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ sa man+ta muN+Da maN+Da laM pU ra ya/ hUM hUM/ hr-i da ya aM ku shi /a ba lo kA ya/ man sA d+ha ya

sid+d+hi ra/ A kaR+Sha ya muN+Da man+ta maN+Da la/ pa Ta la/ big+h+ni na pra sA d+ha ya mA raM/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba pra ba ki la bi Sha ma la/ mA da saR+ya/ hu ru hu ru/ ma hA a ku shi hUM hUM/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya

bo d+ha ya| tu ru tu ru/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa aM ku sha rat+na pA sha d+ha ra/ nA nA bi tsa tra/ A b+ha ra Na bi b+hu Shi ta/ a mi tA b+hA/ dzi na ma ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma pA sha aM ku sha d+ha ra/ sarba bid+ya

man+t+ra muN+Da maN+Da la/ pra ba ra sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ sa ha sra b+hu dza/ sa ha sra ne tra/ so so ma mu kha ba ra ma hA kA ru Ni ka satwa bta sa la/ sarba man+t+ra muN+Da pra sa d+ha ka /pad+ma ba
ra da sa dA na mostu te/ a mo g+ha ku sha /pad+ma b+hu dza swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'do smras ma thag tu ri bo po
Ta la chen po brag dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal du bcas ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po bkra bo/ /
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags
dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di yang so so le'ur phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang gsang sngags kyi yig 'bru
yang gser la bai DU R+yas yi ger bris pa sprin gyi rim pa na snang ste/ yi ge'i phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyin par bris pa/ thig gi phreng ba gshibs pas brgyan pa
snang ngo / /gang lag pa'i phyag rgya yang pad+ma'i nang nas byung ba/ phyag rgya bcing ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang rin po che
sna bdun gyi pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa'i nam mkha' la gnas par gyur to/ /gang ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ cho ga
dang / yo byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba bris pa yang nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa gra bzhi cha
mnyam pa rnam par phye ba/ dkyil 'khor shin tu spras shing brgyan pa/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang nam mkha' la gnas pa'o/ /dkyil
'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha pho nya dang / khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal med khang na rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa byed do/ /phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku bzhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /legs so legs so/ /rig sngags kyi mchog dam pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mtha'
dag rdzogs par smras pa gang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par
phye ba de dag thams cad don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangs so/ /'khor 'di'i nang na nam mkha'i dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi
ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/
rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes ba'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo rig sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyis
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na/ lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis kyang mdo la don
yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis
dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur
ro| |nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing nam yang brjed ngas bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag na pad+ma/ mchog tu snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po
sa pa legs so legs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas dbugs
char 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba thob bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar 'khor 'di'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de nas rig sngags
'chang gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor
'di sgrub par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/
bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bdu med dam/ skyes ba'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'am/ don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bklag par 'tshal ba dang / bstan par 'tshal ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / mtha' dag rdzogs pa
sgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol tu phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don
yod pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran par bgyi zhing / yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o/ /des na dran pa tsam gyi mdo la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug par 'gyur te/ ri bo po Ta la'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur ro// //'phags
ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/
rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rnam pa rgya chen po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di yang
bkug par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/ thams cad yid rab tu dga' bar gyur pas dngos grub dam
pa rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin tu rgya cher yid la bgyis pa de ltar sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa mnyan zhing rgya che ba dang / blo dang mdangs dri ma ma mchis pa 'jug par bgyid de/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta
bur 'jam par 'gyur zhing / kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang / 'jam pa dang / zab pa dang / tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /mi'am
ci'i dbyangs dang / sgra snyan pa dang / dbyangs mnyen pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur zhing ka la ping ka'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /ci ste dus gsum du dran par bgyid
na| gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spyi'i
dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /
sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / dmyal bar mchi ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen
po don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid kyi mod la bdag rang dang / rang gzhan kyi
dang / slob ma dang / bsnyen bkur dang / 'khor dang bcas pa mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ yongs su ma dag pa yang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri
ma dang bcas pa yang shin tu dri ma ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gti mug dang bcas pa yang gti mug dang bral
bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa dang bcas pa yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang bcas
pa dang / bdud dang log 'dren gyis yongs su zin pa yang bgegs dang log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi sdig pa yang sdig pa
dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /thun mong ma yin pa yang thun mong du gyur cing srung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs ma mchis pa yang mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po dang
ldan par 'gyur ro/ /smyung ba ma bgyis pa yang smyung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi gnas dang yul dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa yang
tshangs par spyod pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dge pa mi sbyod pa yang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos mi spyod pa yang chos
spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams mi bgyid pa yang bsod nams kyi phung ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dul ba'i spyod pa ma mchis pa yang dul ba'i spyod pa chen po
dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags mi mthong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags
mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi gnas dang / 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar mi 'tshal ba yang byang chub dang /
chos dang / dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma bsam pa yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsam par 'gyur ro/ /sangs
rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul du ma gyur pa yang byang chub kyi sa bon dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims dang mi 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang yongs su gtong ba dang mi 'bral zhing
sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa dang mi 'bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod
pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen po'i go cha brtan pa bgos par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan dang mi 'bral
zhing bsam gan chen po 'thob ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang / gsang
sngags nyams pa yang gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya yongs su tshang ba dang / cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /dge pa'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba yang dge ba'i
bshes gnyen chen po'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs rten thams cad du snying du sdug pa dang / bla mar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /sems can
thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar don yod pa chen
po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni/ thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/ mchog tu rnyed par dkar ba/ dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par bgyid do//
dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par bgyid do/ /sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / don dam
pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'dis 'dren par bgyid/ yangs par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do/ /de ltar
mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen por brjod pas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po stsol bar byid do// de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun
tu gsog par bgyid pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po ni/ mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lags
so| |de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong nga / /dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong nga / bram
ze'am| rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su mang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes ba'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo 'phags ba spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis dgug par 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs su mthong
bar 'tshal na/ des cho ga 'di bgyi'o/ /gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bsgos pa/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chus bsang ba'i mchod phyir thogs btags pas
ras dmar po'i skud pa'i mchod phyir thogs kha dog bzang po gnas bdun du yongs su gzung ste/ mtshog ma dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / gnas gsum pa dpung
pa gnyis su bcing pa/ lag ngar gnyis su bcing ba dang / de nas rked par bcings pa sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas sam/ gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dben
zhing 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ gru bzhi'i tshad tsam la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kun
nas zlum po legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud bas rnam par mdzes par thig gdab cing tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri bar
bgyi'o| |snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ khru gang tsam gyi tshad la gru bzhi pa/ rnam par phye ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi kun kha khyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o/ /dbus su
pad+ma bgyi'o/ /'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'dab ma thams cad la lcags kyu bri zhing dbus kyi snying po ge sar dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/ /'od kyi
phreng ba zlum po tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par bgyi'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gra bzhir lcags kyu dang zhags pa kun nas zlum po yang bgyi'o/ /phyi rol gyi
dkyil 'khor kun tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang bri bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gra bzhir rnam par phye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bar ba'i nang na go cha bgos pa/ drag
shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa bri'o/ /sgo bzhi rnam par phye bar yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bri bar bgyi ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'chang zhi ba'i gzugs
can bzhin 'dzum pa/ rdo rje 'gying bag can du 'dzin pa/ ri rab kyi steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor khro bo'i rgyal po drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs
par bgyid pa/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ me tog kha phye ba'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rdo rje thogs pa/ mig gsum pa ri'i steng
na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa gdong khro gnyer can/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng na 'bar ba'i
nang na lcags kyu dang lhan cig mchis pa bri'o/ /dkyil 'khor khor khor yug tu gos dang / ba dan dang / mnga' dang / rgyal mtshan kun gyis brgyar
par bgyi'o/ /tshon sna lnga'i skud pas khor khor yug tu dkri bar bgyi'o/ /gtor ma thams cad dkar po gzhag go /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun tu dngul dang / gser
gyi snod rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag go /snying po'i dkyil 'khor khor khor yug tu dngul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi dang / 'o mas bkang ba zhi dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs
bsil ba'i snod bzhi dang / dri'i snod bzhi dang / dris bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang / dngul gyi phog phor a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug spos bsregs pa bzhi
gzhag go /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu sa las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang / gtor ma'i snod bum pa yongs su bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
bdug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog phor brgyad 'jigs pa med par gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcu bzhi nas zla ba nya ches bco
lnga'i bar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas
dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /yungs kar dang / dri chab la khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor zhing dkyil 'khor
dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du mar me drug cu rtsa bzhi sbar bar bgyi'o/ /me tog ji snyed pa mang po bkram zhing kho ra khor yug tu phreng ba gzhag par bgyi'o/ /
rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang / phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og tu
gtor na/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren
dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa de thams cad bkug par
'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba'i slad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / ku be ra dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa
lcags kyu dang / zhags pas bkug par 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor kun nas srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i
'og na gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /steng nas nam mkha' la tshangs pa dang /
khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar bcas par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyis
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis phyag bgyi ba'i las bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtswa ku sha'i steng du shar phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs
par skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhag par bgyi zhing me tog re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dor bar
bgyi'o/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar gyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis pas dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ril bu re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdug
spos dbul bar bgyi'o/ /yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis la snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun tha ma'i nam nangs
kar gya nom pa/ yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar bgyid par sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sgra mnyen pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab
mo dang / ka la ping+ka dang / mi'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi sems brtan por bgyi zhing mchog tu dga' bar yid la bgyid pas bzlas
brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams kun tu mchi zhing snang bar 'gyur te/ nam
mkha'i dkyil na sprin brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 'od zer gyi gdugs su gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri zhim po rmad du byung ba 'byung bar
'gyur zhing lha'i tsan+dan dang / go shiR+Sha'i tsan+dan dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi'i dri 'byung ste/ dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu dri gnas par
'gyur ro/ /lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung ba rmad du byung ba bai DUR+ya sngon po'i sprin brtsegs pa lta bu'i bdug spos kyi sprin nam
mkha'i dkyil na gnas par yang 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun tu bdug spos kyi dri rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshangs pa bzang po'i cha lugs can/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i gzugs su lag pa bzhi pa/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ mdung rtse
gsum pa thogs shing dbugs 'byin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/ rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid kyis shin tu 'bar ba/
bzhin 'dzum zhing nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/ khru brgyad tsam gyis lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad+ma'i stan las langs te/
nam mkha' la mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po yid la bgyis pas dkyil 'khor kun tu lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid
do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag mthil shin tu
bzang po 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag stong gis legs par brgyan pa'i lag pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gis lag pa spyi bor bzhag ma thag tu de nas rig sngags 'chang de nam mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / lcags kyu rgya chen po 'od zer snang ba bkod
pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed
'thob bo/ /kun tu don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i
gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzungs thob pa'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton nyid du gnas so/ /gzhan yang pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil
'khor mtha' dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / glang po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par phye ba gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib
mo'i rnam pa thams cad kha ton nyid du gnas so/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa
rnams kyi gtso bo dang / mchog dang / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang / ji ltar yid la byed pa dang / bsam pa smros shig dang / mchog de thams cad rjes su sbyin
par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsam pa dang / mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing mchog yid la re ba thams cad sbyin par
'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar byung ba rnams smra zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
byung ba smra'o/ /lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / bde ba dang / nad dang / 'jigs ba dang / lhag par 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rang gi dmag
tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / yams kyi nad dang / mi ngas dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / gza' 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang /
rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / char ches pa dang / char dkon pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang /
tshe yongs su zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'grub pa dang / mi 'grub
pa dang / bgegs dang / bgegs med pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / nor 'phel ba dang / nad mang ba dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang
yin pa de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal
ba dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnas pa ri dwags dang / bya'i skye ba dang / 'chi ba de thams cad phyin ci ma log
par smra zhes de dag gi thabs thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye ba dang / klur skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skye ba dang / rgyal po nyid dang / bud med dang /
skyes pa nyid dang / bu rnyed pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs su skye ba dang / rgyal rigs su skye ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta
bur skye ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / smad pa'i rigs su skye ba sna tshogs de dag thams cad ston cing smra la/
thabs kyang bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar bsam pa'i don de thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mngon
sum du smra zhing thams cad gtam zer ro/ /gzhan yang 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang / sgrub pa dang / grub
pa de thams cad de la stsol bar bgyid de/ 'di lta ste nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / mig sman gyi dngos grub dang / mi snang ba dang / mig 'brul
dang / gter smra ba dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang / spro ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / ro langs pa dang / nad zhi bar bya ba dang /
gos 'thob pa dang / grong 'thob pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / chu klung chen po rgal ba dang / dug bza' ba dang / gsang sngags sna tshogs sgrub pa'i dngos
grub pa dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / dran pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams
cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing / don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings
par 'gyur ro/ /bsams pa dang / don du gnyer ba dang / yid la re ba'i dgos pa de thams cad shin tu ring po nas kyang don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings nas zhags
pa thams cad drangs te lag tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ mi snang bar gyur/ rig sngags
'chang ba nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams gang dang gang du mchi 'tshal ba de dang de thams cad du mchi bar
'gyur te/ thams cad du gtso bor 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rmi lam mthong bar 'tshal na gu gul la lan brgya rtsa
brgyad yongs su bzlas nas/ nyal kar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug spos su phul te nyal na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal
po'i cha byad du mthong ba stsol cing / gang bsam pa dang / gang dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsam pa'i mchog stsol cing sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams
cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mdangs 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dgug par 'tshal zhing mthong bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe shing
arga'i 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / rgya skyegs ril bur bgyis pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ tshangs pa la bdug spos su phul na/ tshangs pa rang gi
gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing mchog 'tshal ba thams cad rjes su stsol to/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar gyi tshangs pa'i gnas dang gzhal med khang
mthong bar 'gyur zhing tshangs ba'i gzugs kyi cha byad 'chang ba'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas thams cad du mes bo yin no zhes tshig mngon par brjod par
'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad dang / 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi bud med dang / skyes ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u
rigs dang / dmangs rigs de thams cad thams cad du tshangs pa'o zhes sems par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor du bcas pas mchod pa'i sprin chen po bgyid
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sred med kyi bu dgug par 'tshal na/ des lha'i gnas su sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du nye bar sbyin sreg gi cho ga bgyi ste/ rig sngags
'chang gtsang mar gyur pa/ shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ sna ma dang shing arga'i ya ma sreg shing gi me sbar ba la gu gul dang / yungs kar dang /
sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyi'o/ /brgya stong rdzogs pa dang / sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang / legs
so legs so/ /zhes smra'o/ /sgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs shing rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i chos lugs chen pos bkug na/ rig sngags 'chang
ci zhig kyang / dgos pa ni/ ci zhig yod/ mchog ni/ ci zhig don du gnyer ba de smros shig dang / thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don
gang yid la bsams te smras pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog kyang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
yang gzugs sna tshogs pa mchog gtso bo dang / dgos pa'i las sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha chen po dgug par 'tshal na/ rig sngags
'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des lha'i gnas su mchis pa la lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang / pad+ma'i phye ma dang zhun mar bsres
pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nag po chen po dgug par
'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i ches bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba
bgyis pas pad+ma gsar pa'i phye ma dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang / yungs kar dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba brgyad stong don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod
kyis dur khrod kyi shing gi me la bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /ra khrag gi gtor ma dang 'bras thug po che'i chan gyis lha bshos dang / me tog dmar po dbul bar bgyi'o/
las 'di yongs su rdzogs par bgyis na/ nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba gsol
te| rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /sgrub pa'i cho ga bzang po 'dis bdag yongs su mgu yi/ rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang / mchog rjes su sbyin par
bgyi'o/ /mchog 'dod pa thams cad rjes su longs shig dang / ji ltar yid la byed pa re ba de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o/ /khyod bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang
ba'i don du bdag rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar bsam pa de mngon sum
du smras na/ gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'thob cing thams cad du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam la
sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu lta zhing spyir thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang / las
su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur te/ nam yang
nyams par mi bgyid do/ /thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par
'tshal na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bsgos pas shin tu dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bsgos la/ gang na me tog
gi shing ljon pa mchis pa der mchis la zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas shin tu dri zhim pa'i dri'i shing gi me sbar ba la pu shel
tsi dang / ta ka ra dang / spang spos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/ /gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang /
tsan+dan gyi chus bsgos pa'i 'bras yos dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi snod bum pa gsar pa brgyad stsal lo/ /dkar gsum gyi gtor mas bkang ba
ga pur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum stsal lo/ /me tog shin tu dri zhim po stsal bar bgyi zhing gla rtsi dang / tsan+dan dang / ga pur dang / kun tu ru'i bdug
spos stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de lha'i gzhal med khang du mchi zhing mdun na mchis te de mthong
nas ma'am/ sring mo'am/ chung ma'am/ las byed pa'am/ mngag gzhug ma'am/ pho nya ma rnams ji lta bur ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa de la smros shig dang / ci ste mar gyur
na| de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yongs su skyong bar byed do/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / mal chas yongs su
skyong bar bgyid do/ /ci ste sring mor gyur na/ de'i tshe longs spyod thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i bud med dpag chad brgya'i pha
rol nas kyang bkug ste/ yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir yongs su spyod par bgyid cing / phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar bgyid do/ /ci ste chung mar gyur na/ de dang / lha rdzas
kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ste/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do/ /ro bro ba'i
mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod par bgyid
do| |lha rdzas kyi dri dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang /
'dru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba yongs su gang zhing mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nor bu dang / gser dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUR+ya dang / gser dang / shang+ka
shi la dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul skyogs dpag tu med pa thob pa'i gter stsol bar bgyid do/ /rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang /
phyugs dang / bran pho dang / bran mo rab tu mang po mang por 'phel zhing mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mal cha'i longs spyod sna tshogs stsol par bgyid do/ /lha rdzas kyi chung
ma'i longs spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid
'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis bag yod par bgyid ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus
pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'dzin la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o/ /rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing sems can
thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o/ /gal te las byed par gyur na/ de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba bzhin du las thams cad bgyid
de/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du las la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste mngag gzhug mar gyur na/ gnas gang du mngags pa de'i gnas thams cad du
mchis te/ dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing / skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o/ /thams cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid/ 'dren par bgyid do/ /dpag tshad stong
gi pha rol nas bud med 'gugs par bgyid cing / nor dang / 'bru dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / rta dag 'gugs par bgyid do/ /slar yang gtong bar bgyid do/ /brag
yod pas bsgo bar bgyid de/ bdag nyid shin tu ring po'i yul dang / gnas su 'phen par bgyid/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas
su 'degs par bgyid de/ der srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur bar bgyid do/ /ci ste pho nya mor gyur na/ phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i 'jig rten du mchi'o/ /klu'i
'jig rten du mchi'o/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi gnas su mchi'o/ /mi'am ci'i gnas su mchi'o/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su mchi'o/ /gnod
sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas su mchi'o/ /'byung po'i gnas su mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya'i bya ba bgyis nas slar mchi'o/ /skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du mchi zhing
slar mchi'o/ /skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad du phyin nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do/ /ji srid sa'i 'og gi bar du 'jug cing phyir yang
mchi'o| |bya ba shin tu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bag yod pas yang las thams cad bgyi ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du mchod yon dang / rkang pa bkru ba stsal
bar bgyi'o/ /thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du byin cing bya ba 'grub pa/ bla na ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang
des gzhan gyis ma reg pa'i shing leb gsar pa la gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing / gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma
mchis pa gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgos pas 'o ma dang / 'bras thug po che'i
chan gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /shing kA ra bI ra'i me sbar ba la yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa
brgyad bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / me tog dmar po stsal na/ gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te rig sngags 'chang slongs
shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga'i ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yin no/ /nga'i las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces
brjod par bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo de ltar legs so zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe yungs kar dang / gu
gul la yongs su bzlas nas mer gtor na/ de mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ dbyig stong stsol bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par
'gyur| rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par 'tshal nas rig sngags 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par
bgyi'o| |rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan gcad par bgyis la/ de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te
mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu bzlas brjod yungs kar la bzlas pas bu mo de la
lan stong rtsa brgyad brdeg par bgyi'o/ /las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis
te| gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang der dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ thams cad du mchi bar 'gyur/ ji srid
'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste srin po dang / srin mo 'gug par 'tshal na/ gu gul dang / ba lang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i
lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs na srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang /
srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gdugs gcig bzhin du dngul chu srang khri stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi ste/ cha gcig ni/
dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o/ /cha gnyis pa ni/ nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin par gtang ngo / /srin mo rnams la zan dang / tshod sngon rlon pa'i gtor ma stsal bar
bgyi'o/ /de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu mgyogs bar 'gyur te/ shugs chen pos dgos pa thams
cad sgrub cing nam yang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /gtor ma gtsang ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /ci ste sha za dang / sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na/ ba lang gi mkhris pa
dang / de'i so dang / gu gul dang / shing arga'i 'o ma sbyar te lam gyi bzhi mdor bdug par bgyi zhing / lhag ma dang 'phags pa'i gtor ma stsal na/ sha za mo de mchi
zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing /
skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/ /dus gsum du gtor ma lhag ma'i gtor ma sgo drung du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /nyin gcig bzhin du
gser gyi dong rtse brgya sngags su 'jog par 'gyur te/ des thams cad zad par bgyis nas phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rgyal po'i btsun mo dgug par 'tshal na/
rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des yungs kar dkar po dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / gi'u wang dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang /
rgyam tsha dang / lan tshwa bsres pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas phye ma'i rdzas su bgyis la yungs kar dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / sbrang
rtsi'i sa bon lan gcig mnyes la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ rgyal po'i sgo'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ lam po che'am/ grong khyer gyi sgor
gtor na/ gang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do/ /rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug cing dbang du
'gyur ro/ /thams cad du ci bgyi ba bya ba bgyid cing / bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang bslangs pa de ster te/ dngul dang / gser dang / gos dang /
rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / spud pa dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / 'bru la sogs pa stsol bar bgyid do/ /gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsgo ba bgyid
par 'gyur ro/ /de'i yul gcig tu yang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bram
ze dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nas dang / til dang / 'bras sA lu dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong
rtsa brgyad bgyis nas rig byed bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod par bgyid par 'gyur zhing bram
ze thams cad la dbang bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ til dang / 'bras thug chen po dang / sran mud ga dang / zho dang /
sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bgyis na/ thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ /
thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar bgyid do/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bgyid de ci bgyi ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dmangs rigs dbang du bgyi bar
'tshal na/ lan tshwa dang / 'bras sA lu'i phub ma dang / su mu kha'i sa bon dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyis na/ dmangs rigs
thams cad bran du gyur nas gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad zlog par 'tshal na/ rig sngags
'chang des shing mngar gyi shing gi me sbar ba la/ sa bon bdun dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang /
dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / pas kyi dgra thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlog dang 'tshal na/ shing tsher
ma can gyi me sbar ba la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs na/ pha rol
gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa zlog par 'tshal na/ ske tshe'i sa bon dang / gu gul dang / b+heng+ga'i sa bon dang / zhog chu dang / zhun
mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyis na g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du son pa'i sems can thams cad slar zlog par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du rgyal ba thob
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bgyi bar 'tshal te/ k+She ma ka dang shing
mngar dang / /tsa rong dang ni gu gul dang / /mu ra yak+Sha mur dang / /b+hu ta ka shi mnyam bar gzhal/ /phub ma dang ni ba la ka /khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang / /sprul
lpags dang ni yungs rnam gnyis/ /b+ha ga'i sa bon ba lang mkhris/ /nya dang legs par sbyar bgyis te/ /ra yi gcin gyis bsgos ba la/ /lcags kyu'i gsang sngags
bzlas pa yis/ /bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di/ /thams cad du ni rigs pa ste/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gdon/ /gang dag sa steng gnas pa rnams/ /bdug pa'i dri
'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing / /mi bzad gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu dag na g.yo 'gyur zhing / /sum cu'i lha dang ri rab g.yo/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i gnas
dag dang / /sdang ba'i srog chags chen po 'tshig /gzhan yang sna tshogs dug bcas pa'i/ /srog chags thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba/ /dri tsam gyis ni dogs pa med/ /
bdug pa 'dis ni bdugs byas na/ /der ni rim nad mi gnas te/ /nyin gcig pa yi rims dang ni/ /nyin gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rims/ /gang yang mi bzad khyab 'jug
rims/ /de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing / /skad cig gis ni gtan nas 'joms/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam
po nyi shu gsum pa/ de nas mig bsku ba'i sman brjod par bya'o/ /gdon thams cad 'joms pa gang gis mig la bskus pa tsam gyis gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par
'gyur ro/ /ro stod kyi nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur te/ mig la bskus pa tsam gyis de thams cad med par 'gyur te dogs pa mi bya'o/ /mig gi nad ni/ ling
tog dang / skya bor gyur pa dang / rab rib dang / chu bur can dang / chu zag pa dang / tshag po dang / ha sa ra dza dang / byis pa'i mchi ma dang / mig tu
sme ba byung ba dang / khrag dang / rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / 'brum bu dang / g.ya' ba dang / mig bskams pa dang / ldongs pa
dang / klad pa na ba dang / klad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba dang / kha nad dang / kha na ba dang / dpral ba na ba de dag thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /mig sman gyis
mig bskus pa tsam gyis rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / nad thams cad sel ba dang / mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang / sdig pa
thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na mig sman mchog tu grub pa/ bgegs thams cad sel ba dang / ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
pa| sems can thams cad la dbang byed pa/ thams cad du rgyal bar byed pa/ mig sman rtag tu mchog tu dkon pa/ gsad pa la thug pa thar bar byed pa/
btson ra nas gang thar par byed pa/ rgyal po dag gang la khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu du bzhin yongs su skyong zhing gnas
ba| dug thams cad mod la med par byed pa ni/ mig sman mchog yin no/ /bsam pa ngan cing sdang ba'i sems can dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang 'gyed
ba dag mig sman gyis bskus pas/ mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gnas so/ /ma he gtum po dang / glang po che dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / steng kha mthon po nas g.yang du
ltung ba dang / me'i phung po dang / khyim rdib pa dang / g.yang sar ltung ba rnams mig sman gyis mig bskus pas mthong na zhi bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang bya ba
rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ 'di la dogs par mi bya'o/ /yung ba dang / skyer pa dang / na le sham dang / pi pi ling dang / shi ri ga be ra dang / 'bras bu gsum dang /
ut+pal sngon po dang / ldong ros dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i mig sman dang / rgyam tshwa dang / spang sngos dang / rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang / dung phye dang 'di rnams lhan cig
tu phye ma zhib mor byas pa la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te ga pur dang / gla rtsir bsnan pa'i mig bsku ba'i sman lcags klu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i gsang
sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te mig bskus na/ dri ma thams cad sel cing sdig pa dang / gzhan sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mun
pa thams cad kyi nang du nyi ma bzhin du skye ba thams cad kyi nang du mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ril bu bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa thams
cad rnam par 'jig pa/ nad thams cad sel bar 'grub pa/ bgegs thams cad med par byed pa/ gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ sgrib pa thams
cad rnam par sbyong ba/ mod la dug thams cad med par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad sel ba/ bcings pa thams cad gcod par byed pa/ g.yul thams
cad las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rab tu kun thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rgyal po'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/ nor dang
'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ba/ rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu dang / me dang / dug dang / glang po che med par byed pa/ sbrul ma rungs pa dang / byi ba'i dug gis 'jigs
pa dang / khyim 'jigs pa dang / ri snyil ba dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / dom la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba dang / gnod pa dang / bcings pa'i tshe 'gro bar
dka' ba 'byung ba dang / nad dang rims 'joms pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par byed pa/ tshe dang nad med par byed pa 'phel ba/ skyes pa dang /
bud med dang / gzhon nu ma rnams mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang gis ril bu bcangs na/ thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing gdon 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rnam
par log 'dren gyis ma yin no/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed ma rungs ba rnams ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis phyogs bcur
bros par 'gyur ro/ /'dir byis pa gsod par mi byed do/ /sman 'di la regs tsam gyis khyim der dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / na ba thams cad dang / nad las yongs
su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / 'brum phran mched pa dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu mched pa dang /
sha bkra la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus thams cad du zhugs pa'i nad la chu dron po dang / 'thungs pa tsam la sogs pa sa yongs su byang bar 'gyur
ro| |'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa chen po las thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas thams cad du song ba la
sbyar ba byas na/ thams cad 'khor bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdzas su bya ba ni/ pu shel tsi dang / tsan+dan dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / rdo dreg dang / pa tra dang / tsha ma ka dang /
shi mi dang / pad+ma pa tra dang / ut+pa la dang / na la dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sug smel dang / btsod dang / su ga ri dang
ra dza N+ya rnam gnyis dang / spri ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gur gum la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang / de dag kun bsres te zhib mor btags la kha ra dang /chu dang
sbyar bas ril bu byas la gsang sngags brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te grib ma la bskams pa de ni/ sman grub pa yin te/ thams cad rgyal bar byed cing dag ba
yin no/ /rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la ri lu mchog bskus te/ gnas mthon por song ste dung gi sgra dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga ji srid du thos pa de srid tsam du 'jigs
pa med par 'gyur ro/ /dug dang bcas pa ni/ thams cad dug med par 'gyur te/ dogs pa mi bya'o/ /nad thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / yams kyi nad
dang / lo nyes thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bde zhing lo legs pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems can sdig pa can dmyal ba
la gzhol ba dag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang ste/ bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gos la bdugs na/
bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing thams cad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang / don grub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /nor dang 'bru rab tu 'phel zhing dgos pa sgrub po
bla na med pa yin no/ /thams cad mchod pa dang / rtag tu tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po gang la khros pa las rgod cing smra bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med rnams
kyi gnang chen du 'gyur zhing /rtag tu nad med par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dpal dang ldan pa dang / gzi
brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / shi nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la mchis pa ni/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
lcags kyu zhes bya ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po
lta ba dang / sgrub pa dang / bklags pas 'grub pa/ don yod ba chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi dam tshig grub
pa lags so/ /gang gis pad+ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / cho
ga dang / bde bar sgrub pa mtha' dag ni/ rigs kyi spyi thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rjes su 'jug pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po mchog dang po rdo rje
rin po che rtse mo'i mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la thams cad du rjes su zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du byin gyis brlabs
par 'gyur ba de rig sngags 'chang ba de thams cad mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sdig
pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o/ /grub pa yang dag par rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can dag pa chen po/
khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing shin tu yongs su dag pa yin te/ legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang /
dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstan par bya ba shod cig /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i grub pa dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so/ /ngas kyang de
bzhin du de dag byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don
yod pa'i rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa/ sgrub pa dam pa ni/ sa dang ba'i lci bas dkyil
'khor gru bzhi bya ba ni/ shin tu mdzes pa shin tu 'jam par bya'o/ /tshon sna lngas rnam par dbye ba ni/ gra dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /tshon sna tshogs kyis bri ba
dang / dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa ni/ mnyam par thig gis dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhir cha dbye bar bya'o/ /chu zheng du khru bzhi tshad tsam
du dbye bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po ni/ tshad khru do bar byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i sgal bu dang / tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying
po la pad+ma dkar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o/ /pad+ma bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / pad+ma gnas par bya ba ni/ klu mgo gdengs ka 'dra ba lcags kyu dang
bcas pa dang / lag pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang / 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o/ /tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o/ /pad+ma kha phye ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal
bu ni| lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sgal bur bya'o/ /nang dang phyi'i bar du ni/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /lcags kyu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni/ zla ba yid du 'ong
ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o/ /zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni/ mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o/ /mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i phyi rol
gyi sgal bu ni/ phyag rgya phyag na thogs pa bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / kun la 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
bri bar bya'o/ /phyag gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni/ stegs bu dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni/ 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o/ /snying po'i dkyil
'khor gyi grwar ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi go bgos pa lcags kyu dang / mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung
phyed du bcas te pad+mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad+ma la 'dug par bri bar bya'o/ /sgo
bzhi'i gnas su pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni/ shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang / rig sngags kyi lha
mo rnams bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni/ me tog gi stegs bu 'dra bas bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ kun tu ba'i lci bas bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil
'khor de la nas phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba dang / dar btags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug pa'i chu dgang ba dang /
bdug spos snod kyis brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / dri chab dang / mchod yon gyi chab dang / 'bras bu dang / yon chab dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi
me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog gis 'jigs pa med bar brgyan par bya'o/ /mu tig dang / byi ru dang / rin po che bai DUR+ya sngon po dang / margad dang / pad+ma rA ga
rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan to/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu dung dang / bil ba dang / rtswa dar+b+ha dang / gser dang / dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod
pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang / sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan te gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag
tu ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag pa dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum dang / bum pa dang / rte gu dang / kham phor dang / bum pa gang ba rnams byas te gzhag go /pog
phor dang / gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/ tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags/ tshon snga lnga pa'i srad
bu seng ldeng gi phur pa la btags pa gzugs par bya'o/ /kun tu mar me phreng ba dang / mar me'i sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin no/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni/ a
ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / du ru ska dang / spra ka rnams kyis bdugs pa ga bur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni/ gu gul dang /
sal ki dang / kun tu ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos gsar pa bgos te gtsang mar byas nas maN+Dal gyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang /
lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang / slob ma gzhug cing dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag
rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen mo ni/ thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi
gtsug bcing ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba dang / de dag thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sbyin
sreg dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par
sprul pa dang / las thams cad la rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar na myur zhing rdzogs par 'chang zhing / des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /bgrang phreng
dang / mkhrig ma'i gdu bu dang / srad bu se ral kha gtsang ma dang / rtsa dar+b+ha dang / yungs kar dang / chu dang bsre ba dang / rtsa dar+b+ha'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te skyil mo
krung bcas nas las bya zhing pad+ma dang / mchod yon gyi dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang / de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams
cad du nges par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste/ grub pa mchog dang / las thams cad sgrub pa dang / gang dang gang dgos pa la dran
par bya'o/ /gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol lo/ /gsang sngags gzhan dang bsre bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di ni/ dpa'
bo gcig tu bklags pas grub pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam
pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag cing sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa rnams sngar bsags
pa rnams rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang / shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can
du yong ste pad+ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar brdzus te skye ba dang / kha ton byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig 'chad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug cing gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing
spyi bor phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
ba'i bar dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du yin gyi/ gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing bla ma dang / chos can dang / nor gyi
mchod pa dang / sems can kun gyis mchod par 'os pa ni/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang 'bru 'phel ba dang / gos dang rgyan gyis
brgyan pa dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni/ phyir mi
ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / byams par 'gyur
ro| |lha thams cad kyis lus can shin tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod pa
'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyur ro/
dpal gyis dus rtag tu 'bar zhing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam
pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i
dkyil 'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang / dkyil 'khor de lta bu la me tog gcig dbul ba dang / ril bu gcig tsam gyis bdug pa 'bul ba'i sems can
de dag ni/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur
ro| |sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'bum phrag byi ba khrag khrig snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs kyis mchod
dang byas par 'gyur ro/ /bdug pa mang po rnam par phye ba'i sprin las tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po dang / go shiR+sha'i bdug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad la mchod pa'i sprin rim par phye ba rab tu 'khrigs par 'gyur ro/ /de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba rab tu sbyin par mdzad
de| rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni/ mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /de dag gis me tog dang / bdug pas
dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa chen
po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mthong bar bzhad par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rjes
su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzhin 'dzum par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen
po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams srung ba dang / sbed pa dang / skyob
pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /
de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir song ba'i sems can de dag
sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang / rims dang / mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad
dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur
ro| |dgra thams cad las phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su thar par
'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na ri dwags dang / bya dag gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa
thams cad dang / de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags pa de dag lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar
'gyur ro/ /ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod par
bya ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa 'grub pa ni/ sdig pa thams cad mod la sreg par byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa de bzhin du nad thams cad
sel ba/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gang dkyil 'khor chen
por kun tu lung bstan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa/ yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ bkra shis thams cad sgrub
pa| bsod nams thams cad gsog pa/ myur du nor dang 'bru sbyin par mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'grub pa/ bzlas brjod
'grub pa/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa/ de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams
chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nam byang chub yang dag par 'thob kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul chen po'i ras kyi
sku gzugs chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni/ phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang /
sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las thar bar 'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mi zad pa rnams las thar
