g.yas pa'i zhal drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed pa/ tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ dbu skra gyen du brjes pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ g.yon pa drag
po chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ dbu skra 'khyil zhing gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa kun tu bcings pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ drag tu bzhad pa'o//
zhi ba'i zhal ral pa'i cod pan gyi rgyan pa'i steng du sku phyed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar ba'i snying por chud ba bya ste/ sku ut+pa la sngon po'i kha dog can dbu
skra dmar po cung zad 'khyil ba/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyi gcig gis ral gri dang / gnyis pas tho ba
'bar ba can bya'o/ /phyag gcig gis pad+ma 'chang ba ste/ pad+ma'i ge sar 'bar ba'i bsnyen pa can no/ /gnyis pas lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gsum ste/ g.yas pa na'o/ /g.yon
pas khro bo chen po drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pa dbugs 'byin pa'i rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs pa/ phyag thams
cad 'bar ba'i snying po 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa bya ste/ pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bya'o/ /rgya mtsho'i snying por ri rab la gnas pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga'
bo dang nye dga' bos dkris pa bya'o/ /nya dang / chu srin dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis dkris pa/ pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gcal du
bkram pa/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'us khyab pa bya'o/ /g.yas logs su lha mo sgrol ma dbu cung zad dud pa/ thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan
thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o/ /dkar sha ma chen po thal mo sbyar te cung zad 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag
dang bcas pa bya'o/ /srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma khrag 'dzag pa'i thod pa dang / drag mo drag tu rgod pa bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying por khro bo lcags kyu la blta bzhin pa/ lag pa
bzhi pa/ lag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bya ste/
zhal khro gnyer can drag po/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bar ba'i snying por pus mo g.yas pa btsugs pa/ ral gri dang / dgra sta thogs pa/ phyag
gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu la nges par blta bzhin pa/ kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang ba/ 'od
zer sna tshogs 'bar ba bya'o/ /lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i kho ra khor yug gi steng du tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus
ngan po bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phur ma thogs te mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rgyab tu rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i shing
ljon pa bya ste/ yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma rnam par bkra bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang bya ste/ bus mo
btsugs pa me tog sna tshogs thogs shing lag na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po la steng du blta bzhin pa bya'o/ /zhabs gnyis pa'i drung gi gnas su pho nya mo bya
ste| zur mig can drag mo/ lag na ral gri thogs pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag thal mo sbyar ba/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa bya'o/ /ras ris kyi sku gzugs
kyi bya ba yongs su mthar phyin nas byin gyis brlabs te de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i drung du gtsang mas zas mi bza' bar de'i spyan sngar khro
bo lcags kyu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mtshed yon dang / zhabs bsil ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o/ /ras ris kyi sku gzugs
sgrub pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gzhan yang bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re rer ras ris kyi mdun du gtsang mas zas mi za bar de'i
spyan sngar me tog dang / bdug spos phul nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad bya'o/ /'di ni/ de kho na nyid
kyi dngos grub bklags pas 'grub pa ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi gsang ba mchog gi las bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas sku gzugs mthong ba tsam la sogs pas mtshams med pa
lnga dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams 'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams
cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa bsags pa dang bcas pa dang / bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /nad dang 'jigs pa
thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba rnam par 'jigs par 'gyur ro//
ras ris kyi sku gzugs shin tu chung ba byed pa gang yin pa de yang phan bar byed par 'gyur te/ me tog gam/ bdug pa dang / dri'am/ byug pa'am/ dkyil 'khor dang bcas
pa byed pa'am/ khrus kyi bum pa gang bkod pa'am/ rdul sel bar byed pa tsam yang rung ste/ rig sngags 'chang de'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge
slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du
dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin ba drug yongs su
rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyangs shing bskal ba'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyis gzigs 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba rjes nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye ba
dran par yang 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khro do nyod zhags pa'i snying po/ don yod pa'i khro bo lcags kyu'i gzungs
'di yang mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba rnams dang /
gsang sngags rim par phye ma dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /sangs
rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud par yang 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig
rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod par 'os par yang 'gyur ro//
rig sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad grub par yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad
du thogs pa med pa mkhas pa'i blo ru 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang ba'i phyag rgya bla na med pa
bshad par bgyi'o/ /'khor yug tu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ sa dang ba byung bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ gzings kyi rgya dang tshad mnyam pa/ shin tu tshad
la bab cing legs par rnam par 'byes pa/ legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang ldan pa'o/ /tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba dang /
dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig btab la/ /sna tshogs tshon rtsis rnam par dbye/ /sgo bzhi shin tu rnam 'byes pa/ /'khor yug them skas bzhi dang ldan/ /rta babs bzhi yis
brgyan pa ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying por yang / /shin tu rnam 'byes tshad la bab/ /khru yi tshad du bya ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam ba yi//
snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang / /mkhas pas shin tu rnam 'byes pa'o/ /pad+ma 'dab ma bcu gnyis bya/ /lcags kyu phyogs dang rtse gsum dang / /ge sar pad+ma'i khor
yug tu| |snying por gyur pa'i dbus mchog la/ /khro bo zhags pa yang bya'o/ /drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed/ /ral gri dang ni dgra sta'i phyag /ral ba'i cod pan
gyis brgyan cing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lus phyed pa dang / zhags pas kun nas dkris pa/ /mdung rtse gsum pa nam mkha' la phyir phyogs pa/ pad+ma
dang bcas la byas pa la gra grar 'bar ba'i gdong bya'o/ /mdung rtse gsum dang pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa/ /drag po'i zhal 'jigs par byed pa chen po mche ba rnam par gcigs
pa| zhal 'jigs su rung ba 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa'o/ /nang gi ri mo la lcags sgrog dang mdung rtse gsum pa'i gdong bri bar bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying po dang bcas pa/ kha
dog sna tshogs pa'i tshon rtsis bya'o/ /ri mo gnyis pa'i nang du pad+ma kha phyed bye ba/ gser 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya'o/ /ri mo gsum pa'i nang du 'khor lo'i rnam pa'o/ /mu
khyud kyi phyi rol tu lag pa'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'o/ /ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / tsa ba la dang / mdung rtse gnyis/
dung dang / tiR+ya dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / tho ba dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / nor bu dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / mda' bo che dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / rtse
lnga dang / paR+Sha sU la dang / rdo rje zur gsum dang / pad+ma dang / rtse gsum dag kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o/ /kha khyer byi rnam pas brgyan
pa la kha khyer gyi phyi rol dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su mtshan ma sna tshogs bri bar bya ste/ rigs chen po bzhi thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /shar gyi gnas su/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya'o/ /lho ru pad+ma yangs pa'i mtshan ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /nub kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du nor
bu'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams kyang bri bar bya'o/ /byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang dag par bri'o/ /shar gyi sgo ru de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi khro
bo'i rgyal po sgo ru bri bar bya'o/ /lho ru pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khro bo rnams so/ /nub tu nor bu'i rigs kyi khro bo'o/ /byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi khor bo bri bar bya'o/ /khro bo
thams cad kyi gzugs 'bar ba'i snying po/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lag pa bzhi pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bya'o/ /ri rab
la gnas pa skyil mo krung phyed pa lus cung zad bskum pa bya'o/ /phyi'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor du nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / me tog dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dag go /khor
yug tu kha khyer 'bar bas dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu brgyan pa'o/ /lhab lhub dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas kun nas dkyil
'khor la yang dag par brgyan pa'o/ /ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gtor mas gang ba'i snod ci 'byor pa dang / gtor ma'i las kyi cho gas 'byor pa dang rjes su mthun
par gzhag par bya'o/ /bum pa gang ba dang / pog phor dang / bum pa dang / bum pa dang / gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang /
dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog kun nas bcal du dgram mo/ /'bras yos dang / yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grar
mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / rin po che sna bdun rab tu dgram mo/ /dri'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa dang / legs par brgyan pa'i bum pa byas nas mkhas
pas dar bzang po bcings te dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir dri chab kyi gang ba'i bum pa dar gyis bcings pa gzhag par bya'o/ /mkhas pas sgo dang
sga ru ni/ bu ram dang / sha ka ra dang / sbrang rtsi'i ro dang / gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/ /mdung rtse gsum la zho dang / 'o ma dang / zan dang / mchog gi bza' ba ma nyams pas
shin tu mdzes pa'i gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'khur ba dang / 'khur ba zlum po nyid dang / snum 'khur dang / be Ti ma ka dang / sa rA'i la du dang / mu da ga'i la du ba
hwags dang / kha y+YA ni bzang po rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /gtor ma'i las la khor yug tu me tog bzang po dgram zhing phreng bas brgyan par bya'o/ /'bru'i rnam pa sna tshogs
bzhag par bya'o/ /'bras bu'i ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / ne'u gsing sngo bsangs dang / lo ma mdzes pa bkram ste gzhag par bya'o/ /khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / de
bzhin du a ga ru dang / tsan+dan spri ka dang / du ru kha dang / dpal gyis dkris pa dang / gu gul dang / kun tu ru dang / sbrang rtsi dang / hwags sbyar ba'i bdug pa ste/ bdug pa 'di
dag dbul bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu bdug pa 'thul ba'i pog phor gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /phyogs bcings
pa dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bya ste/ gtsug tor bcing zhing bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'jug par bya'o/ /rig sngags
dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang phyag bya zhing / bskor ba nyid dang / dam tshig kyang sbyin par bya'o/ /rtag tu gsang ba'i las byas te/ de kho na bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa
yang bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga tshad ma las dgos pa 'di dag thams cad byas nas de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis las thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med
pa'o| |rgyal ba rigs bzhis yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'gro ba bzang por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bde ba can du
'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar the tshom med do/ /lha'i gzugs shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'jig rten
las 'das pa'i dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / cho ga zhib mo'i dngos
grub dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sel ba dang / mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jig
ba dang / dgra thams cad zlog pa dang / mod la nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / thams cad du dngos grub bla na med pa gang yin pa grub par 'gyur
ro| |'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dang rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyal po dang blon por bcas pa rnams kyis
dus rgyun du bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ljongs thams cad blta zhing mchod pas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nyid du yang dge
sbyong rnams dang / bram ze rnams dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur
ro| |rtag tu tshig btsan pa dang / rtag tu lha rnams kyis mngon par bsrungs pa dang / skabs gsum gyi dbang po dang / rdo rje 'chang ba nyid dang / rdo rje snying po bdag nyid chen po
dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi
rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing mthong ba la yang dus rtag tu srung ba dang / rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o/ /
yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rtag tu smra ba nyung zhing mkhas pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub thob bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba
dang / 'jug pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang dgyes pa dang bcas pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs
rgyas rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras ji lta ba bzhin
no| |'di ni/ de rnams kyi mngal gyi gnas su skye ba'i tha ma yin no/ /rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu
rgyal ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon sum du chos nyan par the tshom med do/ /'di ni/ skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ ji srid du sangs
rgyas kyi byang chub tu rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / khro bo lcags kyu'i las brgya phrag stong rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos
bya'o| |thams cad bu lan gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ thams cad du las thams cad bya'o/ /bklags pas 'grub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te bzhin 'dzum pas khro bo chen po lcags kyu'i gzungs kyi kun tu snang
bzhin pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po lus las phyung ngo / /gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas so/ /'od zer gyi
ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa'i snying po rab tu 'bebs par 'dod pa'i don dang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs
kyi char 'bebs pa'i don dang / lha'i dri dang / mthun par gsal ba'i dri dang rjes su mthun pa'i dri rnam par bkra ba'i char rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa
ras gzigs dbang phyug la phab bo/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis lha'i chu gsal zhing rgya che ba/ dri'i 'phro bas rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i chu mu tig dang mnyam zhing
mtshungs pa/ dzA ti'i 'bras bu dang 'dra bar rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i lha'i chus yongs su dbang bskur te/ thigs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bzhu ba'i mig 'bras la
lhung ba'i chu/ skar ma las rab tu lhung ba'i gos/ de lta bu'i dpral bar thig le 'bar ba nyi ma dang / smig rgyu rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od zer sa la lhung ste bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du lhung ngo / /pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgya stong phrag kha bye ba ltar rab tu 'dzum pas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+ma'i ze 'bru ltar mnyen pa
byung bar gyur to/ /bai DUR+ya'i sdong bu nyi ma brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer snang bas 'bar bzhin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mi gang gi tshad
lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po chen po rdo rje 'chang gis chu'i thigs pa 'dab ma mnyam pa/ bai DUR+ya mchog tu mdzes shing 'bar ba pad+ma kha
bye ba de mthong nas thugs ngo mtshar dang / ya mtshan skyes te bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems dpa' chen po/ shin tu ngo mtshar ba mthong lags so/ /rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po
mthong lags so/ /sems dpa' chen po/ bdag gis ltad mo'i mchog mthong lags so/ /sems dpa' dag pa chen po/ khyod kyis bdag gi ltad mo'i the tshom med par
mdzod cig ces so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lags na rdo
rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/ bdag la don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhabs kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / lha rnams yod de/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
yongs su bskrag par bgyi'o/ /de'i mthu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di mthong ngo / /de'i mthus pad+ma 'di byung
ngo / /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bdag gi dpral ba nas phyung bas cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya che zhing che ba dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde
dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas lan
gsum bskor ba byas te mchod pa byas nas song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste byis pa'i cha byad bzung nas
bcom ldan 'das la bsil yab g.yob par byed bzhin du 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po/ don yod pa pad+ma'i dri ma med pa chu skyes
kyi zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / lha rnams smros shig/ gang gis
smras pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di rnam par
dbye ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /bsgribs pa med par dkyil 'khor mthong ba kun tu gnas par byed do/ /cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig
dang / phyag rgya rnams rjes su mthun par phyogs te gnas par byed do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i lha thams cad mdun
na nye bar gnas par byed do/ /sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang phyis kyang rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad sgrub
pa'i cho ga rnams la legs par sgrub pa'i cho gar yang 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang zhing / phyi bzhin phyi bzhin lhan gcig rjes su 'brang
bar 'gyur ro zhes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas sems
can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i don du rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog gi sgrub pa bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i
dbus su bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzum pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras so/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' rab 'byams thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rab 'byams rgya mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshal
lo| |'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa dang ma byon pa
dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba thams cad dang / rig
sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i sgrub pa grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa
grub pa rnams dang / phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+yA thA/ oM ba mi le/ bi ma la gar+b+he/ bi ma la am+bu dza pad+me sUR+ya brtsa me/ sa ha sra rasmi ki ra Ne ma hA

rasmi dz+wA la a ba b+hA Shi te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sany+tsa ra pad+mo da ri pad+ma gar+b+he/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ su bi ma la am+bu dza bi ma le ma Ne ka na ka badzra bai DUR+ya in+d+ra nI la ma ra ka ta/

pad+ma rA ga bi bi d+ha ma hA ma Ni rat+na laM kr-i ta sha rI re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ra shu/ pA sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra sa man+ta bai ro tsa na/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya

a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ku la sa ma ya pa ri pU ra Ni/ ba ra ba ra/ badzra dza la mA lA gar+b+he/ badzra badzre badzra a d+hiSh+Thi ta pad+me hUM hUM/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ tsin+dA ma Ni pA sha d+ha ra/ hu ru hu

ru pad+ma pad+ma gau ra pad+ma pA Ni ba ra de/ a mo g+ha pad+me/ oM pad+me ni pad+ma ma Ni badzra d+ha rA/ sarba ta thA ga ta ku la sA nA mya sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ma hA bi pu la b+hu dze/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/

sam+b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ b+hu ri Ni/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ sa man+ta a pa lo ki ta bIR+yA rA dze pra sa ra pra sa ra san+ta bi ma le/ sarba bid+yA maN+Da la de ba tA na maskr-i te/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya tA

ra ya| sa man+ta pa ri pU ra Ni sarba bo d+hi satwA a b+hi She tsa ni sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha a b+hi Shi k+ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya maM sarba bid+yA maN+Da la ku la sa ma ya a b+hi She kai/ sarba ta thA ga ta pA Ni

ba ra de/ pad+ma gau re pad+ma pra b+he/ pad+ma bi ka tsam+bu dza gar+b+he/ hUM hUM/ badzre badzre/ badzre pad+ma ta thA ga ta ku la a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a mo g+ha ba ra de/ sarba sA pa ri pU ra Ni sarba pA pa duHkha pra
sha ma ni/ a mo g+ha hr-i da ya sid+d+hi sA d+ha ya bi ma le hUM phaT/ oM ba ra de pad+ma b+hu dze na mostu te pad+ma su te swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa dri ma med pa pad+mo'i chu skyes kyi pad+ma'i lcags kyu don yod zhags pa'i snying po rigs kyi rgyal po gzungs chen po kun nas rnam par snang bar
byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa'i de ma thag gi 'og tu pad+ma ze 'bru dang bcas pa'i ge sar gsal bar
rnam par bye ste/ dper na/ grong khyer gyi phyogs gcig gi sgo bye nas rgyal mo byung ba bzhin du lha'i gzugs blta na sdug pa 'od mtha' yas pa phyag bzhi pa rgyan gyis rnam par
brgyan pa/ phyag na pad+ma don yod zhags pa'i ngo bo'i zhags pa'i phyag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan chen po'i phyag dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag /spyan
gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ zla ba'i cod pan 'chang ba/ zhi bzhi zhing 'dzum pa'i zhal/ sku la 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po pad+ma dang seng+ge'i
gdan la bzhugs pa/ pad+ma kha bye ba'i snying por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing
'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal
po bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can dag pa chen po/ khyod ci'i phyir mi 'dzum par blta/ mchog ci don du gnyer bzhin
du 'khod ces so/ /rig sngags kyis rgyal mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi
spyi'i phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / dam tshig gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal
mo nyon cig /khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thams cad du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i gsang bar lung bstan cing / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
snang mdzad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mchog tu lung bstan no/ /ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i dam tshig thams
cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan no/ /tuN+DA dang / dkar sham dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / pad+ma rigs mdzes ma dang / lha mo chen po ki lI ki lA dang / rdo rje pho nya mo

dang / dri med byed ma dang / pad+ma'i spyan ma dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dang / rdo rje khro gnyer can dang / lha mo pad+ma rab snang ma dang / pad+ma spyod byed ma dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo don
yod pa'i phyag dang / longs spyod ldan ma dang / dpal mo dang / 'jigs ma dang / dpe med ma dang / dbyangs can ma dang / ral gcig ma spyan stong pa/ phyag stong pa/ dbu stong pa/
don yod pa'i pad+ma dang / rin chen lha mo dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid dang / rig pa'i dbang phyug nyid dang / lha mo chen mo phyag rgya'i dbang phyug dang / rigs
kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang / hu hwa bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg dang / zhi ba'i las dang / lha mo rigs mdzes ma dang / rig sngags 'chang chen mo rdo rje mdzes pa nyid dang / phyag na 'khor lo
grub pa dang / de bzhin du ral gri bzang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / khro bo nyid dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / dus kyi mtshan mo dang / zhal rnam par 'gyur ma dang /
mche ba gtsigs ma dang / ser skya ma nyid dang / rang gsal ma dang / phyag na rin chen ma nyid dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang / de bzhin du rdzas yongs su 'dzin pa'i lha mo
dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / gtor ma nyid kyi lha dang / a gri Ni dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa'i lha dang / thams cad du rjes su song ba'i
lha mo khyod dang / gsang sngags thams cad la dbang sgyur ma dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog sgrol bar byed pa dang / bdag gi gsang
sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i mchog ma dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang mo dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo nges par sbyin pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug skyes pa nyid du dpral ba'i smin ma'i bar du lha'i chu'i dngul las nges par skyes shing byung ba/ skar
ma'i rnam pa dang mtshungs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur pa'o/ /zhes las sna tshogs dang / dbyangs can gang yin pa 'di 'chang bar byed do/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs
pas lung bstan pa dang du blangs nas gsungs so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub mnyam par skyob pa thob pa dang / de bzhin du cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa dang / phyag rgya dang /
gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par byed do/ /don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / bklags pas grub
pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan dang / thams cad du rigs spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi phyir dang / spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i dam tshig nyid kyang 'di dran pa tsam
gyis thams cad thob par byed do/ /dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / lha de dag thams cad kyang dran pa tsam gyis rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur bar the tshom med
do| |rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams dam tshig la kun tu gnas par byed do/ /de lta bas na/ 'bad pa thams cad kyis zungs shig /de bzhin du thub pa rnam
par mdzad pa dang / shAkya'i rgyal pos rig sngags kyi rgyal por lung bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ming kun tu gzigs shing thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba ste/
de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs pad+ma zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa/ rdo rje'i dngos grub dngos grub chen po/ pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rigs kyi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs dang / nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub sgrub par grub pa/ don
yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub mchog gi dang po rdo rje'i rigs su bstan pa/ rdo rje rtse mo chen po'i lha dang / de bzhin du rdo rje sa 'og
dngos grub kyi phyir rdo rje phreng ba rim par phye ba'i grangs dang / rdo rje mchu'i mchog gi dngos grub rnams la spyan ras gzigs pad+ma dang / pad+ma mdzes pa dang / de bzhin du'am/
ming smos pa tsam gyis mod la rjes su 'brang zhing 'ong bar byed do/ /de bzhin du rdo rje dbang po dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams
rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ rtag tu shes pas rig sngags smra ba dang / ming gang gis mchog 'dzin pa la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu rnam
par gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rtag tu lung ston par 'gyur bar the tshom med do/
bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lung bstan ma thag tu sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/ /g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ mgul/ rab tu 'gul/ ldeg
rab tu ldeg /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem mo/ /lha'i me tog gi char bab ste 'di lta ste/ zla ba mdog mdzes dang / dri med mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes

chen po dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / ut+pa la dmar po dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / skya nar dang / pun+nA

ga dang / gan+d+ha ka b+haR+Shi ka dang / kon+ta dang / a d+hi muk+ta ka dang / bA lA sha dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / tsam pa ka dang / sau gan+d+hi ka dang / san+d+hA bA ra NA dang / nA ga puSh+pa
dang / snam dang / yU thi ka dang / nA ba mA li ka dang / ta ra Na dang / ma ru ba ka dang / ku bya ka'i me tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang / tshon rtsi sna tshogs pas btsos pa'i lha'i gos kyi char
'bab pa'i don dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lha'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan cha'i char 'bab pa'i don dang / lha'i gser gyi me tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang / lha'i dri tsan+dan
dang / ta mA la dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / lha'i gos dang / dri bzang pos bgos pa'i phye ma'i char 'bab pa'i don dang / lha'i dri chab kyi char 'bab pa'i don
dang / ma dkrol bar nam mkha'i mthil du rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa dang / gos dang / rin po che
sna tshogs 'tsher bar byed pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i mu tig gi do shal dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan zla gam can
dang / mu tig dmar po dang / ka shi ka'i gos sna tshogs pa 'thor bar byed par gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug
chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chan po bzhi dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i bu 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus lha'i gzhal yas
khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / lha'i gos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams dang / rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gdugs sna tshogs pa rnams
nam mkha'i mthil tu kun tu gtor nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal
po'i 'khor la mchod pa'i sprin chen por gyur te mchod pa chen po byed par gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong bar gyur to/ /dngos grub chen po'i
mtshan ma byang bar gyur pa rnams yang dag par mthong ngo / /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
cad yang dag par mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kun tu yang dag par bye'o/ /lha'i gzhal yas khang sna tshogs
pa byung bar gyur pa mthong ngo / /de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song nas lhags te bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor ba byas te zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rdo rje gsor bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'tshal ba che zhing che ba yang dag par snang ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin gyi char che zhing che ba rab tu
'bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ dngos grub kyi mtshan ma che zhing che ba snang ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi yin pa'i 'khor chen po 'dus par gyur pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po skyes par mthong bar snang ba dang / cho 'phrul che zhing che
ba snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rig sngags chen
po 'byung bar snang ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ 'di ci'i mthus sngon gyi mtshan ma yang dag par snang ba lags/
'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhig yang dag par snang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sems la the tshom de skyes par gyur pas de nges par
bstan du gsol/ zhu ba lung ston par 'gyur ba gang gis bdag gi dogs pa rnam par sel ba dang / som nyi rnam par sel bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bdag la skabs dbye ru gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ nges par bstan par bya yi/ nyon cig /lag na rdo rje/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
mthus rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul snang bar byed do/ /don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / rig
sngags kyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rig sngags kun tu snang ba dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po rnam par snang bar byed do/ /de'i mthus snang ba 'di dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul 'di snang ngo / /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mthong ba dang / ming bzung ba tsam gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba dang / mtshan bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i
bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim
par phye ba dang / snying po'i mthu rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su
'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan gcig bzlas pa de rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum
du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / gsang sngags chen
po rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du snying po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / dkyil
'khor gsang ba la rab tu zhugs shing dbang bsgyur ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying por gyur pa gcig bu'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang / chu yang dag par
'byung ba bzhin no/ /snying po gcig po 'di rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su zhugs pa'o/ /des na lag na rdo rje/
khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di kun nas rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ rgyu des na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge
bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i ming lan gcig bzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi drung du
gsang ba thams cad kyi snying po dang / gzungs dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho gzhib mo rab tu ston pa dang / mtshan gzung bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /dus
gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dus
gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' legs so zhes bya ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rab
tu stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rig sngags kyi snying po dang / ting 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi rgyan dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
drug gi rjes su song bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rjes su sbyor zhing dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ de bzhin du rig
sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /
lag na rdo rje/ de bas na/ de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen po'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ dri
dang / byug pa dang / rol mo gcig gis mchod pa dang / lan gcig tsam gyis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi snying po gsang ba dang /
mchod pa rnams byas pa dang / mnyes par byas pa dang / klog par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang /
dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / gzugs dang / rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mchod par byas par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi
rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lha de rnams thams cad phyogs dang / phyogs
mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do/ /yams thams cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad
dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad dang / gtam ngan gyi 'jigs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /gdug pa thams cad dang /
phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed do/ /mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sdig pa
dang / sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / srung
ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped par byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas 'khor dang
bcas pas kun nas phyogs bzhir srung bar byed do/ /thams cad du cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
'khor gyi gsang ba don yod pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
'phye chen po dang / srin po thams cad kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi drung du mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /bkra
shis dang / yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gshed byed dang / byad stems dang / gsang sngags dang / ro langs dang / sems sgyur ba dang /
sbod gtong gi sbyor ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams thams cad 'byer bar byed do/ /dug dang / sbyar dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams thams cad 'byer bar byed do/ /rims
rnams thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / mtshan gcig pa dang / nyin gcig pa dang / grang
ba'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / mgo gzer dang / phol mig dang / g.yan
pa dang / mig nad dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / ma ri tsa ka dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / bshang ba 'khyil ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / rtsib
logs na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / tshad pa dang / gcin nad dang / gsud pa dang / lto ba na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba
de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do/ /sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / 'brum
bu phra mo dang / rma dang / mgrin pa 'gags pa de dag thams cad byabs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do/ /phyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di de ltar go skabs
yangs la rgya che ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/
dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po/ dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya'o/ /de
nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'i dge mtshan dang bkra shis pa/ gsang ba byin gyis rlob pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po
chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa thos nas tshim pa dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa 'di ni/ shin tu dkon no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags
kyi rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa
thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog tu dkon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam par blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
byang chub kyi snying po dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mnyam pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gis dpral pa'i par nas nges par byung ba ni/ rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / dngos grub mthong ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa grub pa'i ched du 'gyur ro/
dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu nye bar bsags par 'gyur ba las gzhan ma yin no/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs
gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa nye bar bsags par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyin mtshan du yang rig sngags kyi rgyal po
'di dran par bgyi/ skad cig kyang mi brjed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci ste slar yang snga dro'am/ nyin mo'am mtshan mo'am/ zla ba'am/ lor yang rung ste/ rig
sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjed na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad brjed par 'gyur/ yongs su dor bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su
dor bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ de de bzhin no/ /ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de de bzhin te/ rig sngags kyi
rgyal po 'di lag tu son par 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du skyed pa ma yin no/ /lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa
dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ma byas pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / gsang
sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ma thos shing ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des na/ lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di de'i lag tu
phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi thos shing mi mthong la/ ming gi sgra grags pa tsam du 'ang mi 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son par
'gyur ba des ni/ lag na rdo rje/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de'i lag tu son par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du rigs kyi dam tshig gi dkyil
'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / snying po dang / gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad lag tu son par 'gyur ro/ /gnas thams cad du song
zhing rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad rjes su song zhing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya
yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog dang / gtso bo dang / thu bor gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi drung na
sras kyi gtso bor dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs
su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son cing thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de ni/ de'i yon tan dang / phan yon
gzhan du med par thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba de/ sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad so sor rnyed par
'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras nas rang gi gzugs kyi bdag
nyid kyi dngos po pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i dbus su rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags par bltas nas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba nor bu rin po che chen po rig sngags kyi rgyal

po bcom ldan 'das la phul bar gyur to/ /oM a mo g+ha tsin+ta ma Ni ba ra da pad+me dz+wa la dz+wa la na b+hu dze hUM/ 'di ni/ don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i snying po'o/ /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i de ma thag pa de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bcom ldan 'das
la spyan mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od rig sngags kyi rgyal po nor bu rin po che chen po de la yang rig sngags
kyi rgyal pos spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang /
nags dang / 'brog dgon par bcas pa rnams rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/ /phyogs bcu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar gyur to/ /des na dus
gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su rdzu 'phrul gyis
bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i
rgyal po 'dis mngon par dbang bskur ba 'di legs so legs so/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal
po 'dis dbang bskur ro/ /nged thams cad kyis kyang tshig gcig tu mthun pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen pos mngon par dbang
bskur ro/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas de rnams thams cad la rig pa'i rgyal pos spyi
po'i gtsug nas mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /'di ni/ mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'o/ /oM a mo g+ha bai ro tsa na mahA mu dra
ma Ni pad+ma dz+wa la bra warba ya hUM/ phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
gshegs nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas rig pa'i rgyal po de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba rig nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yas su bskor ba
gsum byas nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyag byas nas spyan sngar 'dug ste sems par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang de'i rig pa'i rgyal po sems par
gzigs nas ji ltar de ltar yid la byed pa yang dag par rab tu gsal bar mdzad do/ /oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la pad+ma a b+hi She kaM ma Ni badzra sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ke hUM/ rig pa'i
rgyal po des dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs thun mong pa'i
dam tshig rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs rnam par thar
pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cher 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo / /rang rang gi dag pa'i rtsa bas rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor
pa'i lha thams cad mthong ngo / /rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul che zhing che ba dag byung ngo / /don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba dag mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu mthong nas don
yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba dang ldan pa'o/ /oM a mo
g+ha pu dza ma Ni pad+ma badzre ta thA ga ta bi lo ki te sa man+ta pra sa ra hUM/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po byin ma thag tu mchod
pa rgya chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma rab tu byung ste/ ji ltar rang rang gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa chen po rnams rab tu byung ngo / /lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par
bkra ba yangs pa rgya chen po go skabs kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi bkod pa rig sngags
kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag par mthong ngo / /de nas rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs
gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das las ring por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las mngon du phyogs nas stan la 'dug go /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
stobs byin gyis rlob pa'i khyad par phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo'i mthu stobs pad+ma yangs pa chen po'i gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i
rnam par 'phrul pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i de kho na nyid kyi snying po grub pa/ dam tshig dang rjes su mthun pa/ mthu stobs dang yon tan 'byung ba la phan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad kyi mchog rab tu sbyin pa la ltos/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis re ba thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par rjes su sbyin te/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis sems can thams cad kyi snang
bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / 'khra sa dang / yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /
dgra thams cad rab tu 'dul bar byed do/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do/ /char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /char med na char 'bebs
so| |rlung dang / sad dang / ser bzlog par byed do/ /mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /nad thams cad zlog par byed do/ /gdug pa thams
cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /tshe dang nad med pa 'phel bar byed do/ /bsod nams sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / 'bru 'phel bar byed do/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad dang / cho ga
bklags pas 'grub pa'i dngos grub gsungs so/ /de nas snying po 'di bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig pa'i rgyal po bklags pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams
cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag brgya bzlas pas pad+mo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan mtha' dag dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang bcas
pa'i lha rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med
khang mtha' dag mthong ngo / /de la lha rnams rab tu 'jug par byed/ dam tshig shes par yang 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bar
yang 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang rjes su mthun par yang 'gyur ro/ /dang po rmi lam mthong ba tsam gyis 'gro'o/ /gnyis par rmi lam mthong ba la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi rgyan dang / dkyil
'khor brtags pa mthong ngo / /gzhal yas khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa yang mthong ngo / /der yang rab tu 'jug par byed de/ dam tshig kyang 'dzin par byed do/ /phyag rgya dang / dkyil
'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba yang so so thob bo/ /rig sngags dang bcas pa'i dngos grub rab tu thob bo/ /gsum par rmi lam mthong ba na rdo rje rigs
kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang bcas pa rang gi rgyan dang
dkyil 'khor tu brtags pa dang / gzhal med khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa mthong ngo / /de la yang rdo rje 'chang rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya sbyin par byed do/ /mngon
par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do/ /rig sngags thams cad dang / don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i dngos grub chen po dang / mngon par dbang bskur bas
mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do/ /rdo rje'i rig sngags kyi dngos grub chen po dang / dam tshig thams cad so sor thob bo/ /bzhi par rmi lam mthong
ba na nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad lha'i tshogs dang / dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i lha dang / rig pa'i rgyal po yang mthong ste/ de la yang rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /phyag
rgya dang / dam tshig dang / cho ga dang bcas pa rjes su 'thob ste/ mngon par dbang bskur ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /dngos grub chen po dang / mchog sbyin yang so so
'thob cing thams cad du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /lnga par rmi lam mthong ba na rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / don yod zhags
pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / po Ta la ka'i ri'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams
cad dang / lha dang bcas pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mthong ste/ de la yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid sems can
de la rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs kyi dngos grub so sor 'thob bo/ /rang nyid kyang don yod pa'i rig sngags
kyi dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur te mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do/ /cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / dngos grub kyang rjes su stsol par byed do/ /mchog thams cad rab
tu sbyin pa so sor 'thob bo/ /drug par rmi lam mthong ba na dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa mthong ngo / /gzhal med khang
dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mthong ste/ de
la yang rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba so sor 'thob ste/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi
mchog sbyin pa so sor 'thob bo/ /bdun par rmi lam chen po mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por gshegs nas rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ste/ chos
kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba mthong ngo / /de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste rang nyid phyag gis bzung nas rab
tu 'jug par byed do/ /rang nyid mngon par dbang bskur zhing mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam
tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa rjes su stsol bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston par
byed do/ /nad sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gcig por 'gyur/ skye ba brje ba 'chi 'pho ba'i dus su dran pa nye bar
gnas shing dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skye ba'i skal ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi
'khor los bsgyur bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mchod par byed do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas mngon sum du mthong nas nye bar ston par byed do/ /thams cad du yang de rnams rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar ston par byed do/ /thams cad du yang rang gi
gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig nye bar ston par byed do/ /bskal pa brgya stong phrag gi bar du yang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par byed do/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang /
gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags rnams la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba skye bar yang rang gi bsod nams kyi las kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran par
'gyur ro/ /thams cad du gnas thams cad yongs su dag pa'i las kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes rtsa ba'i snying po'i dngos grub bla na med pa bklags
pas 'grub pa'o/ /de nas 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad nges par sreg pa
la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ /gang dang gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rjes su bcings par 'gyur ro/ /de yang nyi ma
bdun gyis rang gi lus de yang rang gi gzugs kyis nges par 'gro ste/ mdun du nye bar 'dug ste sbyin par byed pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa nye bar bsags pa 'di dang / sdig pa
thams cad yongs su zad pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdag zhum pa dang / 'khrugs pa mtha' dag bzlas pa tsam gyis yang dag par smra bar
byed cing mi snang bar byed do/ /rims thams cad la skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas rims thams cad yongs
su grol bar byed do/ /nad thams cad la byabs pas yongs su grol bar byed do/ /mtshon chas sam/ rma bya'i sgros sa ma/ mdas kyang rung ste nad thams cad las yongs su
grol bar byed do/ /gdon thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te gdon gyis zin pa de'i
mgul par bcings te lan bdun du byab par bya'o/ /gu gul bdug pa sbyin par bye/ bzlas brjod lan bdun bya bzhin pa dang bcas pas gang dang gang gi gdon gyis zin par
gyur pa de yang rang gi lus kyis nges par 'gro ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du nye bar 'dug nas thams cad smra bar byed do/ /rang gis dris pa de thams cad smra bar byed
do| |bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab rtsod dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang
bsam gtan dang / sbyin sreg gis yongs su grol lo/ /khar mur te rgyal po khab tu zhugs na/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas gnas so/ /dug 'thungs
pas chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste/ dug med par 'gyur ro/ /dug gis zos pa la byab bar bya ste/ dug med par 'gyur ro/ /dug dang / byad stems dang / gsang
sngags dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad la dri dang bsres pa'i bum pa la stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas la bkru bar bya ste/ bkrus pa tsam gyi mdo la thams
cad nyams par byed do/ /gang yang lus zad pa dang / nyams pa dang / bskams pa dang / rgyal po'i dpal med pa dang / lus yongs su gdungs pa la rig sngags 'chang des
ma rig pas dril chus yongs su gang ba'i bum pa dgu yungs kar gyis gtor te stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas An+ta ra sa sta dang / pI ka dang / a Ta
dang / bil ba dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / e kas+thA na dang / mo lo kya dang / lus kyi mar gyis bsku mnye byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te A Ta byug par bya'o//
gzugs brnyan bya ste/ gong bu de mtshon chas dum bu brgyad du bya ste/ snod yongs su gang ba bzhir 'phang bar bya zhing / snod gang ba bzhi mtshams bzhir 'phang bar bya'o/ /de
nas snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab par bya'o/ /de nas ne'u gsing sngon po gang du chu rgyun 'bab par dri'i chu'i bum pas khrus byas shing gos dkar po dgus g.yogs
par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya'o/ /ji ltar 'byor pa'i bram ze'i
ston mo yon dang bcas pa bya'o/ /de nas rang nyid byams pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /ji ltar 'byor pa gya nom pa gya nom pas dkar ba'i zas kyi bza' ba dang / btung bas tshim
par bya'o/ /de nas dpal med pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis ma rig pa dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang /
srin po dang / grib gnon dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren gyis zin pa las yongs su grol lo/ /bza' nyes dang / 'gom nyes dang / 'jigs pa thams cad
las yongs su grol par byed do/ /lus kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sdig
pa dang / sgrib pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba
brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu yang dgongs par
'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha thams cad kyis ji srid byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nge 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /mig na ba la pa la sha'i
chu dang / shing mngar gyi chu dang / dri ma med pa'i chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyar bar bya ste/ mig nad 'phral du zhi bar byed do/ /mgo bo'i zug rdu dang /
gzhogs phyed na ba la mar dang til mar la lan brgya rtsa brgya yongs su bzlas nas 'jam par bsros pas sman shu ti la bsgos nas mgo la sku mnye byas na /mgo
bo'i nad thams cad dang / gzhogs phyed na ba'i nad thams cad yongs su grol lo/ /so'i zug rdul me tog sna ma dang / so shing la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas
nas bza' bar byas na/ so'i zug rdu yong su grol lo/ /rna ba'i zug rdu la shu ti dang til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas bkang bar bya ste/ rna ba'i zug rdu
thams cad yongs su grol lo/ /kha na ba la sman ma shU ro'i chu dang / mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas 'jam par bsros pa btung bar bya ste kha'i nad thams cad yongs su
grol lo| |lto ba'i zug rdu la lan tshwa dang / chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas btung bar bya ste/ lto ba'i zug rdu yongs su grol lo/ /snying gi zug rdu la so so
rtsal ma dang / go snyod dang / bu ska ra'i rtsa ba rnams bzhi 'gyur gyi chu'i sum cha lhag mar lus kyi bar du bskol bar byas nas btung bar bya'o/ /lan brgyad
bzlas pas snying gi zug rdu dang / gzhogs na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / gsud pa dang / skyug bro ba dang / gcin nad rnams te/ de bzhin du
nad thams cad 'phral du sel bar 'jig rten gyi mgon pos 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams kyis yungs kar la yongs su bzlas nas
rgyal po rnams kyi sgor gtor bar bya ste/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du yang rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur
ro| |na le sham la stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te na le sham gyi 'bras bu kha'i rtse mor bcug ste bcangs na/ gang smras pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang blangs pa de
so sor rnyed do/ /gnas thams cad du 'gro ba rnams la rgyal ba'i mchog chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i char 'bebs pa la bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya ste/ gang
du 'dod pa der klu'i char 'bebs so/ /klu'i mtshor song nas mtshan mo bdun du zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad du byas na/
gter chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug thob pa la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad du byas na/ dbang phyug
chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra 'joms pa la sA lu'i phub ma dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba'i til mar dang bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/
dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /dgra rnams thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /skrod par 'dod pas de nyid kyi thal ba las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas
te dgra'i sgor gtor bar bya ste/ mtshan mo gcig tu mi gnas te/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'bros par byed do/ /'khrug pa'i g.yul ngor 'jug par 'dod pas yungs
kar la lan stong phrag brgyad du yongs su bzlas te 'khrug pa'i g.yul ngo'i dbus su gtor bar bya ste/ thams cad du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par 'gyur te
thams cad du rgyal pa ster bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do/ /gnas na gnas pa thams cad kyi yang rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur
ro| |thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ /ldong ros la lan stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas te mig gi mig sman du
byas na| mi snang bar 'gyur te/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gi haM la lan stong phrag brgyad
yongs su bzlas te thig le byas nas bu ga thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed cing / bu ga'i sgo thams cad bye ste sgor gnas par byed do/ /gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par
byed do| |gi haM gis snying gar thig le byas nas gang du 'jug par byed pa de dang de nyid du mchod pa chen por 'gyur te/ nor che ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba thob bo/ /lag pa
gnyis la byugs pas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur te/ gang blangs pa de thams cad so sor rnyed do/ /rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod pas lag pa g.yas pa la gi haM
gis byugs nas lan stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te rgyal po'i sgo la thal lcag sbyin par bya ste/ rgyal po dang brtsun mo sras dang 'khro dang bcas pa bdag nyid dang / nor
gyis kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du byed pa la me tog dang 'bras bu la lan stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya/ yang na mngag par bya ste/
'phral nyid du dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'dod pa de dang de nyid du 'gro'o/ /slar yang 'ong ngo / /yang na ming smos pas nam mkha' la 'phang bar bya ste/ gang gi ming
smos pa de 'gugs par 'gyur zhing / mtshan mo 'ong bar byed do/ /mthu stobs kyis slar yang phyir ldog ste 'gro'o/ /skyes pa dbang du byed pa la dzA ti dang / sna ma'i me tog la lan
bdun yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na mngag par bya ste/ reg pa tsam gyis bdag nyid dang / nor gyis kyang dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang smras pa dang / gang
blangs pa de thams cad byed do/ /'bangs dang ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la 'bras bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ba'am/
mngag par bya ste/ bzung ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho bar nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rje rigs dbang du byed pa la
ba sha ka'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste/ dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so/ /bram ze dbang du byed pas zho dang 'o ma'i bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa
brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/ bram ze dbang du byed par grub bo/ /rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la bu ram dang 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas
sbyin par bya ste/ dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dmangs rigs dbang du byed r+pa la gang dang gang gi bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste/ zos pa tsam gyi
mod la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i bya ba gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa bya ba rnams ni/ bklags pas grub par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa
pad+ma'i chu skyes kyi rtsa ba'i snying po'i yo byad dang / cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// //de nas don yod pa'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gzugs kyi yo byad dang / cho gar
'gyur te/ gzungs 'di'i rig sngags 'chang gis dran pa tsam dang / bklags pa dang / phyag rgya bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin
gyi nor bu'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dran par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs stong phrag bzlas pa 'dis dus gsum du gshegs
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang des kyang dang por rmi lam gyi nang du mthong ngo / /dus
gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rnam par snang mdzad yid bzhin nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar
byed do| |de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya la rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rang rang
rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba rjes su sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod bar mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams
bye bar gyur pa'i sgor mthong ngo / /gang du 'dod pa der 'jug go/ /des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu
dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rig sngags 'chang de srid 'tsho'i bar rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par
gnas so/ /stong phrag gnyis pa bzlas pas gnyis par rmi lam mthong bar blta'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang la yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya
dang / gzungs dang / gzhal med khang mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo / /der yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad mthong ngo //
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ngo / /de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur
bas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor rnams ston par
mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang rang nyid la yang mngon par dbang bskur par byed do/ /legs so legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed do/ /pad+mo
yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa yid bzhin
gyi nor bu chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing / yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag gsum pa bzlas pas
rmi lam chen po gsum pa bstan pa mthong ste/ gzhal med khang mtha' dag tu rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba rjes su
stsol bar mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rdo rje byin gyis
rlob pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya yang mthong ngo / /de yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la rdo rje
phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar
mdzad do/ /rang rang rnams kyang rdo rje'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba rjes su stsol bar mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i dam tshig la rab tu 'jug
par mdzad do/ /rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i
rigs yang dag par byin gyis rlob pa'i dngos grub nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /thams cad du rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag
bzhi pa bzlas pas nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba thob bo/ /de la yang nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i dbang bskur
ba thob bo/ /rmi lam ston pa de yang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams mthong ngo / /dus gsum pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyang rig sngags 'chang de la nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / mngon par dbang bskur
bas kyang mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do/ /rang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi nor bu gsang ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba gtsug gi nor bu byin
gyis rlob pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nor
bu'i dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dngos grub kyi dam tshig gi dbang bskur ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par
dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed cing rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang ji srid sangs
rgyas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob par yang dag par dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i
phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa lnga pas rmi
lam chen po'i phyag rgya ston par byed pa ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag rdzogs par phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur
bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi ldog pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen por mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad
dang / phyag rgya chen po mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa drug bas rmi lam yang dag par ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi snying por gshegs
te rdo rje'i gdan byin gyis rlob pas byin gyis brlabs te mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa mthong ste seng+ge'i
gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang rang rang gi rig sngags 'chang phyir mi ldog par mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do/ /legs so legs so
zhes bya ba'i gsung rjod par mdzad do/ /dgongs pa cher brtan pas dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa bdun pas rmi lam chen po ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
bdud 'dul ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / chos kyi sgron me sbor ba dang / chos kyi rgyan mtshan sgreng ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ba mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo
bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / phyag rgyas dbang bskur bas mngon par bskur par mdzad do/ /legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par
mdzad do/ /phyag rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / kun nas gsang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub dang / mngon par dbang bskur bar
mdzad do/ /de bzhin du bklags pa dang / bzlas pa tsam gyis cho ga dang / las kyi 'bras bu ston par mdzad do/ /don yod pa'i nor bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen
po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho ga 'di yang rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'di bklags pa dang dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par snang
mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du gnas la gnas pa'i dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum
du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mtshan nas smos nas mngon sum du ston par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ston par
mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan smos nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa rnam
par 'joms par byed do/ /bklags pa tsam dang / lan gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis de thams cad yongs su zad pa dang / yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gyi
sdig pa'i chos gang cung zad kun tu spyad pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i sems can de'i mdun du lan gsum du dbyangs gsang bstod
pas brjod cing dran par bya ste/ de'i sgra thos pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med par song ba thams cad dang / mnar med pa la mchog tu
gzhol ba rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de yang sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na sdig pa can gyi sems can shi bar
gyur pas bsod nams kyi don du bsod nams 'dod pas sems can de'i don du yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te sems can de'i don du ro
bsregs pa'am/ mchod pa'am/ sbas pa'am/ rus pa'i rkang rus sam/ dur khrod kyi dbus su de'i steng du gdab cing der gtor bar bya'o/ /gtor ba tsam gyi mod la
sems can de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de nyid du sems can de'i lus la byang chub chen po'i yan lag gi chu'i dri'i mchog bsgos par 'gyur ro/ /
'phral nyid du dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi lus las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa
thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /der yang ngan 'gro rnams las 'phos par 'gyur zhing / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'di la
so ma nyi dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /gang gi tshe nad drag pos thebs par gyur pa de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis rnam par bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad
sbyin par bya ste/ de yang nad yun ring po las grol te rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro/ /nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /spyi bo'i
gtsug tu phyag rgyas btab ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/ 'phral nyid du yongs su grol lo/ /gal te nag po chen pos rang gi phyag rgyas btab na/ de ltar
de nyid la bltas pas phyag rgya thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te yun ring du ma grol na/ gang gis phyag rgyas btab par gyur pa de mig gnyis po dag 'byin
par 'gyur/ /gdon gyis zin pa thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mdud ba nyi shu rtsa gcig byas la bcing bar bya ste/ gdon
